original: ayaṃ vuccati upanissayagocaro.
analyzed: ayam vuccati upanissaya gocaraḥ

original: Katamo upanibandhagocaro? Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā yattha cittaṃ upanibandhati. Vuttañhetaṃ

original: upeto…pe… samannāgato. Tenapi vuccati ācāragocarasampannoti.
analyzed: samannāgato tena api vuccati ācāra gocara sampanno ti

original: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti aṇuppamāṇesu asañcicca āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu

original: Indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ

original: Na nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ

original: Thero kimetanti olokento tassā dantaṭṭhike asubhasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ –

original: Sāmikopi kho panassā anumaggaṃ gacchanto theraṃ disvā “kiñci, bhante, itthiṃ passathā”ti pucchi. Taṃ thero āha –

original: “Nābhijānāmi itthī vā, puriso vā ito gato;

original: Apica aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo, gacchatesa mahāpathe”ti.
analyzed: apica aṭṭhi saṅghāṭaḥ gacchate sa mahāpatha iti

original: sampāpanā avaṇṇahārikā parapiṭṭhimaṃsikatā, ayaṃ vuccati nippesikatā.

original: “Tattha katamā lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā? Lābhasakkārasilokasannissito pāpiccho
analyzed: tattha katamā lābhena lābham nijigīsana tā lābha sakkāra siloka sannissitaḥ pāpa iccho

original: icchāpakato ito laddhaṃ āmisaṃ amutra harati, amutra vā laddhaṃ āmisaṃ idha āharati.
analyzed: itas laddham āmisam amutra harati amutra vā laddham āmisam idhas āharati

original: Yā evarūpā āmisena āmisassa eṭṭhi gaveṭṭhi pariyeṭṭhi esanā gavesanā pariyesanā,
analyzed: yā evarūpā āmisena āmisassa eṭṭhi gaveṭṭhi pariyeṭṭhi esanā gavesanā pariyesanā

original: ayaṃ vuccati lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā”ti.
analyzed: ayam vuccati lābhena lābham nijigīsana tā ati

original: 17. Imissā pana pāḷiyā evamattho veditabbo. Kuhananiddese tāva lābhasakkārasilokasannissitassāti
analyzed: imissā pana pāḷiyā evamattho veditabbo kuhana niddese tāva lābha sakkāra siloka sannissitassa ati

analyzed: lābhañca sakkārañca kitti saddañca sannissitassa patthayantassa ati attho pāpa icchassa ati

original: asantaguṇadīpanakāmassa. Icchāpakatassāti icchāya apakatassa, upaddutassāti attho.
analyzed: asanta guṇa dīpana kāmassa icchā apakatassa ati icchāya apakatassa upaddutassa ati attho

original: Ito paraṃ yasmā paccayapaṭisevanasāmantajappanairiyāpathasannissitavasena mahāniddese
analyzed: itas param yasmā paccaya paṭisevana sāmanta jappana eriyāpatha sannissita vasena mahāniddese

analyzed: tividham kuhana vatthu āgatam tasmā tividham petam dassetum paccaya paṭisevana saṅkhātena

original: vāti evamādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha cīvarādīhi nimantitassa tadatthikasseva sato pāpicchataṃ
analyzed: vāti evamādi āraddham tattha cīvara ādīhi nimantitassa tad atthikassa iva sataḥ pāpa chatam

original: nissāya paṭikkhipanena, te ca gahapatike attani suppatiṭṭhitasaddhe ñatvā puna tesaṃ
analyzed: nissāya paṭikkhipanena te ca gahapatike attani su patiṭṭhita saddhe ñatvā puna tesam

original: “aho ayyo appiccho na kiñci paṭiggaṇhituṃ icchati, suladdhaṃ vata no assa sace appamattakampi
analyzed: aho ayyaḥ appicchaḥ na kiñci paṭiggaṇhitum icchati su laddham vata no assa sace appamattakam pi

original: kiñci paṭiggaṇheyyā”ti nānāvidhehi upāyehi paṇītāni cīvarādīni upanentānaṃ tadanuggahakāmataṃyeva
analyzed: kiñci paṭiggaṇheyya ati nānāvidhehi upāyehi paṇītāni cīvara ādīni upanentānam tad anuggaha kāma taṃyā iva

original: “Katamaṃ paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu? Idha gahapatikā bhikkhuṃ nimantenti
analyzed: katamam paccaya paṭisevana saṅkhātam kuhana vatthu idha gahapatikāḥ bhikkhum nimantenti

original: cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārehi. So pāpiccho icchāpakato

original: atthiko cīvara…pe… parikkhārānaṃ bhiyyokamyataṃ upādāya cīvaraṃ paccakkhāti. Piṇḍapātaṃ…pe…

original: nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā dhāreyya. Kiṃ samaṇassa mahagghena piṇḍapātena

original: etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo uñchācariyāya piṇḍiyālopena jīvikaṃ kappeyya. Kiṃ samaṇassa

original: mahagghena senāsanena, etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ samaṇo rukkhamūliko vā assa abbhokāsiko
analyzed: mahagghena senāsanena etam sāruppam yam samaṇaḥ rukkhamūlikaḥ vā assa abbhokāsikaḥ

original: vā. Kiṃ samaṇassa mahagghena gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena, etaṃ sāruppaṃ yaṃ

original: samaṇo pūtimuttena vā hariṭakīkhaṇḍena vā osadhaṃ kareyyā’ti. Tadupādāya lūkhaṃ cīvaraṃ

original: dhāreti, lūkhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati, lūkhaṃ senāsanaṃ paṭisevati, lūkhaṃ gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ

original: So evamāha – ‘tiṇṇaṃ sammukhībhāvā saddho kulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati. Saddhāya

original: sammukhībhāvāsaddhokulaputto bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavati. Tumhākañcevāyaṃ saddhā atthi,

original: deyyadhammo ca saṃvijjati, ahañca paṭiggāhako, sacehaṃ na paṭiggahessāmi, evaṃ tumhe

original: puññena paribāhirā bhavissanti, na mayhaṃ iminā attho. Apica tumhākaṃyeva anukampāya
analyzed: puññena paribāhirāḥ bhavissanti na mayham iminā atthaḥ apica tumhākam yeva anukampāya

original: paṭiggaṇhāmī’ti. Tadupādāya bahumpi cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhāti. Bahumpi piṇḍapātaṃ…pe…

original: kuhitattaṃ, idaṃ paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthū”ti.

original: Pāpicchasseva pana sato uttarimanussadhammādhigamaparidīpanavācāya tathā tathā vimhāpanaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthūti veditabbaṃ. Yathāha –

original: “Katamaṃ sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthu? Idhekacco pāpiccho icchāpakato sambhāvanādhippāyo

analyzed: evam mama janaḥ sambhāvessati iti ariya dhamma sannissitam vācam bhāsati yaḥ evarūpam

original: cīvaraṃ dhāreti, so samaṇo mahesakkho’ti bhaṇati. ‘Yo evarūpaṃ pattaṃ lohathālakaṃ.

analyzed: bhaṇati yassa evarūpaḥ upajjhāyaḥ ācariyaḥ samāna upajjhāyakaḥ samāna ācariyakaḥ mittaḥ sandiṭṭho

original: sambhatto sahāyo. Yo evarūpe vihāre vasati aḍḍhayoge pāsāde hammiye guhāyaṃ leṇe

original: samaṇo mahesakkho’ti bhaṇati. Atha vā ‘korajikakorajiko bhākuṭikabhākuṭiko kuhakakuhako

original: sāmantajappanasaṅkhātaṃ kuhanavatthū”ti.
analyzed: sāmanta jappana saṅkhātam kuhana vatthu iti

analyzed: pāpicchassa iva pana sato sambhāvanā adhippāya katena iriyāpathena vimhāpanam iriyāpatha sannissitam

original: Aṭṭhapanātiādi ṭhapanā, ādarena vā ṭhapanā. Ṭhapanāti ṭhapanākāro. Saṇṭhapanāti abhisaṅkharaṇā,
analyzed: aṭṭhapana atiādi ṭhapanā ādarena vā ṭhapanā ṭhapanā ati ṭhapanā ākāraḥ saṇṭhapanā ati abhisaṅkharaṇā

original: pāsādikabhāvakaraṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhākuṭikāti padhānapurimaṭṭhitabhāvadassanena

original: Bhākuṭikassa bhāvo bhākuṭiyaṃ. Kuhanāti vimhāpanā. Kuhassa āyanā kuhāyanā. Kuhitassa bhāvo kuhitattanti.

original: Lapanāniddese ālapanāti vihāraṃ āgate manusse disvā “kimatthāya bhonto āgatā, kiṃ
analyzed: lapanā niddese vihāram āgate manusse disvā kimatthāya bhonto āgatā kim

original: bhikkhū nimantituṃ, yadi evaṃ gacchatha re, ahaṃ pacchato pattaṃ gahetvā āgacchāmī”ti
analyzed: bhikkhū nimantitum yadi evam gacchatha re aham pacchatas pattam gahetvā āgacchāmi iti

original: evaṃ āditova lapanā. Atha vā attānaṃ upanetvā “ahaṃ tisso, mayi rājā pasanno, mayi
analyzed: evam āditas uva lapanāḥ atha vā attānam upanetvā aham tissaḥ mayi rājā pasannaḥ mayi

original: asuko ca asuko ca rājamahāmatto pasanno”ti evaṃ attupanāyikā lapanā ālapanā. Lapanāti
analyzed: asuko ca asuko ca rāja mahāmatto pasanno ti evam attu panāyikā lapanā ālapanā lapanā ati

original: puṭṭhassa sato vuttappakārameva lapanaṃ. Sallapanāti gahapatikānaṃ ukkaṇṭhane bhītassa

original: okāsaṃ datvā datvā suṭṭhu lapanā. Ullapanāti mahākuṭumbiko mahānāviko mahādānapatīti
analyzed: okāsam datvā datvā suṭṭhu lapanā ullapanā ati mahā kuṭumbikaḥ mahā nāvikaḥ mahā dānapati iti

original: evaṃ uddhaṃ katvā lapanā. Samullapanāti sabbatobhāgena uddhaṃ katvā lapanā.
analyzed: evam uddham katvā lapanā samullapanā ati sabbatobhāgena uddham katvā lapanā

original: Unnahanāti “upāsakā pubbe īdise kāle navadānaṃ detha, idāni kiṃ na dethā”ti evaṃ
analyzed: unnahanā ati upāsakā pubbe īdise kāle nava dānam detha idāni kim na detha ati evam

original: yāva “dassāma, bhante, okāsaṃ na labhāmā”tiādīni vadanti, tāva uddhaṃ uddhaṃ nahanā,
analyzed: yāva dassāma bhante okāsam na labhāma ati ādīni vadanti tāva uddham uddham nahanā

original: veṭhanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā ucchuhatthaṃ disvā “kuto ābhataṃ upāsakā”ti pucchati.
analyzed: veṭhanā iti vuttam hoti atha vā ucchu hattham disvā kutas ābhatam upāsakā iti pucchati

original: Ucchukhettato, bhanteti. Kiṃ tattha ucchu madhuranti. Khāditvā, bhante, jānitabbanti.
analyzed: bhante iti kim tattha ucchu madhuranti khāditvā bhante jānitabbanti

original: “Na, upāsaka, bhikkhussa ucchuṃ dethā”ti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti. Yā evarūpā nibbeṭhentassāpi
analyzed: na upāsaka bhikkhussa ucchum detha ati vattum vaṭṭati iti yā evarūpā nibbeṭhentassa api

original: veṭhanakathā, sā unnahanā. Sabbatobhāgena punappunaṃ unnahanā samunnahanā.
analyzed: veṭhana kathā sā unnahanā sabbatobhāgena punappunam unnahanā samunnahanā

original: Ukkācanāti “etaṃ kulaṃ maṃyeva jānāti. Sace ettha deyyadhammo uppajjati, mayhameva
analyzed: etam kulam etam kulam maṃyā iva jānāti sace ettha deyya dhammo uppajjati mayham eva

original: detī”ti evaṃ ukkhipitvā kācanā ukkācanā, uddīpanāti vuttaṃ hoti. Telakandarikavatthu
analyzed: deti iti evam ukkhipitvā kācanā ukkācanā uddīpanā iti vuttam hoti telakandarika vatthu

original: cettha vattabbaṃ. Sabbatobhāgena pana punappunaṃ ukkācanā samukkācanā.

original: pāripūriyā saṃvattanti, ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya
analyzed: pāripūriyā saṃvattanti ekanta nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya

original: nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti.
analyzed: nibbānāya saṃvattanti iti

original: Ettha ca pahānanti koci dhammo nāma natthi aññatra vuttappakārānaṃ pāṇātipātādīnaṃ
analyzed: ettha ca pahānam ti koci dhammo nāma natthi aññatra vutta ppakārānam pāṇātipāta ādīnam

original: anuppādamattato. Yasmā pana taṃ taṃ pahānaṃ tassa tassa kusaladhammassa patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena
analyzed: anuppāda mattataḥ yasmā pana tam tam pahānam tassa tassa kusala dhammassa patiṭṭhāna aṭṭhena

original: upadhāraṇaṃ hoti, vikampābhāvakaraṇena ca samādānaṃ. Tasmā pubbe vutteneva upadhāraṇasamādhānasaṅkhātena
analyzed: upadhāraṇam hoti vikampā bhāva karaṇena ca samādānam tasmā pubbe vuttena iva upadhāraṇa samādhāna saṅkhātena

original: sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti vuttaṃ. Itare cattāro dhammā tato tato veramaṇivasena, tassa
analyzed: sīlana ṭṭhena sīlanti vuttam itare cattāro dhammā tatas tatas veramaṇi vasena tassa

original: tassa saṃvaravasena, tadubhayasampayuttacetanāvasena, taṃ taṃ avītikkamantassa avītikkamanavasena
analyzed: tassa saṃvara vasena tad ubhaya sampayutta cetanā vasena tam tam a vītikkamantassa a vītikkamana vasena

original: ca cetaso pavattisabbhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttā. Sīlaṭṭho pana tesaṃ pubbe pakāsitoyevāti.
analyzed: ca cetasaḥ pavatti sabbhāvam sandhāya vuttā sīla ṭṭhaḥ pana tesam pubbe pakāsitaḥ yā eva ati

original: Evaṃ pahānasīlādivasena pañcavidhaṃ.
analyzed: evam pahāna sīla ādi vasena pañcavidham

original: Ettāvatā ca kiṃ sīlaṃ? Kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ? Kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni? Kimānisaṃsaṃ sīlaṃ? Katividhaṃ cetaṃ sīlanti? Imesaṃ pañhānaṃ vissajjanaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: ettāvatā ca kim sīlam kenaṭṭhena sīlam kānassa lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānāni kimānisaṃsam sīlam katividham ca itam sīlam ti imesam pañhānam vissajjanam niṭṭhitam

original: Sīlasaṃkilesavodānaṃ
analyzed: sīla saṃkilesa vodānam

original: 21. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “ko cassa saṃkileso, kiṃ vodāna”nti. Tatra vadāma – khaṇḍādibhāvo
analyzed: yam pana vuttam kaḥ ca assa saṃkileso kim vodānan ti tatra vadāma khaṇḍa ādi bhāvaḥ

original: sīlassa saṃkileso, akhaṇḍādibhāvo vodānaṃ. So pana khaṇḍādibhāvo lābhayasādihetukena
analyzed: sīlassa saṃkilesaḥ akhaṇḍa ādi bhāvaḥ vodānam saḥ pana khaṇḍa ādi bhāvaḥ lābha yasa ādi hetukena

original: bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasaṃyogena ca saṅgahito.
analyzed: bhedena ca sattavidha methuna saṃyogena ca saṅgahitaḥ

original: Tathā hi yassa sattasu āpattikkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti,
analyzed: tathā hi yassa sattasu āpatti kkhandhesu ādimhi vā ante vā sikkhāpadam bhinnam hoti

original: tassa sīlaṃ pariyante chinnasāṭako viya khaṇḍaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa pana vemajjhe bhinnaṃ,
analyzed: tassa sīlam pariyante chinna sāṭakaḥ viya khaṇḍam nāma hoti yassa pana vemajjhe bhinnam

original: tassa majjhe chiddasāṭako viya chiddaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi bhinnāni,
analyzed: tassa majjhe chidda sāṭakaḥ viya chiddam nāma hoti yassa paṭipāṭiyā dve tīṇi bhinnāni

original: tassa piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena visabhāgavaṇṇena kāḷarattādīnaṃ aññatarasarīravaṇṇā
analyzed: tassa piṭṭhiyā vā kucchiyā vā uṭṭhitena visa bhāga vaṇṇena kāḷaratta ādīnam aññatara sarīra vaṇṇā

original: gāvī viya sabalaṃ nāma hoti. Yassa antarantarā bhinnāni, tassa antarantarā visabhāgavaṇṇabinduvicitrā
analyzed: gāvī viya sabalam nāma hoti yassa antar antarā bhinnāni tassa antar antarā visa bhāga vaṇṇa bindu vicitrā

original: gāvī viya kammāsaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ tāva lābhādihetukena bhedena khaṇḍādibhāvo hoti.
analyzed: gāvī viya kammāsam nāma hoti evam tāva lābha ādi hetukena bhedena khaṇḍa ādi bhāvaḥ hoti

original: Evaṃ sattavidhamethunasaṃyogavasena. Vuttañhi bhagavatā –
analyzed: evam sattavidha methuna saṃyoga vasena vuttam hi bhagavatā

original: “Idha, brāhmaṇa, ekacco samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamāno na heva
analyzed: idha brāhmaṇaḥ ekaccaḥ samaṇaḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ vā sammā brahmacārī paṭijānamānaḥ na ha iva

original: kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃdvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati, apica kho mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ
analyzed: kho mātugāmena saddhim dvayaṃdvaya samāpattim samāpajjati api ca kho mātugāmassa ucchādanam

original: parimaddanaṃ nhāpanaṃ sambāhanaṃ sādiyati, so tadassādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca
analyzed: parimaddanam nhāpanam sambāhanam sādiyati saḥ tat assādeti tam nikāmeti tena ca

original: vittiṃ āpajjati, idampi kho, brāhmaṇa, brahmacariyassa khaṇḍampi chiddampi sabalampi
analyzed: vittim āpajjati idam pi kho brāhmaṇa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍam pi chiddam pi sa balam pi

original: kammāsampi. Ayaṃ vuccati, brāhmaṇa, aparisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carati saṃyutto methunena
analyzed: ayam vuccati brāhmaṇa a parisuddham brahmacariyam carati saṃyuttaḥ methunena

original: saṃyogena, na parimuccati jātiyā. Jarāya maraṇena…pe… na parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
analyzed: saṃyogena na parimuccati jātiyāḥ jarāya na parimuccati dukkhasma ati vadāmi

original: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… paṭijānamāno na heva kho mātugāmena

original: saddhiṃ dvayaṃ dvayasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati. Napi mātugāmassa ucchādanaṃ…pe… sādiyati.

analyzed: apica kho mātugāmena saddhim sañjagghati saṃkīḍati saṃkelāyati saḥ

original: na parimuccati dukkhasmāti vadāmi.
analyzed: na parimuccati dukkhasma ati vadāmi

original: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena saddhiṃ dvayaṃ
analyzed: puna ca param brāhmaṇaḥ idha ekaccaḥ samaṇaḥ vāpe na ha iva kho mātugāmena saddhim

analyzed: saddhim sañjagghati saṃkīḍati saṃkelāyati api ca kho mātugāmassa cakkhunā cakkhum

analyzed: upanijjhāyati pekkhati saḥ na parimuccati dukkhasma ati vadāmi

original: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena… napi mātugāmassa…

analyzed: na api mātugāmena pekkhati api ca kho mātugāmassa saddam suṇāti

analyzed: so vadāmi

original: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena… napi mātugāmassa…
analyzed: puna ca param brāhmaṇaḥ idha ekaccaḥ samaṇaḥ vāpe na ha iva kho mātugāmena na pi mātugāmassa

analyzed: na api mātugāmena rodantiyā vā api ca kho yāni issa tāni pubbe

analyzed: mātugāmena saddhim hasita lapita kīḷitāni tāni anussarati saḥ dukkhasma ati vadāmi

analyzed: mātugāmassape yāni issa tāni pubbe mātugāmena saddhim hasita lapita kīḷitāni

analyzed: tāni anussarati apica kho passati gahapatim vā gahapati puttam vā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi

original: “Puna caparaṃ, brāhmaṇa, idhekacco samaṇo vā…pe… na heva kho mātugāmena…pe… napi
analyzed: punar ca param brāhmaṇaḥ samaṇaḥ vāpe na ha iva kho

analyzed: paṇidhāya brahmacariyam carati iminā aham sīlena vā vatena vā tapena vā brahmacariyena

original: vā devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā’ti. So tadassādeti, taṃ nikāmeti, tena ca vittiṃ

analyzed: āpajjati idam pi kho brāhmaṇa brahmacariyassa khaṇḍam pi chiddam pi sabalam pi kammāsam pi iti

original: Evaṃ lābhādihetukena bhedena ca sattavidhamethunasaṃyogena ca khaṇḍādibhāvo saṅgahitoti veditabbo.
analyzed: evam lābha ādi hetukena bhedena ca sattavidha methuna saṃyogena ca khaṇḍa ādi bhāvaḥ saṅgahitaḥ iti veditabbo

analyzed: sattavidha methuna saṃyoga abhāvena ca aparāya ca kodhaḥ upanāhaḥ makkho paḷāsaḥ issā

analyzed: macchariyam māyā sātheyyam thambho sa ārambhaḥ mānaḥ atimānaḥ madaḥ pamādaḥ iti ādīnam pāpa dhammānam

analyzed: anuppattiyāḥ appiccha tā santuṭṭhi tā sallekha tā ādīnam ca guṇānaṃ uppattiyā saṅgahitaḥ

original: Yāni hi sīlāni lābhādīnampi atthāya abhinnāni, pamādadosena vā bhinnānipi paṭikammakatāni,

original: upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā saṃvattayantīti samādhisaṃvattanikāni ca honti.

original: Tasmā nesaṃ esa ‘akhaṇḍādibhāvo vodāna’nti veditabbo.

original: Taṃ panetaṃ vodānaṃ dvīhākārehi sampajjati sīlavipattiyā ca ādīnavadassanena, sīlasampattiyā
analyzed: tam pana itam vodānam dvīhā ākārehi sampajjati sīla vipattiyā ca ādīnava dassanena sīla sampattiyā

original: ca ānisaṃsadassanena. Tattha “pañcime, bhikkhave, ādīnavā dussīlassa sīlavipattiyā”ti
analyzed: ca ānisaṃsa dassanena tattha pañcime bhikkhave ādīnavāḥ dussīlassa sīla vipattiyā ti

original: evamādisuttanayena sīlavipattiyā ādīnavo daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: evamādi sutta nayena sīla vipattiyāḥ ādīnavaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Apica dussīlo puggalo dussīlyahetu amanāpo hoti devamanussānaṃ, ananusāsanīyo sabrahmacārīnaṃ,

original: dukkhito dussīlyagarahāsu, vippaṭisārī sīlavataṃ pasaṃsāsu, tāya ca pana dussīlyatāya
analyzed: dukkhitaḥ dussīlya garahāsu vippaṭisārī sīlavatam pasaṃsāsu tāya ca pana dussīlya tāya

original: sāṇasāṭako viya dubbaṇṇo hoti. Ye kho panassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanti, tesaṃ dīgharattaṃ
analyzed: sāṇa sāṭakaḥ viya dubbaṇṇaḥ hoti ye kho panassa diṭṭhānugatim āpajjanti tesam dīgharattam

original: apāyadukkhāvahanato dukkhasamphasso. Yesaṃ deyyadhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, tesaṃ namahapphalakaraṇato
analyzed: apāya dukkha āvahanataḥ dukkha samphassaḥ yesam deyya dhammam paṭiggaṇhāti tesam na mahapphala karaṇato

original: appaggho. Anekavassagaṇikagūthakūpo viya dubbisodhano. Chavālātamiva ubhato paribāhiro.
analyzed: appagghaḥ aneka vassa gaṇika gūtha kūpaḥ viya dubbisodhanaḥ chava alātam iva ubhatas paribāhiraḥ

original: Bhikkhubhāvaṃ paṭijānantopi abhikkhuyeva gogaṇaṃ anubandhagadrabho viya. Satatubbiggo
analyzed: bhikkhu bhāvam paṭijānantaḥ api a bhikkhuyā iva go gaṇam anubandha gadrabhaḥ viya

original: sabbaverikapuriso viya. Asaṃvāsāraho matakaḷevaraṃ viya. Sutādiguṇayuttopi sabrahmacārīnaṃ
analyzed: sabba verika purisaḥ viya asaṃvāsa arahaḥ mata kaḷevaram viya suta ādi guṇa yuttaḥ api

original: apūjāraho susānaggi viya brāhmaṇānaṃ. Abhabbo visesādhigame andho viya rūpadassane.
analyzed: a pūjā rahaḥ viya brāhmaṇānam abhabbaḥ visesa adhigame andhaḥ viya rūpa dassane

original: Nirāso saddhamme caṇḍālakumārako viya rajje. Sukhitosmīti maññamānopi dukkhitova
analyzed: nirāsaḥ saddhamme caṇḍāla kumārakaḥ viya rajje sukhitaḥ asmi iti maññamānaḥ api dukkhitaḥ va

original: aggikkhandhapariyāye vuttadukkhabhāgitāya.
analyzed: aggi kkhandha pariyāye vutta dukkha bhāgi tāya

original: Dussīlānañhi pañcakāmaguṇaparibhogavandanamānanādisukhassādagadhitacittānaṃ tappaccayaṃ
analyzed: dussīlānam hi pañca kāmaguṇa paribhoga vandana mānana ādi sukha ssāda gadhita cittānam tad paccayam

analyzed: dukkham dassentaḥ sabba ākārena paccakkha kamma vipākaḥ bhagavā āha

original: “Passatha no tumhe, bhikkhave, amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ
analyzed: passatha no tumhe bhikkhave amum mahantam aggi kkhandhaṃ ādittam sampajjalitam

original: sajotibhūta’nti? Evaṃ, bhanteti. Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ
analyzed: sajoti bhūtanti evam bhante ti tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho varam

original: vā upanipajjeyya vā, yaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ vā brāhmaṇakaññaṃ vā gahapatikaññaṃ vā mudutalunahatthapādaṃ

original: āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vāti. Etadeva, bhante, varaṃ yaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ
analyzed: āliṅgetvā upanisīdeyya vā upanipajjeyya vā ti etat eva bhante varam yam khattiya kaññam

original: vā…pe… upanipajjeyya vā. Dukkhaṃ hetaṃ, bhante, yaṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ…pe…
analyzed: vāpe upanipajjeyya vā dukkham ha itam bhante yam amum mahantam aggi khandhaṃpe

original: upanipajjeyya vāti. Ārocayāmi vo, bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo, bhikkhave, yathā etadeva
analyzed: upanipajjeyya vā ati ārocayāmi vaḥ bhikkhave paṭivedayāmi vaḥ bhikkhave yathā etat eva

original: tassa varaṃ dussīlassa pāpadhammassa asucisaṅkassarasamācārassa paṭicchannakammantassa
analyzed: tassa varam dussīlassa pāpa dhammassa asuci saṅkassara samācārassa paṭicchanna kammantassa

original: assamaṇassa samaṇapaṭiññassa abrahmacārissa brahmacāripaṭiññassa antopūtikassa avassutassa
analyzed: assamaṇassa samaṇa paṭiññassa abrahmacārissa brahmacāri paṭiññassa antopūtikassa avassutassa

original: kasambujātassa yaṃ amuṃ mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ…pe… upanipajjeyya vā. Taṃ kissa hetu?
analyzed: kasambujātassa yam amum mahantam aggi khandhaṃpe upanipajjeyya vā tam kissa hetu

original: Tatonidānaṃ hi so, bhikkhave, maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ, na
analyzed: tatonidānam hi saḥ bhikkhave maraṇam vā nigaccheyya maraṇa mattam vā dukkham na

original: tveva tappaccayā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjeyyā”ti.
analyzed: tu eva tad paccayā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjeyya ati

original: Evaṃ aggikkhandhupamāya itthipaṭibaddhapañcakāmaguṇaparibhogapaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ dassetvā eteneva upāyena –
analyzed: evam aggi kkhandha upamāya itthi paṭibaddha pañca kāmaguṇa paribhoga paccayam dukkham dassetvā etena iva upāyena

original: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso daḷhāya vāḷarajjuyā
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho varam yam balavā purisaḥ daḷhāya vāḷa rajjuyā

original: ubho jaṅghā veṭhetvā ghaṃseyya, sā chaviṃ chindeyya, chaviṃ chetvā cammaṃ chindeyya,
analyzed: ubhaḥ jaṅghāḥ veṭhetvā ghaṃseyya sā chavim chindeyya chavim chetvā cammam chindeyya

analyzed: cammam chetvā maṃsam chindeyya maṃsam chetvā nhārum chindeyya nhārum chetvā aṭṭhim

original: chindeyya, aṭṭhiṃ chetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca tiṭṭheyya, yaṃ vā khattiyamahāsālānaṃ

original: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tiṇhāya sattiyā
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho varam yam balavā purisaḥ tiṇhāya sattiyā

original: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tattena ayopaṭṭena
analyzed: tat kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho varam yam balavā puriso tattena ayopaṭṭena

analyzed: ādittena sampajjalitena sajoti bhūtena kāyam sampaliveṭheyya yam vā khattiya mahā sālānam

original: vā brāhmaṇamahāsālānaṃ vā gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
analyzed: vā brāhmaṇa mahā sālānam vā gahapati mahā sālānam vā saddhādeyyam cīvaram paribhuñjeyyāti ca

original: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso tattena ayosaṅkunā
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho varam yam balavā puriso tat tena ayosaṅkunā

original: ādittena sampajjalitena sajotibhūtena mukhaṃ vivaritvā tattaṃ lohaguḷaṃ ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ
analyzed: ādittena sampad jalitena sajoti bhūtena mukham vivaritvā tat tam loha guḷam ādittam sampad jalitam

original: brāhmaṇa… gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti ca.
analyzed: brāhmaṇa gahapati mahāsālānam vā saddhādeyyam piṇḍapātam paribhuñjeyyāti ca

original: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso sīse vā gahetvā
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho varam yam balavā purisaḥ sīse vā gahetvā

original: khandhe vā gahetvā tattaṃ ayomañcaṃ vā ayopīṭhaṃ vā ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ
analyzed: khandhe vā gahetvā tattam ayaḥ mañcam vā ayaḥ pīṭham vā ādittam sampajjalitam sajoti bhūtam

original: abhinisīdāpeyya vā abhinipajjāpeyya vā, yaṃ vā khattiya… brāhmaṇa… gahapatimahāsālānaṃ
analyzed: abhinisīdāpeyya vā abhinipajjāpeyya vā yam vā khattiya brāhmaṇa gahapati mahā sālānam

analyzed: vā saddhādeyyam mañca pīṭham paribhuñjeyyāti ca

original: “Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho varaṃ yaṃ balavā puriso uddhaṃpādaṃ
analyzed: tam kim maññatha bhikkhave katamam nu kho varam yam balavā puriso uddhaṃpādam

original: adhosiraṃ gahetvā tattāya ayokumbhiyā pakkhipeyya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya,
analyzed: adhosiram gahetvā tattāya ayokumbhiyā pakkhipeyya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajoti bhūtāya

original: so tattha pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamāno sakimpi uddhaṃ gaccheyya, sakimpi adho gaccheyya,
analyzed: saḥ tattha pheṇuddehakam paccamāno sakimpi uddham gaccheyya sakimpi adhas gaccheyya

original: sakimpi tiriyaṃ gaccheyya, yaṃ vā khattiya… brāhmaṇa… gahapatimahāsālānaṃ vā saddhādeyyaṃ
analyzed: sakimpi tiriyam gaccheyya yam vā khattiya brāhmaṇa gahapati mahāsālānam vā saddhādeyyam

original: vihāraṃ paribhuñjeyyā”ti cāti.
analyzed: vihāram paribhuñjeyya ati ca ati

original: Imāhi vāḷarajjutiṇhasattiayopaṭṭaayoguḷaayomañcaayopīṭhaayokumbhīupamāhi abhivādanaañjalikammacīvarapiṇḍapātamañcapīṭhavihāraparibhogapaccayaṃ dukkhaṃ dassesi. Tasmā –
analyzed: imāhi abhivādana añjali kamma cīvara piṇḍapāta mañca pīṭha vihāra paribhoga paccayam dukkham dassesi tasmai

original: Aggikkhandhāliṅganadukkhādhikadukkhakaṭukaphalaṃ;
analyzed: aggi kkhandha āliṅgana dukkha adhika dukkha kaṭuka phalam

original: Avijahato kāmasukhaṃ, sukhaṃ kuto bhinnasīlassa.
analyzed: a vijahataḥ kāma sukham sukham kutas bhinna sīlassa

original: Daḷhavāḷarajjughaṃsanadukkhādhikadukkhabhāgissa.

analyzed: kim sukham a sīlassa

analyzed: satti ppahāra dukkha adhimatta dukkhassa yaṃ hetu

analyzed: cīvara paribhoga sukham kim nāma a saṃyatassa

original: Yena ciraṃ anubhavitabbo, niraye jalitaayopaṭṭasamphasso.
analyzed: yena ciram anubhavitabbaḥ niraye jalita ayopaṭṭa samphassaḥ

original: Madhuropi piṇḍapāto, halāhalavisūpamo asīlassa;
analyzed: madhuraḥ api piṇḍapātaḥ halāhala visu upamaḥ a sīlassa

original: Ādittā gilitabbā, ayoguḷā yena cirarattaṃ.
analyzed: ādittāḥ gilitabbāḥ ayaḥ guḷāḥ yena cira rattam

original: Sukhasammatopi dukkho, asīlino mañcapīṭhaparibhogo;
analyzed: sukha sammataḥ api dukkhaḥ asīlinaḥ mañca pīṭha paribhogo

original: Yaṃ bādhissanti ciraṃ, jalitaayomañcapīṭhāni.
analyzed: yam bādhissanti ciram jalita ayaḥ mañca pīṭhāni

original: Dussīlassa vihāre, saddhādeyyamhi kā nivāsa rati;
analyzed: dussīlassa vihāre saddhādeyyamhi kā

original: Jalitesu nivasitabbaṃ, yena ayokumbhimajjhesu.
analyzed: jalitesu nivasitabbam yena ayaḥ kumbhi majjhesu

original: Saṅkasarasamācāro, kasambujāto avassuto pāpo;
analyzed: saṅkasara samācāraḥ kasambu jātaḥ avassutaḥ pāpaḥ

original: Antopūtīti ca yaṃ, nindanto āha lokagaru.

original: Dhī jīvitaṃ asaññatassa, tassa samaṇajanavesadhārissa;
analyzed: dhī jīvitam asaññatassa tassa samaṇa jana vesa dhārissa

original: Assamaṇassa upahataṃ, khatamattānaṃ vahantassa.
analyzed: assamaṇassa upahatam khata mattānam vahantassa

original: Gūthaṃ viya kuṇapaṃ viya, maṇḍanakāmā vivajjayantīdha;
analyzed: gūtham viya kuṇapam viya maṇḍana kāmāḥ vivajjayanti idha

original: Yaṃ nāma sīlavanto, santo kiṃ jīvitaṃ tassa.

original: Supihitasaggadvāro, apāyamaggaṃ samārūḷho.

original: Dussīlasamo dussī, latāya iti bahuvidhā dosāti.
analyzed: iti bahuvidhāḥ

original: Evamādinā paccavekkhaṇena sīlavipattiyaṃ ādīnavadassanaṃ vuttappakāraviparītato sīlasampattiyā ānisaṃsadassanañca veditabbaṃ. Apica –
analyzed: evamādinā paccavekkhaṇena sīla vipattiyam ādīnava dassanam vutta ppakāra viparītataḥ sīla sampattiyam ānisaṃsa dassanam ca veditabbam apica

original: Tassa pāsādikaṃ hoti, pattacīvaradhāraṇaṃ;
analyzed: tassa pāsādikam hoti patta cīvara dhāraṇam

original: Pabbajjā saphalā tassa, yassa sīlaṃ sunimmalaṃ.
analyzed: pabbajjā saphalā tassa yassa sīlam su nimmalam

analyzed: sabbesam gandha jātānam sampattim abhibhuyyati

analyzed: appakā api katā kārā sīlavante mahapphalā

analyzed: yā manussesu sampatti yā ca devesu sampadā

original: Na sā sampannasīlassa, icchato hoti dullabhā.

analyzed: accanta santā pana yā ayam nibbāna sampadā

analyzed: manaḥ sampanna sīlassa tam eva anudhāvati

original: Sabbasampattimūlamhi, sīlamhi iti paṇḍito;
analyzed: sabba sampatti mūlamhi sīlamhi iti paṇḍitaḥ

analyzed: evam hi vibhāvayataḥ sīla vipattitaḥ ubbijjitvā sīla sampatti ninnam mānasam hoti tasmā

original: sīlaṃ vodāpetabbanti.
analyzed: sīlam vā udāpetabbanti

original: Iti sādhujanapāmojjatthāya kate visuddhimagge
analyzed: iti sādhu jana pāmojjatthāya kate visuddhi magge

original: Sīlaniddeso nāma paṭhamo paricchedo.
analyzed: sīlaniddesaḥ nāma paṭhamaḥ paricchedo

original: 2. Dhutaṅganiddeso
analyzed: dhutaṅga niddeso

original: 22. Idāni yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa vodānaṃ hoti,
analyzed: idāni yehi appiccha tā santuṭṭhi tā ādīhi guṇehi vutta ppakārassa sīlassa vodānam hoti

analyzed: sīlam ca iva su parisuddham bhavissati vatāni ca sampajjissanti iti anavajja sīla bbata guṇa parisuddha sabba samācāraḥ

analyzed: porāṇe ariya vaṃsa ttaye patiṭṭhāya catutthassa bhāvanā ārāma tā saṅkhātassa ariya vaṃsassa

analyzed: adhigama arahaḥ bhavissati tasmai dhutaṅga katham ārabhissāma

original: Bhagavatā hi pariccattalokāmisānaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhānaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃyeva
analyzed: bhagavatā hi pariccatta loka āmisānam kāye ca jīvite ca an apekkhānam anuloma paṭipadam yeva

analyzed: tecīvarikaṅgam piṇḍapātikaṅgam sa padāna cārikaṅgam eka āsanikaṅgam pattapiṇḍikaṅgam

analyzed: khalu pacchābhattikaṅgam āraññikaṅgam rukkhamūlikaṅgam abbhokāsikaṅgam sosānikaṅgam

original: Atthato lakkhaṇādīhi, samādānavidhānato;
analyzed: atthataḥ lakkhaṇa ādīhi samādāna vidhānataḥ

original: Pabhedato bhedato ca, tassa tassānisaṃsato.

original: Kusalattikato ceva, dhutādīnaṃ vibhāgato;

original: Samāsabyāsato cāpi, viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: samāsa byāsataḥ ca api viññātabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

analyzed: tattha atthatas ti tāva rathika susāna saṅkāra kūṭa ādīnam yattha katthaci paṃsūnam

original: upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu tesu paṃsukūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ, atha vā paṃsu
analyzed: upari ṭhita ttā abbhuggata ṭṭhena tesu tesu paṃsu kūlam iva ati paṃsu kūlam atha vā paṃsu

original: viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulatīti paṃsukūlaṃ, kucchitabhāvaṃ gacchatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ
analyzed: viya kucchita bhāvam ulati iti paṃsukūlam kucchita bhāvam gacchati iti vuttam hoti evam

original: laddhanibbacanassa paṃsukūlassa dhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti paṃsukūliko.
analyzed: laddha nibbacanassa paṃsukūlassa dhāraṇam paṃsukūlam tat sīlam assa ati paṃsukūlikaḥ

original: Paṃsukūlikassa aṅgaṃ paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ. Aṅganti kāraṇaṃ vuccati. Tasmā yena samādānena
analyzed: paṃsukūlikassa aṅgam paṃsukūlika aṅgam aṅgam ti kāraṇam vuccati tasmai yena samādānena

original: so paṃsukūliko hoti, tassetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: saḥ paṃsukūlikaḥ hoti tassa itam adhivacanam ti veditabbam

original: Eteneva nayena saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhātaṃ ticīvaraṃ sīlamassāti tecīvariko. Tecīvarikassa aṅgaṃ tecīvarikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: etena iva nayena saṅghāṭi uttarāsaṅga antaravāsaka saṅkhātam ti cīvaram sīlam assa ati tecīvarikaḥ tecīvarikassa aṅgam tecīvarika aṅgam

original: Bhikkhāsaṅkhātānaṃ pana āmisapiṇḍānaṃ pātoti piṇḍapāto, parehi dinnānaṃ piṇḍānaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhā saṅkhātānam pana āmisa piṇḍānam pāto ti piṇḍapāto parehi dinnānam piṇḍānam

original: patte nipatananti vuttaṃ hoti. Taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ uñchati taṃ taṃ kulaṃ upasaṅkamanto
analyzed: patte nipatananti vuttam hoti tam piṇḍapātam uñchati tam tam kulam upasaṅkamantaḥ

original: gavesatīti piṇḍapātiko. Piṇḍāya vā patituṃ vatametassāti piṇḍapātī, patitunti carituṃ,
analyzed: gavesati iti piṇḍapātikaḥ piṇḍāya vā patitum vatam etassa ati piṇḍapātī patitunti caritum

original: piṇḍapātī eva piṇḍapātiko. Piṇḍapātikassa aṅgaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: piṇḍapātī eva piṇḍapātikaḥ piṇḍapātikassa aṅgam piṇḍapātika aṅgam

original: Dānaṃ vuccati avakhaṇḍanaṃ, apetaṃ dānatoti apadānaṃ, anavakhaṇḍananti attho. Saha
analyzed: dānam vuccati avakhaṇḍanam apetam dānato ti apadānam an avakhaṇḍanam ti attho saha

original: apadānena sapadānaṃ, avakhaṇḍanarahitaṃ anugharanti vuttaṃ hoti. Sapadānaṃ carituṃ
analyzed: apadānena sa padānam avakhaṇḍana rahitam anugharanti vuttam hoti sa padānam caritum

original: idamassa sīlanti sapadānacārī, sapadānacārī eva sapadānacāriko. Tassa aṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: idam assa sīlanti sa padāna cārī sa padāna cārī eva sa padāna cārikaḥ tassa aṅgam sa padāna cārika ṅgam

original: Ekāsane bhojanaṃ ekāsanaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti ekāsaniko. Tassa aṅgaṃ ekāsanikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: eka āsane bhojanam eka āsanam tam sīlam assa ati ekāsanikaḥ tassa aṅgam ekāsanika aṅgam

original: Dutiyabhājanassa paṭikkhittattā kevalaṃ ekasmiṃyeva patte piṇḍo pattapiṇḍo. Idāni
analyzed: dutiya bhājanassa paṭikkhitta ttā kevalam ekasmin yeva patte piṇḍaḥ patta piṇḍaḥ idāni

original: pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṃ katvā pattapiṇḍo sīlamassāti pattapiṇḍiko. Tassa
analyzed: patta piṇḍa gahaṇe patta piṇḍa saññam katvā patta piṇḍo sīlam assa ati patta piṇḍiko tassa

original: aṅgaṃ pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: aṅgam patta piṇḍika aṅgam

original: Khalūti paṭisedhanatthe nipāto. Pavāritena satā pacchā laddhaṃ bhattaṃ pacchābhattaṃ
analyzed: khalu iti paṭisedhana atthe nipātaḥ pavāritena satā pacchā laddham bhattam pacchābhattam

original: nāma, tassa pacchābhattassa bhojanaṃ pacchābhattabhojanaṃ, tasmiṃ pacchābhattabhojane
analyzed: nāma tassa pacchābhattassa bhojanam pacchābhatta bhojanam tasmim pacchābhatta bhojane

original: pacchābhattasaññaṃ katvā pacchābhattaṃ sīlamassāti pacchābhattiko. Na pacchābhattiko
analyzed: pacchābhatta saññam katvā pacchābhattam sīlam assa ati pacchābhattikaḥ na pacchābhattikaḥ

original: khalupacchābhattiko. Samādānavasena paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: khalu pacchābhattiko samādāna vasena paṭikkhitta atiritta bhojanassa itam nāmam aṭṭhakathāyam

original: pana vuttaṃ khalūti eko sakuṇo. So mukhena phalaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ patite puna aññaṃ
analyzed: pana vuttam khalu iti ekaḥ sakuṇo saḥ mukhena phalam gahetvā tasmin patite puna aññam

original: na khādati. Tādiso ayanti khalupacchābhattiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: na khādati tādisaḥ tassa aṅgam khalu pacchābhattika aṅgam

original: Araññe nivāso sīlamassāti āraññiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ āraññikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: araññe nivāsaḥ sīlam assa ati āraññiko tassa aṅgam āraññika ṅgam

original: Rukkhamūle nivāso rukkhamūlaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti rukkhamūliko. Rukkhamūlikassa aṅgaṃ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ. Abbhokāsikasosānikaṅgesupi eseva nayo.
analyzed: rukkha mūle nivāsaḥ rukkha mūlam tam sīlam assa ati rukkhamūlikaḥ rukkhamūlikassa aṅgam rukkhamūlika aṅgam abbhokāsika sosānika ṅgesu pi esa eva nayaḥ

original: Yadeva santhataṃ yathāsanthataṃ, idaṃ tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātīti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhasenāsanassetaṃ
analyzed: yat eva santhatam yathā santhatam idam tuyham pāpuṇāti iti evam paṭhamam uddiṭṭha senāsanassa etam

original: adhivacanaṃ. Tasmiṃ yathāsanthate viharituṃ sīlamassāti yathāsanthatiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ
analyzed: adhivacanam tasmin yathā santhate viharitum sīlam assa ati yathāsanthatikaḥ tassa aṅgam

original: yathāsanthatikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: yathā santhati kaṅgam

original: Sayanaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya viharituṃ sīlamassāti nesajjiko. Tassa aṅgaṃ nesajjikaṅgaṃ.
analyzed: sayanam paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya viharitum sīlam assa ati nesajjiko tassa aṅgam nesajjika aṅgam

original: Sabbāneva panetāni tena tena samādānena dhutakilesattā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni,
analyzed: sabbāni eva pana itāni tena tena samādānena dhuta kilesa ttā dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgāni

original: kilesadhunanato vā dhutanti laddhavohāraṃ ñāṇaṃ aṅgaṃ etesanti dhutaṅgāni. Atha vā
analyzed: kilesa dhunanataḥ vā laddha vohāram ñāṇam aṅgam dhutaṅgāni atha vā

original: dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkhaniddhunanato aṅgāni ca paṭipattiyātipi dhutaṅgāni. Evaṃ
analyzed: dhutāni ca tāni paṭipakkha niddhunanataḥ aṅgāni ca dhuta aṅgāni evam

original: tāvettha atthato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: tau ettha atthataḥ viññātabbaḥ vinicchayo

original: Sabbāneva panetāni samādānacetanālakkhaṇāni. Vuttampi cetaṃ “yo samādiyati, so puggalo.
analyzed: sabbān eva pana etāni samādāna cetanā lakkhaṇāni vuttam pi ca itam yaḥ samādiyati saḥ puggalo

original: Yena samādiyati, cittacetasikā ete dhammā. Yā samādānacetanā, taṃ dhutaṅgaṃ. Yaṃ
analyzed: yena samādiyati citta cetasikāḥ ete dhammāḥ yā samādāna cetanā tam dhutaṅgam yam

original: paṭikkhipati, taṃ vatthū”ti. Sabbāneva ca loluppaviddhaṃsanarasāni, nilloluppabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāni
analyzed: paṭikkhipati tam vatthu iti sabbān eva ca loluppa viddhaṃsana rasāni nilloluppa bhāva paccupaṭṭhānāni

original: appicchatādiariyadhammapadaṭṭhānāni. Evamettha lakkhaṇādīhi veditabbo vinicchayo.
analyzed: appiccha tā ādi ariya dhamma padaṭṭhānāni evam ettha lakkhaṇa ādīhi veditabbaḥ vinicchayaḥ

original: Samādānavidhānatotiādīsu pana pañcasu sabbāneva dhutaṅgāni dharamāne bhagavati bhagavatova
analyzed: samādāna vidhānataḥ tiādīsu pana pañcasu sabbān eva dhutaṅgāni dharamāne bhagavati bhagavataḥ uva

original: santike samādātabbāni. Parinibbute mahāsāvakassa santike. Tasmiṃ asati khīṇāsavassa,
analyzed: santike samādātabbāni parinibbute mahāsāvakassa santike tasmin asati khīṇāsavassa

original: anāgāmissa, sakadāgāmissa, sotāpannassa, tipiṭakassa, dvipiṭakassa, ekapiṭakassa,
analyzed: anāgāmissa sakadāgāmissa sotāpannassa ti piṭakassa dvi piṭakassa eka piṭakassa

original: ekasaṅgītikassa, aṭṭhakathācariyassa. Tasmiṃ asati dhutaṅgadharassa, tasmimpi asati
analyzed: eka saṅgītikassa aṭṭhakathā cariyassa tasmin asati dhutaṅga dharassa tasmin pi asati

original: cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā sammāsambuddhassa santike vadantena
analyzed: cetiya ṅgaṇam sammajjitvā ukkuṭikam nisīditvā sammāsambuddhassa santike vadantena

original: viya samādātabbāni, apica sayampi samādātuṃ vaṭṭati eva. Ettha ca cetiyapabbate dve
analyzed: viya samādātabbāni apica sayam pi samādātum vaṭṭati eva ettha ca cetiyapabbate dve

original: bhātikattherānaṃ jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthu kathetabbaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva sādhāraṇakathā.
analyzed: bhātika therānam jeṭṭhaka bhātu dhutaṅga ppiccha tāya vatthu kathetabbam ayam tāva sādhāraṇa kathā

original: 1. Paṃsukūlikaṅgakathā
24. Idāni ekekassa samādānavidhānappabhedabhedānisaṃse vaṇṇayissāma. Paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ
analyzed: idāni ekekassa samādāna vidhāna ppabheda bheda anisaṃse vaṇṇayissāma paṃsukūlikaṅgam

original: vacanesu aññatarena samādinnaṃ hoti. Idaṃ tāvettha samādānaṃ.
analyzed: vacanesu aññatarena samādinnam hoti idam tāva ettha samādānam

original: Evaṃ samādinnadhutaṅgena pana tena sosānikaṃ, pāpaṇikaṃ, rathiyacoḷaṃ, saṅkāracoḷaṃ,
analyzed: evam samādinna dhutaṅgena pana tena sosānikam pāpaṇikam rathiya coḷam saṅkāra coḷam

original: sotthiyaṃ, nhānacoḷaṃ, titthacoḷaṃ, gatapaccāgataṃ, aggiḍaḍḍhaṃ, gokhāyitaṃ, upacikākhāyitaṃ,
analyzed: sotthiyam nhāna coḷam tittha coḷam gata paccāgatam aggiḍaḍḍham go khāyitam upacikā khāyitam

original: undūrakhāyitaṃ, antacchinnaṃ, dasācchinnaṃ, dhajāhaṭaṃ, thūpacīvaraṃ, samaṇacīvaraṃ,
analyzed: undūra khāyitam anta chinnam dasā chinnam dhajāhaṭam thūpa cīvaram samaṇa cīvaram

original: ābhisekikaṃ, iddhimayaṃ, panthikaṃ, vātāhaṭaṃ, devadattiyaṃ, sāmuddiyantietesu aññataraṃ

original: porāṇaṃ gahapaticīvaraṃ apanetvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
analyzed: porāṇam gahapati cīvaram apanetvā paribhuñjitabbam

original: Tattha sosānikanti susāne patitakaṃ. Pāpaṇikanti āpaṇadvāre patitakaṃ. Rathiyacoḷanti
analyzed: tattha sosānikanti susāne patitakam pāpaṇikanti āpaṇa dvāre patitakam rathiya coḷanti

original: puññatthikehi vātapānantarena rathikāya chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ. Saṅkāracoḷanti saṅkāraṭṭhāne
analyzed: puññatthikehi vātapāna antarena rathikāya chaḍḍita coḷakam saṅkāra coḷanti saṅkāra ṭṭhāne

original: chaḍḍitacoḷakaṃ. Sotthiyanti gabbhamalaṃ puñchitvā chaḍḍitavatthaṃ. Tissāmaccamātā
analyzed: chaḍḍita coḷakam gabbha malam puñchitvā chaḍḍita vattham tissā macca mātā

original: kira satagghanakena vatthena gabbhamalaṃ puñchāpetvā paṃsukūlikā gaṇhissantīti tālaveḷimagge
analyzed: kira satagghanakena vatthena gabbha malam puñchāpetvā paṃsukūlikāḥ gaṇhissanti iti tālaveḷi magge

original: chaḍḍāpesi. Bhikkhū jiṇṇakaṭṭhānatthameva gaṇhanti. Nhānacoḷanti yaṃ bhūtavejjehi
analyzed: chaḍḍāpesi bhikkhū jiṇṇaka ṭṭhāna attham eva gaṇhanti nhāna coḷanti yam bhūtavejjehi

original: sasīsaṃ nhāpitā kāḷakaṇṇicoḷanti chaḍḍetvā gacchanti.
analyzed: sa sīsam nhāpitā kāḷa kaṇṇi coḷanti chaḍḍetvā gacchanti

original: Titthacoḷanti nhānatitthe chaḍḍitapilotikā. Gatapaccāgatanti yaṃ manussā susānaṃ
analyzed: tittha coḷanti nhāna titthe chaḍḍita pilotikā gata paccāgatanti yam manussā susānam

original: gantvā paccāgatā nhatvā chaḍḍenti. Aggiḍaḍḍhanti agginā ḍaḍḍhappadesaṃ. Tañhi manussā
analyzed: gantvā paccāgatāḥ nhatvā chaḍḍenti aggi ḍaḍḍhanti agginā ḍaḍḍha ppadesam tat hi manussā

original: chaḍḍenti. Gokhāyitādīni pākaṭāneva. Tādisānipi hi manussā chaḍḍenti. Dhajāhaṭanti
analyzed: chaḍḍenti go khāyita ādīni pākaṭāni eva tādisāni pi hi manussā chaḍḍenti

original: nāvaṃ ārohantā dhajaṃ bandhitvā ārūhanti. Taṃ tesaṃ dassanātikkame gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: nāvam ārohantā dhajam bandhitvā ārūhanti tam tesam dassana atikkame gahetum vaṭṭati

original: Yampi yuddhabhūmiyaṃ dhajaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ dvinnampi senānaṃ gatakāle gahetuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: yam pi dhajam bandhitvā ṭhapitam tam dvinnam pi gata kāle gahetum vaṭṭati

original: Thūpacīvaranti vammikaṃ parikkhipitvā balikammaṃ kataṃ. Samaṇacīvaranti bhikkhusantakaṃ.
analyzed: thūpa cīvaranti vammikam parikkhipitvā bali kammam katam samaṇa cīvaranti bhikkhu santakam

original: Ābhisekikanti rañño abhisekaṭṭhāne chaḍḍitacīvaraṃ. Iddhimayanti ehibhikkhucīvaraṃ.
analyzed: ābhisekikanti raññaḥ abhiseka ṭṭhāne chaḍḍita cīvaram iddhi mayanti ehibhikkhu cīvaram

original: Panthikanti antarāmagge patitakaṃ. Yaṃ pana sāmikānaṃ satisammosena patitaṃ, taṃ
analyzed: panthikam ti antara āmagge patitakam yam pana sāmikānam sati sammosena patitam tam

original: thokaṃ rakkhitvā gahetabbaṃ. Vātāhaṭanti vātena paharitvā dūre pātitaṃ, taṃ pana
analyzed: thokam rakkhitvā gahetabbam vāta āhaṭanti vātena paharitvā dūre pātitam tam pana

original: sāmike apassantena gahetuṃ vaṭṭati. Devadattiyanti anuruddhattherassa viya devatāhi
analyzed: sāmike a passantena gahetum vaṭṭati anuruddha ttherassa viya devatāhi

original: dinnakaṃ. Sāmuddiyanti samuddavīcīhi thale ussāritaṃ.
analyzed: dinnakam samudda vīcīhi thale ussāritam

original: Yaṃ pana saṅghassa demāti dinnaṃ, coḷakabhikkhāya vā caramānehi laddhaṃ, na taṃ paṃsukūlaṃ.
analyzed: yam pana saṅghassa dema ati dinnam coḷaka bhikkhāya vā caramānehi laddham na tam paṃsukūlam

original: Bhikkhudattiyepi yaṃ vassaggena gāhetvā vā dīyati, senāsanacīvaraṃ vā hoti, na taṃ
analyzed: bhikkhu dattiye pi yam vassaggena gāhetvā vā dīyati senāsana cīvaram vā hoti na tam

original: paṃsukūlaṃ. No gāhāpetvā dinnameva paṃsukūlaṃ. Tatrapi yaṃ dāyakehi bhikkhussa pādamūle
analyzed: paṃsukūlam no gāhāpetvā dinnam eva paṃsukūlam yam dāyakehi bhikkhussa pāda mūle

original: nikkhittaṃ, tena pana bhikkhunā paṃsukūlikassa hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ, taṃ ekatosuddhikaṃ
analyzed: nikkhittam tena pana bhikkhunā paṃsukūlikassa hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnam tam ekatosuddhikam

original: nāma. Yaṃ bhikkhuno hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnaṃ, tena pana pādamūle ṭhapitaṃ, tampi ekatosuddhikaṃ.
analyzed: nāma yam bhikkhuno hatthe ṭhapetvā dinnam tena pana pāda mūle ṭhapitam tam pi ekatosuddhikam

original: Yaṃ bhikkhunopi pādamūle ṭhapitaṃ, tenāpi tatheva dinnaṃ, taṃ ubhatosuddhikaṃ. Yaṃ
analyzed: yam bhikkhunā api pāda mūle ṭhapitam tena api tathā iva dinnam tam ubhatosuddhikam yam

original: hatthe ṭhapetvā laddhaṃ, hattheyeva ṭhapitaṃ, taṃ anukkaṭṭhacīvaraṃ nāma. Iti imaṃ
analyzed: hatthe ṭhapetvā laddham hattheya iva ṭhapitam tam anukkaṭṭhacīvaram nāma iti imam

original: paṃsukūlabhedaṃ ñatvā paṃsukūlikena cīvaraṃ paribhuñjitabbanti idamettha vidhānaṃ.
analyzed: paṃsukūla bhedam ñatvā paṃsukūlikena cīvaram paribhuñjitabbanti idam ettha vidhānaṃ

original: Ayaṃ pana pabhedo, tayo paṃsukūlikā ukkaṭṭho majjhimo mudūti. Tattha sosānikaṃyeva
analyzed: ayam pana pabhedo tayo paṃsukūlikāḥ ukkaṭṭhaḥ majjhimaḥ tattha

original: gaṇhanto ukkaṭṭho hoti. Pabbajitā gaṇhissantīti ṭhapitakaṃ gaṇhanto majjhimo. Pādamūle
analyzed: gaṇhantaḥ ukkaṭṭhaḥ hoti pabbajitāḥ gaṇhissanti iti ṭhapitakam gaṇhantaḥ majjhimaḥ pāda mūle

original: ṭhapetvā dinnakaṃ gaṇhanto mudūti.

original: imāni tīṇi sīsaṅgāni, āraññikaṅgaṃ, paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ, tecīvarikaṅgaṃ, nesajjikaṅgaṃ,
analyzed: imāni tīṇi sīsaṅgāni āraññika aṅgam paṃsukūlika aṅgam tecīvarika aṅgam nesajjika aṅgam

original: sosānikaṅganti imāni pañca asambhinnaṅgāni cāti aṭṭheva honti.
analyzed: imāni pañca asambhinnaṅgāni ca ati aṭṭha iva honti

original: Puna dve cīvarapaṭisaṃyuttāni, pañca piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttāni, pañca senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni,

original: ekaṃ vīriyapaṭisaṃyuttanti evaṃ cattārova honti. Tattha nesajjikaṅgaṃ vīriyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ. Itarāni pākaṭāneva.
analyzed: ekam vīriya paṭisaṃyuttanti evam cattāro va honti tattha nesajjika aṅgam vīriya paṭisaṃyuttam itarāni pākaṭāni eva

original: Puna sabbāneva nissayavasena dve honti paccayanissitāni dvādasa, vīriyanissitaṃ ekanti.
analyzed: puna sabbān eva nissaya vasena dve honti paccaya nissitāni dvādasa vīriya nissitam ekam ti

original: Sevitabbāsevitabbavasenapi dveyeva honti. Yassa hi dhutaṅgaṃ sevantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: sevitabba a sevitabba vasena api honti yassa hi dhutaṅgam sevantassa kammaṭṭhānam

original: vaḍḍhati, tena sevitabbāni. Yassa sevato hāyati, tena na sevitabbāni. Yassa pana
analyzed: vaḍḍhati tena sevitabbāni yassa sevataḥ hāyati tena na sevitabbāni yassa pana

original: sevatopi asevatopi vaḍḍhateva, na hāyati, tenāpi pacchimaṃ janataṃ anukampantena
analyzed: sevataḥ upi a sevataḥ upi vaḍḍhatā iva na hāyati tena api pacchimam janatam anukampantena

original: sevitabbāni. Yassāpi sevatopi asevatopi na vaḍḍhati, tenāpi sevitabbāniyeva āyatiṃ vāsanatthāyāti.
analyzed: sevitabbāni yassa api sevataḥ pi a sevataḥ pi na vaḍḍhati tena api sevitabbāni yeva āyatim vāsana tthāya ati

original: Evaṃ sevitabbāsevitabbavasena duvidhānipi sabbāneva cetanāvasena ekavidhāni honti.
analyzed: evam sevitabba asevitabba vasena duvidhāni api sabbāneva cetanā vasena ekavidhāni honti

original: Ekameva hi dhutaṅgaṃ samādānacetanāti. Aṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “yā cetanā, taṃ dhutaṅganti vadantī”ti.
analyzed: ekam eva hi dhutaṅgam samādāna cetanā ati aṭṭhakathāyam pi vuttam yā cetanā tam dhutaṅgam iti vadanti iti

original: Byāsato pana bhikkhūnaṃ terasa, bhikkhunīnaṃ aṭṭha, sāmaṇerānaṃ dvādasa, sikkhamānasāmaṇerīnaṃ
analyzed: byāsataḥ pana bhikkhūnam terasa bhikkhunīnam aṭṭha sāmaṇerānam dvādasa sikkhamāna sāmaṇerīnam

original: satta, upāsakaupāsikānaṃ dveti dvācattālīsa honti. Sace pana abbhokāse āraññikaṅgasampannaṃ

original: susānaṃ hoti, ekopi bhikkhu ekappahārena sabbadhutaṅgāni paribhuñjituṃ sakkoti. Bhikkhunīnaṃ

analyzed: rukkhamūlikaṅgam sosānikaṅgam ti imāni tīṇi dupparihārāni bhikkhuniyā hi dutiyikam

original: vinā vasituṃ na vaṭṭati. Evarūpe ca ṭhāne samānacchandā dutiyikā dullabhā. Sacepi
analyzed: vinā vasitum na vaṭṭati evarūpe ca ṭhāne samāna chandā dutiyikā dullabhā sace pi

original: labheyya saṃsaṭṭhavihārato na mucceyya. Evaṃ sati yassatthāya dhutaṅgaṃ seveyya,
analyzed: labheyya saṃsaṭṭha vihārataḥ na mucceyya evam sati yaḥ satthāya dhutaṅgam seveyya

original: svevassā attho na sampajjeyya. Evaṃ paribhuñjituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pañca hāpetvā bhikkhunīnaṃ

original: aṭṭheva hontīti veditabbāni. Yathāvuttesu pana ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṃ sesāni dvādasa
analyzed: aṭṭha iva honti iti veditabbāni yathā vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā tecīvarika ṅgam sesāni dvādasa

analyzed: sāmaṇerānam satta sikkhamāna sāmaṇerīnam veditabbāni upāsaka aupāsikānam pana eka āsanika aṅgam

original: pattapiṇḍikaṅganti imāni dve patirūpāni ceva sakkā ca paribhuñjitunti dve dhutaṅgānīti

original: evaṃ byāsato dvecattālīsa hontīti ayaṃ samāsabyāsato vaṇṇanā.
analyzed: evam byāsataḥ dvecattālīsa honti iti ayam samāsa byāsataḥ vaṇṇanā

original: Ettāvatā ca “sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño”ti imissā gāthāya sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena
analyzed: ettāvatā ca sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sa pañño ti imissā gāthāya sīla samādhi paññā mukhena

original: desite visuddhimagge yehi appicchatāsantuṭṭhitādīhi guṇehi vuttappakārassa sīlassa
analyzed: desite visuddhi magge yehi appiccha tā santuṭṭhi tā ādīhi guṇehi vutta ppakārassa sīlassa

original: vodānaṃ hoti, tesaṃ sampādanatthaṃ samādātabbadhutaṅgakathā bhāsitā hoti.

original: 3. Kammaṭṭhānaggahaṇaniddeso
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna ggahaṇa niddeso

original: 38. Idāni yasmā evaṃ dhutaṅgapariharaṇasampāditehi appicchatādīhi guṇehi pariyodāte

original: idaṃ pañhākammaṃ hoti.
analyzed: idam pañhākammam hoti

original: Ko samādhi? Kenaṭṭhena samādhi? Kānassa lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni? Katividho
analyzed: kaḥ samādhi kenaṭṭhena samādhi lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhāna padaṭṭhānāni katividhaḥ

original: samādhi? Ko cassa saṃkileso? Kiṃ vodānaṃ? Kathaṃ bhāvetabbo? Samādhibhāvanāya ko ānisaṃsoti?
analyzed: samādhi kaḥ cassa saṃkileso kim vodānam katham bhāvetabbo samādhi bhāvanāya kaḥ ānisaṃso ti

original: Tatridaṃ vissajjanaṃ. Ko samādhīti samādhi bahuvidho nānappakārako. Taṃ sabbaṃ vibhāvayituṃ
analyzed: tatra idam vissajjanam kaḥ samādhi iti samādhi bahuvidhaḥ nānā pakārako tam sabbam vibhāvayitum

analyzed: tasmai idha adhippetam eva sandhāya vadāma kusala citta ekagga tā samādhi

original: Kenaṭṭhena samādhīti samādhānaṭṭhena samādhi. Kimidaṃ samādhānaṃ nāma? Ekārammaṇe
analyzed: kenaṭṭhena samādhi iti samādhāna aṭṭhena samādhi kim idam samādhānam nāma eka ārammaṇe

original: cittacetasikānaṃ samaṃ sammā ca ādhānaṃ, ṭhapananti vuttaṃ hoti. Tasmā yassa dhammassānubhāvena
analyzed: citta cetasikānam samam sammā ca ādhānam ṭhapananti vuttam hoti tasmai yassa dhammassa anubhāvena

original: ekārammaṇe cittacetasikā samaṃ sammā ca avikkhipamānā avippakiṇṇā ca hutvā tiṭṭhanti,

original: idaṃ samādhānanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: idam samādhānam ti veditabbam

original: vacanato pana sukhamassa padaṭṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: vacanato pana sukham assa padaṭṭhānam

original: 39. Katividho samādhīti avikkhepalakkhaṇena tāva ekavidho. Upacāraappanāvasena duvidho,

original: tathā lokiyalokuttaravasena sappītikanippītikavasena sukhasahagataupekkhāsahagatavasena
analyzed: tathā lokiya lokuttara vasena sappītika nippītika vasena sukha sahagata aupekkhā sahagata vasena

original: ca. Tividho hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena, tathā savitakkasavicārādivasena pītisahagatādivasena

original: parittamahaggatappamāṇavasena ca. Catubbidho dukkhāpaṭipadādandhābhiññādivasena,

analyzed: tathā paritta paritta ārammaṇa ādi vasena catujha anaṅga vasena hāna bhāgiya ādi vasena kāmāvacara ādi vasena

original: adhipativasena ca. Pañcavidho pañcakanaye pañcajhānaṅgavasenāti.
analyzed: adhipati vasena ca pañcavidhaḥ pañcaka naye

original: Samādhiekakadukavaṇṇanā
Tattha ekavidhakoṭṭhāso uttānatthoyeva. Duvidhakoṭṭhāse channaṃ anussatiṭṭhānānaṃ
analyzed: tattha ekavidha koṭṭhāso uttāna tthaḥ yeva duvidha koṭṭhāse channam anussati ṭhānānam

original: vasena laddhacittekaggatā, yā ca appanāsamādhīnaṃ pubbabhāge ekaggatā, ayaṃ upacārasamādhi.

original: “Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṃ paṭhamassa jhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti

original: ādivacanato pana yā parikammānantarā ekaggatā, ayaṃ appanāsamādhīti evaṃ upacārappanāvasena duvidho.
analyzed: ādi vacanataḥ pana yā parikamma anantarā ekagga tā ayam appanā samādhi iti evam upacāra ppanā vasena duvidhaḥ

original: Dutiyaduke tīsu bhūmīsu kusalacittekaggatā lokiyo samādhi. Ariyamaggasampayuttā ekaggatā lokuttaro samādhīti evaṃ lokiyalokuttaravasena duvidho.
analyzed: dutiya duke tīsu bhūmīsu kusala citta ekagga tā lokiyaḥ samādhi ariya magga sampayuttā ekagga tā lokuttaro samādhi iti evam lokiya lokuttara vasena duvidhaḥ

original: Tatiyaduke catukkanaye dvīsu pañcakanaye tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā sappītiko samādhi.
analyzed: tatiya duke catukka naye dvīsu pañcaka naye tīsu jhānesu ekagga tā sappītikaḥ samādhi

original: Avasesesu dvīsu jhānesu ekaggatā nippītiko samādhi. Upacārasamādhi pana siyā sappītiko,
analyzed: avasesesu dvīsu jhānesu ekagga tā nippītiko samādhi upacāra samādhi pana siyā sappītiko

original: siyā nippītikoti evaṃ sappītikanippītikavasena duvidho.
analyzed: siyā nippītiko ti evam sappītika nippītika vasena duvidhaḥ

original: Catutthaduke catukkanaye tīsu pañcakanaye catūsu jhānesu ekaggatā sukhasahagato samādhi.
analyzed: catuttha duke catukka naye tīsu pañcaka naye catūsu jhānesu ekagga tā sukha sahagataḥ samādhi

original: Avasesasmiṃ upekkhāsahagato samādhi. Upacārasamādhi pana siyā sukhasahagato, siyā

original: upekkhāsahagatoti evaṃ sukhasahagataupekkhāsahagatavasena duvidho.

original: Samādhitikavaṇṇanā
analyzed: samādhitika vaṇṇanā

original: Tikesu paṭhamattike paṭiladdhamatto hīno, nātisubhāvito majjhimo, subhāvito vasippatto paṇītoti evaṃ hīnamajjhimapaṇītavasena tividho.

original: Dutiyattike paṭhamajjhānasamādhi saddhiṃ upacārasamādhinā savitakkasavicāro. Pañcakanaye

original: dutiyajjhānasamādhi avitakkavicāramatto. Yo hi vitakkamatteyeva ādīnavaṃ disvā vicāre
analyzed: dutiya jhāna samādhi a vitakka vicāra mattaḥ yaḥ hi ādīnavam disvā vicāre

original: adisvā kevalaṃ vitakkappahānamattaṃ ākaṅkhamāno paṭhamajjhānaṃ atikkamati, so avitakkavicāramattaṃ

original: samādhiṃ paṭilabhati. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Catukkanaye pana dutiyādīsu pañcakanaye

original: tatiyādīsu tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā avitakkāvicāro samādhīti evaṃ savitakkasavicārādivasena tividho.

original: Tatiyattike catukkanaye ādito dvīsu pañcakanaye ca tīsu jhānesu ekaggatā pītisahagato
analyzed: tatiya ttike catukka naye āditaḥ dvīsu pañcaka naye ca tīsu jhānesu ekagga tā pīti sahagataḥ

original: samādhi. Tesveva tatiye ca catutthe ca jhāne ekaggatā sukhasahagato samādhi. Avasāne

analyzed: catuttha ttike upacāra bhūmiyam ekagga tā parittaḥ samādhi rūpāvacara arūpāvacara kusale

original: parittamahaggatappamāṇavasena tividho.
analyzed: paritta mahaggata ppamāṇa vasena tividhaḥ

original: Samādhicatukkavaṇṇanā
Catukkesu paṭhamacatukke atthi samādhi dukkhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño, atthi dukkhāpaṭipado khippābhiñño, atthi sukhāpaṭipado dandhābhiñño, atthi sukhāpaṭipado khippābhiññoti.

original: Tattha paṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāraṃ uppajjati,
analyzed: tattha paṭhama samannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāram uppajjati

original: tāva pavattā samādhibhāvanā paṭipadāti vuccati. Upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā,
analyzed: tāva pavattā samādhi bhāvanā paṭipadā iti vuccati upacārato pana paṭṭhāya yāva appanā

analyzed: tāva pavattā paññā abhiññā ti vuccati sā pana isā paṭipadā ekaccassa dukkhā hoti nīvaraṇa ādi paccanīka dhamma samudācāra gahaṇa tāya

original: kicchā asukhāsevanāti attho. Ekaccassa tadabhāvena sukhā. Abhiññāpi ekaccassa dandhā
analyzed: kicchā asukha āsevanā ti attho ekaccassa tad abhāvena sukhā abhiññā api ekaccassa dandhā

original: hoti mandā asīghappavatti. Ekaccassa khippā amandā sīghappavatti.
analyzed: hoti mandā a sīgha ppavatti ekaccassa khippā amandā sīgha ppavatti

analyzed: ca dandhā abhiññā hoti an abhibhūtassa khippā yaḥ ca samathe a kata adhikāro tassa

original: 46. Kiṃ caritassa puggalassa kiṃ sappāyanti ettha pana senāsanaṃ tāva rāgacaritassa
analyzed: kim caritassa puggalassa kim ettha pana senāsanam tāva rāga caritassa

original: adhotavedikaṃ bhūmaṭṭhakaṃ akatapabbhārakaṃ tiṇakuṭikaṃ paṇṇasālādīnaṃ aññataraṃ

original: rajokiṇṇaṃ jatukābharitaṃ oluggaviluggaṃ atiuccaṃ vā atinīcaṃ vā ujjaṅgalaṃ sāsaṅkaṃ
analyzed: rajaḥ kiṇṇam jatukā bharitam olugga viluggam ati uccam vā ati nīcam vā ujjaṅgalam sa āsaṅkam

original: asucivisamamaggaṃ, yattha mañcapīṭhampi maṅkuṇabharitaṃ durūpaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ, yaṃ olokentasseva
analyzed: asuci visama maggam mañca pīṭham pi maṅkuṇa bharitam durūpam dubbaṇṇam yam olokentassa iva

original: jigucchā uppajjati, tādisaṃ sappāyaṃ. Nivāsanapārupanaṃ antacchinnaṃ olambavilambasuttakākiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: jigucchā uppajjati tādisam sappāyam nivāsana pārupanam anta chinnam olamba vilamba sutta kākiṇṇam

original: jālapūvasadisaṃ sāṇi viya kharasamphassaṃ kiliṭṭhaṃ bhārikaṃ kicchapariharaṇaṃ sappāyaṃ.
analyzed: jāla pūva sadisam sāṇi viya khara samphassam kiliṭṭham bhārikam kiccha pariharaṇam sappāyam

original: Pattopi dubbaṇṇo mattikāpatto vā āṇigaṇṭhikāhato ayopatto vā garuko dussaṇṭhāno sīsakapālamiva
analyzed: pattaḥ api dubbaṇṇaḥ mattikā pattaḥ vā āṇigaṇṭhikā hataḥ ayaḥ pattaḥ vā garukaḥ dussaṇṭhānaḥ sīsa kapālam iva

original: jeguccho vaṭṭati. Bhikkhācāramaggopi amanāpo anāsannagāmo visamo vaṭṭati. Bhikkhācāragāmopi
analyzed: jegucchaḥ vaṭṭati bhikkhācāra maggaḥ api amanāpaḥ anāsanna gāmaḥ visamaḥ vaṭṭati bhikkhācāra gāmaḥ api

original: yattha manussā apassantā viya caranti, yattha ekakulepi bhikkhaṃ alabhitvā nikkhamantaṃ
analyzed: yattha manussāḥ a passantāḥ viya caranti yattha eka kule pi bhikkham a labhitvā nikkhamantam

original: “ehi, bhante”ti āsanasālaṃ pavesetvā yāgubhattaṃ datvā gacchantā gāvī viya vaje pavesetvā

original: anapalokentā gacchanti, tādiso vaṭṭati. Parivisakamanussāpi dāsā vā kammakarā vā
analyzed: an apalokentāḥ gacchanti tādisaḥ vaṭṭati parivisaka manussā api dāsāḥ vā kammakarāḥ vā

original: dubbaṇṇā duddasikā kiliṭṭhavasanā duggandhā jegucchā, ye acittīkārena yāgubhattaṃ
analyzed: dubbaṇṇāḥ duddasikāḥ kiliṭṭha vasanāḥ duggandhāḥ jegucchāḥ ye acittīkārena yāgu bhattam

original: chaḍḍentā viya parivisanti, tādisā sappāyā. Yāgubhattakhajjakampi lūkhaṃ dubbaṇṇaṃ

original: sāmākakudrūsakakaṇājakādimayaṃ pūtitakkaṃ bilaṅgaṃ jiṇṇasākasūpeyyaṃ yaṃkiñcideva

original: kevalaṃ udarapūramattaṃ vaṭṭati. Iriyāpathopissa ṭhānaṃ vā caṅkamo vā vaṭṭati. Ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: kevalam udara pūra mattam vaṭṭati iriyāpathaḥ upissa ṭhānam vā caṅkamaḥ vā vaṭṭati ārammaṇam

analyzed: nīla ādīsu vaṇṇa kasiṇesu yaṃ kiñci a parisuddha vaṇṇan ti idam rāga caritassa sappāyam

original: Dosacaritassa senāsanaṃ nātiuccaṃ nātinīcaṃ chāyūdakasampannaṃ suvibhattabhittithambhasopānaṃ
analyzed: dosa caritassa senāsanam na ati uccam na ati nīcam chāyu udaka sampannam suvibhatta bhitti thambha sopānam

original: supariniṭṭhitamālākammalatākammanānāvidhacittakammasamujjalasamasiniddhamudubhūmitalaṃ
analyzed: su pariniṭṭhita mālā kamma latā kamma nānāvidha cittakamma samujjala sama si niddha mudu bhūmi talam

original: brahmavimānamiva kusumadāmavicitravaṇṇacelavitānasamalaṅkataṃ supaññattasucimanoramattharaṇamañcapīṭhaṃ
analyzed: brahma vimānam iva kusuma dāma vicitra vaṇṇa cela vitāna samalaṅkatam su paññatta suci manorama tharaṇa mañca pīṭham

original: tattha tattha vāsatthāya nikkhittakusumavāsagandhasugandhaṃ yaṃ dassanamatteneva
analyzed: tattha tattha vāsatthāya nikkhitta kusuma vāsa gandha sugandham yam dassana mattena iva

original: pītipāmojjaṃ janayati, evarūpaṃ sappāyaṃ. Tassa pana senāsanassa maggopi sabbaparissayavimutto

original: sucisamatalo alaṅkatapaṭiyattova vaṭṭati. Senāsanaparikkhāropettha kīṭamaṅkuṇadīghajātimūsikānaṃ

original: nissayaparicchindanatthaṃ nātibahuko, ekamañcapīṭhamattameva vaṭṭati. Nivāsanapārupanampissa
analyzed: nissaya paricchindana tham na ati bahukaḥ eka mañca pīṭha mattam eva vaṭṭati nivāsana pārupanam pissa

original: cīnapaṭṭasomārapaṭṭakoseyyakappāsikasukhumakhomādīnaṃ yaṃ yaṃ paṇītaṃ, tena tena

analyzed: eka paṭṭam vā du paṭṭam vā sat lahukam samaṇa sāruppena su rattam suddha vaṇṇam vaṭṭati

original: Patto udakapupphuḷamiva susaṇṭhāno maṇi viya sumaṭṭho nimmalo samaṇasāruppena suparisuddhavaṇṇo
analyzed: pattaḥ udaka pupphuḷam iva su saṇṭhānaḥ maṇi viya su maṭṭhaḥ nimmalaḥ samaṇa sāruppena su parisuddha vaṇṇo

original: ayomayo vaṭṭati. Bhikkhācāramaggo parissayavimutto samo manāpo nātidūranāccāsannagāmo
analyzed: ayaḥ mayaḥ vaṭṭati bhikkhā cāra maggaḥ parissaya vimuttaḥ samaḥ manāpaḥ na atidūra na acca āsanna gāmo

analyzed: vaṭṭati bhikkhācāra gāmaḥ api yattha manussāḥ idāni ayyaḥ āgamissati iti sitta sammaṭṭhe

analyzed: nisīdāpetvā sakkaccam sahatthāḥ parivisanti tādisaḥ vaṭṭati parivesakā panassa ye

original: sakkaccakārino, tādisā sappāyā. Yāgubhattakhajjakampi vaṇṇagandharasasampannaṃ ojavantaṃ

original: vā vaṭṭati, ārammaṇaṃ nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu yaṃkiñci suparisuddhavaṇṇanti idaṃ dosacaritassa sappāyaṃ.
analyzed: vā vaṭṭati ārammaṇam nīla ādīsu vaṇṇa kasiṇesu yaṃkiñci su parisuddha vaṇṇan ti idam dosa caritassa sappāyam

original: Mohacaritassa senāsanaṃ disāmukhaṃ asambādhaṃ vaṭṭati, yattha nisinnassa vivaṭā disā
analyzed: moha caritassa senāsanam disā mukham asambādham vaṭṭati yattha nisinnassa vivaṭā disā

analyzed: vipulam mahā kasiṇam vaṭṭati sesam dosa caritassa vutta sadisam eva ati idam moha caritassa sappāyam

original: Saddhācaritassa sabbampi dosacaritamhi vuttavidhānaṃ sappāyaṃ. Ārammaṇesu cassa anussatiṭṭhānampi vaṭṭati.
analyzed: saddhā caritassa sabbam pi dosa caritamhi vutta vidhānam sappāyam ārammaṇesu ca ssa anussati ṭṭhānam pi vaṭṭati

original: Buddhicaritassa senāsanādīsu idaṃ nāma asappāyanti natthi.
analyzed: buddhi caritassa senāsana ādīsu idam nāma asappāyanti natthi

analyzed: vitakka vidhāvanassa iva paccayaḥ hoti tasmai gambhīre darīmukhe vana paṭicchanne hatthi kucchi pabbhāra mahinda guhā sadise

analyzed: senāsane vasitabbam ārammaṇam pissa vipulam na vaṭṭati tādisam hi vitakka vasena sandhāvanassa

original: paccayo hoti. Parittaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti parittam pana vaṭṭati

original: Sesaṃ rāgacaritassa vuttasadisamevāti idaṃ vitakkacaritassa sappāyaṃ. Ayaṃ attano
analyzed: sesam rāga caritassa vutta sadisam evā ti idam vitakka caritassa sappāyam ayam attano

original: cariyānukūlanti ettha āgatacariyānaṃ pabhedanidānavibhāvanasappāyaparicchedato vitthāro.
analyzed: ettha vitthāro

original: vitthāre sayameva āvibhavissati.
analyzed: vitthāre sayam eva āvibhavissati

original: Cattālīsakammaṭṭhānavaṇṇanā
analyzed: cattālīsa kammaṭṭhāna vaṇṇanā

original: 47. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataraṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti ettha
analyzed: tasmā yam vuttam cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu aññataram kammaṭṭhānam gahetvā ti ettha

analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: āruppā, ekā saññā, ekaṃ vavatthānanti.
analyzed: āruppāḥ ekā saññā ekam vavatthānanti

original: Tattha pathavīkasiṇaṃ, āpokasiṇaṃ, tejokasiṇaṃ, vāyokasiṇaṃ, nīlakasiṇaṃ, pītakasiṇaṃ, lohitakasiṇaṃ, odātakasiṇaṃ, ālokakasiṇaṃ, paricchinnākāsakasiṇanti ime dasa kasiṇā.
analyzed: tattha pathavī kasiṇam āpaḥ kasiṇam tejaḥ kasiṇam vāyo kasiṇam nīla kasiṇam pīta kasiṇam lohita kasiṇam odāta kasiṇam āloka kasiṇam paricchinna ākāsa kasiṇanti ime dasa kasiṇāḥ

original: Uddhumātakaṃ, vinīlakaṃ, vipubbakaṃ, vicchiddakaṃ, vikkhāyitakaṃ, vikkhittakaṃ, hatavikkhittakaṃ, lohitakaṃ, puḷuvakaṃ, aṭṭhikanti ime dasa asubhā.
analyzed: uddhumātakam vinīlakam vipubbakam vicchiddakam vikkhāyitakam vikkhittakam hatavikkhittakam lohitakam puḷuvakam aṭṭhikanti ime dasa asubhā

original: Buddhānussati, dhammānussati, saṅghānussati, sīlānussati, cāgānussati, devatānussati, maraṇānussati, kāyagatāsati, ānāpānassati, upasamānussatīti imā dasa anussatiyo.
analyzed: buddha anussati dhamma anussati saṅgha anussati sīla anussati cāga anussati devatā anussati maraṇa anussati kāyagata asati āna apāna ssati upasama anussati iti imāḥ dasa anussatiyaḥ

original: Mettā, karuṇā, muditā, upekkhāti ime cattāro brahmavihārā.
analyzed: mettā karuṇā muditā upekkhāti ime cattāraḥ brahmavihārā

original: Ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatanam viññāṇañcāyatanam ākiñcaññāyatanam nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti

original: ime cattāro āruppā. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā ekā saññā. Catudhātuvavatthānaṃ ekaṃ vavatthānanti
analyzed: ime cattāro āruppāḥ āhāre paṭikūla saññā ekā saññā catu dhātu vavatthānam ekam vavatthānanti

original: evaṃ saṅkhātaniddesato vinicchayo veditabbo.
analyzed: evam saṅkhāta niddesataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo

original: Upacārappanāvahatoti ṭhapetvā kāyagatāsatiñca ānāpānassatiñca avasesā aṭṭha anussatiyo,
