original: āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, catudhātuvavatthānanti imāneva hettha dasakammaṭṭhānāni upacāravahāni.
analyzed: āhāre paṭikūla saññā catu dhātu vavatthānan ti imāni eva ha ittha dasa kammaṭṭhānāni upacāra vahāni

original: Sesāni appanāvahāni. Evaṃ upacārappanāvahato.
analyzed: sesāni appanā vahāni evam upacāra ppanā vahato

original: Jhānappabhedatoti appanāvahesu cettha ānāpānassatiyā saddhiṃ dasa kasiṇā catukkajjhānikā
analyzed: jhāna ppabhedato ti appanā vahesu ca ittha āna apāna ssatiyā saddhim dasa kasiṇā catukkajjhānikā

original: honti. Kāyagatāsatiyā saddhiṃ dasa asubhā paṭhamajjhānikā. Purimā tayo brahmavihārā
analyzed: honti kāyagata asatiyā saddhim dasa asubhā paṭhama jhānikā purimā tayo brahmavihārā

original: tikajjhānikā. Catutthabrahmavihāro cattāro ca āruppā catutthajjhānikāti evaṃ jhānappabhedato.
analyzed: tika jhānikā catuttha brahmavihāro cattāro ca āruppā catuttha jhānikā ti evam jhāna ppabhedato

original: Samatikkamatoti dve samatikkamā aṅgasamatikkamo ca ārammaṇasamatikkamo ca. Tattha
analyzed: samatikkamato ti dve samatikkamā aṅga samatikkamo ca ārammaṇa samatikkamo ca tattha

original: sabbesupi tikacatukkajjhānikesu kammaṭṭhānesu aṅgasamatikkamo hoti vitakkavicārādīni
analyzed: sabbesu pi tika catukka jhānikesu kammaṭṭhānesu aṅga samatikkamaḥ hoti vitakka vicāra ādīni

original: jhānaṅgāni samatikkamitvā tesvevārammaṇesu dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ pattabbato. Tathā catutthabrahmavihāre.
analyzed: jhāna aṅgāni samatikkamitvā tesu eva ārammaṇesu dutiya jhāna ādīnam tathā catuttha brahmavihāre

original: Sopi hi mettādīnaṃyeva ārammaṇe somanassaṃ samatikkamitvā pattabboti. Catūsu pana
analyzed: saḥ api hi mettā ādīnam yeva ārammaṇe somanassam samatikkamitvā pattabbaḥ ti catūsu pana

original: āruppesu ārammaṇasamatikkamo hoti. Purimesu hi navasu kasiṇesu aññataraṃ samatikkamitvā
analyzed: āruppesu ārammaṇa samatikkamaḥ hoti purimesu hi navasu kasiṇesu aññataram samatikkamitvā

original: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ pattabbaṃ. Ākāsādīni ca samatikkamitvā viññāṇañcāyatanādīni. Sesesu
analyzed: ākāsānañcāyatanam pattabbam ākāsa ādīni ca samatikkamitvā viññāṇañcāyatana ādīni sesesu

original: samatikkamo natthīti evaṃ samatikkamato.
analyzed: samatikkamaḥ natthi iti evam samatikkamataḥ

original: Vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanatoti imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāneva vaḍḍhetabbāni.
analyzed: vaḍḍhana avaḍḍhanato ti imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa vaḍḍhetabbāni

original: Yattakañhi okāsaṃ kasiṇena pharati, tadabbhantare dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṃ sotuṃ
analyzed: yattakam hi okāsam kasiṇena pharati tat abbhantare dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddam sotum

original: dibbena cakkhunā rūpāni passituṃ parasattānañca cetasā cittamaññātuṃ samattho hoti.
analyzed: dibbena cakkhunā rūpāni passitum para sattānam ca cetasā cittam aññātum samatthaḥ hoti

original: Kāyagatāsati pana asubhāni ca na vaḍḍhetabbāni. Kasmā? Okāsena paricchinnattā ānisaṃsābhāvā
analyzed: kāya gata asati pana asubhāni ca na vaḍḍhetabbāni kasmai okāsena paricchinna ttā ānisaṃsa abhāvā

original: ca. Sā ca nesaṃ okāsena paricchinnatā bhāvanānaye āvibhavissati. Tesu pana vaḍḍhitesu
analyzed: ca sā ca nesam okāsena paricchinna tā bhāvanā naye āvibhavissati tesu pana vaḍḍhitesu

original: kuṇaparāsiyeva vaḍḍhati, na koci ānisaṃso atthi. Vuttampi cetaṃ sopākapañhābyākaraṇe,
analyzed: kuṇapa rāsiyā iva vaḍḍhati na koci ānisaṃsaḥ atthi vuttam pi sopāka pañha abyākaraṇe

original: “vibhūtā bhagavā rūpasaññā avibhūtā aṭṭhikasaññā”ti. Tatra hi nimittavaḍḍhanavasena
analyzed: vibhūtā bhagavā rūpa saññā avibhūtā aṭṭhika saññā ti tatra hi nimitta vaḍḍhana vasena

original: rūpasaññā vibhūtāti vuttā. Aṭṭhikasaññā avaḍḍhanavasena avibhūtāti vuttā.
analyzed: rūpa saññā vibhūtā ti vuttā aṭṭhika saññā avaḍḍhana vasena avibhūtā ati vuttā

original: Yaṃ panetaṃ “kevalaṃ aṭṭhisaññāya, apharī pathaviṃ ima”nti vuttaṃ, taṃ lābhissa sato
analyzed: yam pana itam kevalam aṭṭhi saññāya apharī pathavim iman ti vuttam tam lābhissa sataḥ

original: upaṭṭhānākāravasena vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi dhammāsokakāle karavīkasakuṇo samantā ādāsabhittīsu
analyzed: upaṭṭhāna ākāra vasena vuttam yathā iva hi dhamma āsoka kāle karavīka sakuṇaḥ samantā ādāsa bhittīsu

original: attano chāyaṃ disvā sabbadisāsu karavīkasaññī hutvā madhuraṃ giraṃ nicchāresi, evaṃ
analyzed: attano chāyam disvā sabba disāsu karavīka saññī hutvā madhuram giram nicchāresi evam

original: theropi aṭṭhikasaññāya lābhittā sabbadisāsu upaṭṭhitaṃ nimittaṃ passanto kevalāpi
analyzed: theraḥ api sabba disāsu upaṭṭhitam nimittam passanto kevalā api

original: pathavī aṭṭhikabharitāti cintesīti.
analyzed: pathavī aṭṭhika bharitā ati cintesi iti

original: Yadi evaṃ yā asubhajjhānānaṃ appamāṇārammaṇatā vuttā, sā virujjhatīti. Sā ca na virujjhati.
analyzed: yadi evam yā asubha jjhānānam appamāṇa ārammaṇa tā vuttā sā virujjhati iti sā ca na virujjhati

original: Ekacco hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittaṃ gaṇhāti. Ekacco appake. Iminā
analyzed: ekaccaḥ hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittam gaṇhāti ekaccaḥ appake iminā

original: pariyāyena ekaccassa parittārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ hoti. Ekaccassa appamāṇārammaṇanti. Yo
analyzed: pariyāyena ekaccassa paritta ārammaṇam jhānam hoti ekaccassa appamāṇa ārammaṇanti yo

original: vā etaṃ vaḍḍhane ādīnavaṃ apassanto vaḍḍheti. Taṃ sandhāya “appamāṇārammaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vā etam vaḍḍhane ādīnavam a passantaḥ vaḍḍheti tam sandhāya appamāṇa ārammaṇam ti vuttam

original: Ānisaṃsābhāvā pana na vaḍḍhetabbānīti.
analyzed: ānisaṃsa abhāvā pana na vaḍḍhetabbāni iti

original: Yathā ca etāni, evaṃ sesānipi na vaḍḍhetabbāni. Kasmā? Tesu hi ānāpānanimittaṃ tāva
analyzed: yathā ca etāni evam sesāni api na vaḍḍhetabbāni kasmā tesu hi āna apāna nimittam tāva

original: vaḍḍhayato vātarāsiyeva vaḍḍhati, okāsena ca paricchinnaṃ. Iti sādīnavattā okāsena
analyzed: vaḍḍhayataḥ vāta rāsiyā iva vaḍḍhati okāsena ca paricchinnam iti sa ādīnava tā okāsena

original: ca paricchinnattā na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Brahmavihārā sattārammaṇā, tesaṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhayato
analyzed: ca paricchinna ttā na vaḍḍhetabbam brahmavihārā satta ārammaṇā tesam nimittam vaḍḍhayato

original: sattarāsiyeva vaḍḍheyya, na ca tena attho atthi, tasmā tampi na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Yaṃ
analyzed: satta rāsiyā iva vaḍḍheyya na ca tena atthaḥ atthi tasmā tam pi na vaḍḍhetabbam yam

original: pana vuttaṃ “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā”ti ādi, taṃ pariggahavaseneva
analyzed: pana vuttam mettā sahagatena cetasā ekam disam pharitvā iti ādi tam pariggaha vasena iva

original: vuttaṃ. Ekāvāsadviāvāsādinā hi anukkamena ekissā disāya satte pariggahetvā bhāvento
analyzed: vuttam ekāvāsa dvi āvāsa ādinā hi anukkamena ekissā disāya satte pariggahetvā bhāvento

original: ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvāti vutto. Na nimittaṃ vaḍḍhento. Paṭibhāganimittameva cettha natthi.
analyzed: ekam disam pharitvā iti vuttaḥ na nimittam vaḍḍhentaḥ paṭibhāga nimittam eva ca ittha natthi

original: Yadayaṃ vaḍḍheyya, parittaappamāṇārammaṇatāpettha pariggahavaseneva veditabbā. Āruppārammaṇesupi
analyzed: yat ayam vaḍḍheyya paritta appamāṇa ārammaṇa tā api ittha pariggaha vasena iva veditabbā āruppa ārammaṇesu pi

original: ākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimattā. Tañhi kasiṇāpagamavaseneva manasi kātabbaṃ. Tato paraṃ
analyzed: ākāsam kasiṇugghāṭimattā tat hi kasiṇa apagama vasena iva manasi kātabbam tatas param

original: vaḍḍhayatopi na kiñci hoti. Viññāṇaṃ sabhāvadhammattā. Na hi sakkā sabhāvadhammaṃ
analyzed: vaḍḍhayataḥ api na kiñci hoti viññāṇam sabhāva dhamma ttā na hi sakkā sabhāva dhammam

original: vaḍḍhetuṃ. Viññāṇāpagamo viññāṇassa abhāvamattattā. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: vaḍḍhetum viññāṇa apagamaḥ viññāṇassa abhāva matta ttā nevasaññā nāsañña āyatana ārammaṇam

original: sabhāvadhammattāyeva na vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Sesāni animittattā. Paṭibhāganimittañhi vaḍḍhetabbaṃ
analyzed: sabhāva dhamma ttāya iva na vaḍḍhetabbam sesāni animitta ttā paṭibhāga nimittam hi vaḍḍhetabbam

original: nāma bhaveyya. Buddhānussatiādīnañca neva paṭibhāganimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā
analyzed: nāma bhaveyya buddha anussati ādīnam ca na iva paṭibhāga nimittam ārammaṇam hoti tasmā

original: taṃ na vaḍḍhetabbanti evaṃ vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato.
analyzed: tam na vaḍḍhetabbanti evam vaḍḍhana a vaḍḍhanataḥ

original: Ārammaṇatoti imesu ca cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasakasiṇā, dasaasubhā, ānāpānassati,
analyzed: ārammaṇato ti imesu ca cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāḥ dasa asubhāḥ

original: kāyagatāsatīti imāni dvāvīsatipaṭibhāganimittārammaṇāni. Sesāni na paṭibhāganimittārammaṇāni.
analyzed: kāya gata asatī iti imāni dvāvīsati paṭibhāga nimitta ārammaṇāni sesāni na paṭibhāga nimitta ārammaṇāni

original: Tathā dasasu anussatīsu ṭhapetvā ānāpānassatiñca kāyagatāsatiñca avasesā aṭṭha anussatiyo,
analyzed: tathā dasasu anussatīsu ṭhapetvā āna apāna ssatiñca kāyagata asatiñca avasesāḥ aṭṭha anussatiyaḥ

original: āhāre paṭikūlasaññā, catudhātuvavatthānaṃ, viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti
analyzed: āhāre paṭikūla saññā catu dhātu vavatthānam viññāṇam ca āyatanam nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti

original: imāni dvādasa sabhāvadhammārammaṇāni. Dasa kasiṇā, dasa asubhā, ānāpānassati, kāyagatāsatīti
analyzed: imāni dvādasa sa bhāva dhamma ārammaṇāni dasa kasiṇāḥ dasa asubhāḥ āna apāna sati kāya gata asatī iti

original: imāni dvāvīsati nimittārammaṇāni. Sesāni cha na vattabbārammaṇāni. Tathā vipubbakaṃ,
analyzed: imāni dvāvīsati nimitta ārammaṇāni sesāni cha na vattabba ārammaṇāni tathā vipubbakam

original: lohitakaṃ, puḷuvakaṃ, ānāpānassati, āpokasiṇaṃ, tejokasiṇaṃ, vāyokasiṇaṃ, yañca ālokakasiṇe
analyzed: lohitakam puḷuvakam āna apānassati āpo kasiṇam tejaḥ kasiṇam vāyo kasiṇam yat ca āloka kasiṇe

original: sūriyādīnaṃ obhāsamaṇḍalārammaṇanti imāni aṭṭha calitārammaṇāni, tāni ca kho pubbabhāge,
analyzed: sūriya ādīnam obhāsa maṇḍala ārammaṇanti imāni aṭṭha calita ārammaṇāni tāni ca kho pubba bhāge

original: paṭibhāgaṃ pana sannisinnameva hoti. Sesāni na calitārammaṇānīti evaṃ ārammaṇato.
analyzed: paṭibhāgam pana sannisinnam eva hoti sesāni na calita ārammaṇāni iti evam ārammaṇato

original: Bhūmitoti ettha ca dasa asubhā, kāyagatāsati, āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti imāni dvādasa
analyzed: bhūmito ti ettha ca dasa asubhā kāya gatā asati āhāre paṭikūla saññā ati imāni dvādasa

original: devesu nappavattanti. Tāni dvādasa, ānāpānassati cāti imāni terasa brahmaloke nappavattanti.
analyzed: devesu na ppavattanti tāni dvādasa ca ati imāni terasa brahmaloke na ppavattanti

original: Arūpabhave pana ṭhapetvā cattāro āruppe aññaṃ nappavattati. Manussesu sabbānipi pavattantīti evaṃ bhūmito.
analyzed: arūpa bhave pana ṭhapetvā cattāro āruppe aññam na ppavattati manussesu sabbāni api pavattanti iti evam bhūmitaḥ

original: Gahaṇatoti diṭṭhaphuṭṭhasutaggahaṇatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Tatra ṭhapetvā
analyzed: gahaṇato ti diṭṭha phuṭṭha suta gahaṇa tā upa ittha vinicchayaḥ veditabbo tatra ṭhapetvā

original: vāyokasiṇaṃ sesā nava kasiṇā, dasa asubhāti imāni ekūnavīsati diṭṭhena gahetabbāni.
analyzed: vāyu kasiṇam sesāḥ nava kasiṇāḥ dasa asubhā ati imāni ekūnavīsati diṭṭhena gahetabbāni

original: Pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittaṃ nesaṃ gahetabbanti attho. Kāyagatāsatiyaṃ tacapañcakaṃ
analyzed: pubba bhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittam na īsam gahetabbanti attho kāyagatāsatiyam taca pañcakam

original: diṭṭhena, sesaṃ sutenāti evaṃ tassā ārammaṇaṃ diṭṭhasutena gahetabbaṃ. Ānāpānassati
analyzed: diṭṭhena sesam sutena ati evam tassāḥ ārammaṇam diṭṭha sutena gahetabbam āna apāna sati

original: phuṭṭhena, vāyokasiṇaṃ diṭṭhaphuṭṭhena, sesāni aṭṭhārasa sutena gahetabbāni. Upekkhābrahmavihāro,
analyzed: phuṭṭhena vāyokasiṇam diṭṭhaphuṭṭhena sesāni aṭṭhārasa sutena gahetabbāni upekkhā brahmavihāro

original: cattāro āruppāti imāni cettha na ādikammikena gahetabbāni. Sesāni pañcatiṃsa gahetabbānīti evaṃ gahaṇato.
analyzed: cattāro āruppā ti imāni ca ittha na ādikammikena gahetabbāni sesāni pañcatiṃsa gahetabbāni iti evam gahaṇato

original: Paccayatoti imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā ākāsakasiṇaṃ sesā nava kasiṇā āruppānaṃ
analyzed: paccayato ti imesu pana kammaṭṭhānesu ṭhapetvā ākāsa kasiṇam sesāḥ nava kasiṇāḥ āruppānam

original: paccayā honti, dasa kasiṇā abhiññānaṃ, tayo brahmavihārā catutthabrahmavihārassa,
analyzed: paccayāḥ honti dasa kasiṇāḥ abhiññānam tayaḥ brahmavihārā catuttha brahmavihārassa

original: heṭṭhimaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ āruppaṃ uparimassa uparimassa, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā,
analyzed: heṭṭhimam heṭṭhimam āruppam uparimassa uparimassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam nirodha samāpattiyā

original: sabbānipi sukhavihāravipassanābhavasampattīnanti evaṃ paccayato.
analyzed: sabbāni api sukha vihāra vipassanā bhava sampattīnam ti evam paccayato

original: Cariyānukūlatoti cariyānaṃ anukūlatopettha vinicchayo veditabbo. Seyyathidaṃ – rāgacaritassa
analyzed: cariyā anukūla tā ti anukūla tā upa ittha vinicchayaḥ veditabbo seyyathā idam rāga caritassa

original: tāva ettha dasa asubhā, kāyagatāsatīti ekādasa kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlāni. Dosacaritassa
analyzed: tāva ettha dasa asubhā kāya gatā asatī iti ekādasa kammaṭṭhānāni anukūlāni dosa caritassa

original: cattāro brahmavihārā, cattāri vaṇṇakasiṇānīti aṭṭha. Mohacaritassa, vitakkacaritassa
analyzed: cattāro brahmavihārā cattāri vaṇṇa kasiṇāni iti aṭṭha moha caritassa vitakka caritassa

original: ca ekaṃ ānāpānassati kammaṭṭhānameva. Saddhācaritassa purimā cha anussatiyo. Buddhicaritassa
analyzed: ca ekam āna apāna sati kammaṭṭhānam eva saddhā caritassa purimā cha anussatiyaḥ buddhi caritassa

original: maraṇassati, upasamānussati, catudhātuvavatthānaṃ, āhāre paṭikūlasaññāti cattāri.
analyzed: maraṇa sati catu dhātu vavatthānam āhāre paṭikūla saññā ati cattāri

original: Sesakasiṇāni, cattāro ca āruppā sabbacaritānaṃ anukūlāni. Kasiṇesu ca yaṃkiñci parittaṃ
analyzed: sesa kasiṇāni cattāro ca āruppā sabba caritānaṃ anukūlāni kasiṇesu ca yaṃkiñci parittam

original: vitakkacaritassa, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritassāti.
analyzed: vitakka caritassa appamāṇam moha caritassa ati

original: Evamettha cariyānukūlato vinicchayo veditabboti sabbañcetaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena
analyzed: evam ettha cariyā anukūlataḥ vinicchayaḥ veditabbo ti sabbam ca itam uju vipaccanīka vasena

original: ca atisappāyavasena ca vuttaṃ. Rāgādīnaṃ pana avikkhambhikā saddhādīnaṃ vā anupakārā
analyzed: ca ati sappāya vasena ca vuttam rāga ādīnam pana avikkhambhikā saddhā ādīnam vā anupakārā

original: kusalabhāvanā nāma natthi. Vuttampi cetaṃ meghiyasutte –
analyzed: kusala bhāvanā nāma natthi vuttam pi ca itam meghiya sutte

original: “Cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā. Asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāya. Mettā bhāvetabbā
analyzed: cattāro dhammāḥ uttari bhāvetabbāḥ asubhāḥ bhāvetabbāḥ rāgassa pahānāya mettā bhāvetabbā

original: byāpādassa pahānāya. Ānāpānassati bhāvetabbā vitakkupacchedāya. Aniccasaññā bhāvetabbā
analyzed: byāpādassa pahānāya āna apāna sati bhāvetabbā vitakka upacchedāya anicca saññā bhāvetabbā

original: asmimānasamugghātāyā”ti.
analyzed: asmimāna samugghātāya ati

original: Rāhulasuttepi “mettaṃ, rāhula, bhāvanaṃ bhāvehī”tiādinā nayena ekasseva satta kammaṭṭhānāni
analyzed: rāhula sutte pi mettam rāhula bhāvanam bhāvehi iti ādinā nayena ekassa iva satta kammaṭṭhānāni

original: vuttāni. Tasmā vacanamatte abhinivesaṃ akatvā sabbattha adhippāyo pariyesitabboti
analyzed: vuttāni tasmai vacana matte abhinivesam a katvā sabbattha adhippāyaḥ pariyesitabbaḥ ti

original: ayaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāti ettha kammaṭṭhānakathā vinicchayo.
analyzed: ayam kammaṭṭhānam gahetvā ti ettha kammaṭṭhāna kathā vinicchayo

original: 48. Gahetvāti imassa pana padassa ayamatthadīpanā. “Tena yoginā kammaṭṭhānadāyakaṃ
analyzed: gahetvā iti imassa pana padassa ayam attha dīpanā tena yoginā kammaṭṭhāna dāyakam

original: kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā”ti ettha vuttanayeneva vuttappakāraṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: kalyāṇa mittam upasaṅkamitvā ti ettha vutta nayena iva vutta ppakāram kalyāṇa mittam upasaṅkamitvā

original: buddhassa vā bhagavato ācariyassa vā attānaṃ niyyātetvā sampannajjhāsayena sampannādhimuttinā
analyzed: buddhassa vā bhagavataḥ ācariyassa vā attānam niyyātetvā sampanna jjhāsayena sampanna adhimuttinā

original: ca hutvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ yācitabbaṃ.
analyzed: ca hutvā kammaṭṭhānam yācitabbam

original: Tatra “imāhaṃ bhagavā attabhāvaṃ tumhākaṃ pariccajāmī”ti evaṃ buddhassa bhagavato
analyzed: tatra imā aham bhagavā atta bhāvam tumhākam pariccajāmi iti evam buddhassa bhagavataḥ

original: attā niyyātetabbo. Evañhi aniyyātetvā pantesu senāsanesu viharanto bheravārammaṇe
analyzed: attā niyyātetabbo evam hi a niyyātetvā pantesu senāsanesu viharantaḥ bherava ārammaṇe

original: āpāthamāgate santhambhituṃ asakkonto gāmantaṃ osaritvā gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho hutvā anesanaṃ
analyzed: āpātham āgate santhambhitum a sakkontaḥ gāmantam osaritvā gihīhi saṃsaṭṭhaḥ hutvā an esanam

original: āpajjitvā anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇeyya. Niyyātitattabhāvassa panassa bheravārammaṇe āpāthamāgatepi
analyzed: āpajjitvā anaya byasanam pāpuṇeyya niyyāti tatta bhāvassa panassa bherava ārammaṇe

original: bhayaṃ na uppajjati. “Nanu tayā, paṇḍita, purimameva attā buddhānaṃ niyyātito”ti
analyzed: bhayam na uppajjati nanu tayā paṇḍita purimam eva attā buddhānam niyyātitaḥ ti

original: paccavekkhato panassa somanassameva uppajjati. Yathā hi purisassa uttamaṃ kāsikavatthaṃ
analyzed: paccavekkhato panassa somanassam eva uppajjati yathā hi purisassa uttamam kāsikavattham

original: bhaveyya, tassa tasmiṃ mūsikāya vā kīṭehi vā khādite uppajjeyya domanassaṃ. Sace
analyzed: bhaveyya tassa tasmin mūsikāya vā kīṭehi vā khādite uppajjeyya domanassam sace

original: pana taṃ acīvarakassa bhikkhuno dadeyya, athassa taṃ tena bhikkhunā khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ
analyzed: pana tam a cīvarakassa bhikkhuno dadeyya atha assa tam tena bhikkhunā khaṇḍākhaṇḍam

original: kariyamānaṃ disvāpi somanassameva uppajjeyya. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: kariyamānam disvā api somanassam eva uppajjeyya evaṃsampadam idam veditabbam

original: Yattha nānāvidhaṃ sākapaṇṇaṃ hoti, tatthassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā divāvihāraṃ nisinnassāpi

original: santike sākahārikā gāyamānā paṇṇaṃ uccinantiyo visabhāgasaddasaṅghaṭṭanena kammaṭṭhānantarāyaṃ karonti.
analyzed: santike sākahārikāḥ gāyamānā paṇṇam uccinantiyaḥ visa bhāga sadda saṅghaṭṭanena kammaṭṭhānantarāyam karonti

original: Yattha pana nānāvidhā mālāgacchā supupphitā honti, tatrāpi tādisoyeva upaddavo.
analyzed: yattha pana nānāvidhāḥ mālāgacchāḥ su pupphitāḥ honti tatra api tādisaḥ yā iva upaddavaḥ

original: Yattha nānāvidhaṃ ambajambupanasādiphalaṃ hoti, tattha phalatthikā āgantvā yācanti,
analyzed: yattha nānāvidham amba jambu panasa ādi phalam hoti tattha phalatthikāḥ āgantvā yācanti

original: adentassa kujjhanti, balakkārena vā gaṇhanti, sāyanhasamaye vihāramajjhe caṅkamantena
analyzed: a dentassa kujjhanti balakkārena vā gaṇhanti sāyanha samaye vihāra majjhe caṅkamantena

original: te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vuttā yathāruci akkosanti. Avāsāyapissa parakkamanti.
analyzed: te disvā kim upāsakāḥ evam karotha ati vuttāḥ yathāruci akkosanti parakkamanti

original: Patthanīye pana leṇasammate dakkhiṇagirihatthikucchicetiyagiricittalapabbatasadise
analyzed: patthanīye pana leṇa sammate dakkhiṇa giri hatthi kucchi cetiya giri cittala pabbata sadise

original: vihāre viharantaṃ ayamarahāti sambhāvetvā vanditukāmā manussā samantā osaranti, tenassa
analyzed: vihāre viharantam ayam arahā ati sambhāvetvā vanditu kāmā manussā samantā osaranti tena assa

original: na phāsu hoti, yassa pana taṃ sappāyaṃ hoti, tena divā aññatra gantvā rattiṃ vasitabbaṃ.
analyzed: na phāsu hoti yassa pana tam sappāyam hoti tena divā aññatra gantvā rattim vasitabbam

original: Nagarasannissite visabhāgārammaṇāni āpāthamāgacchanti, kumbhadāsiyopi ghaṭehi nighaṃsantiyo
analyzed: nagara sannissite visabhāga ārammaṇāni āpātham āgacchanti kumbhadāsiyaḥ api ghaṭehi nighaṃsantiyaḥ

original: gacchanti, okkamitvā maggaṃ na denti, issaramanussāpi vihāramajjhe sāṇiṃ parikkhipitvā nisīdanti.
analyzed: gacchanti okkamitvā maggam na denti issara manussā api vihāra majjhe sāṇim parikkhipitvā nisīdanti

original: Dārusannissaye pana yattha kaṭṭhāni ca dabbupakaraṇarukkhā ca santi, tattha kaṭṭhahārikā
analyzed: dāru sannissaye pana yattha kaṭṭhāni ca dabba upakaraṇa rukkhā ca santi tattha kaṭṭhahārikā

original: pubbe vuttasākapupphahārikā viya aphāsuṃ karonti, vihāre rukkhā santi, te chinditvā
analyzed: pubbe vutta sāka puppha hārikāḥ viya aphāsum karonti vihāre rukkhāḥ santi te chinditvā

original: gharāni karissāmāti manussā āgantvā chindanti. Sace sāyanhasamayaṃ padhānagharā nikkhamitvā
analyzed: gharāni karissāma ati manussāḥ āgantvā chindanti sace sāyanha samayam padhāna gharāḥ nikkhamitvā

original: vihāramajjhe caṅkamanto te disvā “kiṃ upāsakā evaṃ karothā”ti vadati, yathāruci akkosanti,
analyzed: vihāra majjhe caṅkamantaḥ te disvā kim upāsakāḥ evam karotha ati vadati yathāruci akkosanti

original: avāsāyapissa parakkamanti.
analyzed: parakkamanti

original: Yo pana khettasannissito hoti samantā khettehi parivārito, tattha manussā vihāramajjheyeva
analyzed: yaḥ pana khetta sannissitaḥ hoti samantā khettehi parivāritaḥ tattha manussāḥ

original: khalaṃ katvā dhaññaṃ maddanti, pamukhesu sayanti, aññampi bahuṃ aphāsuṃ karonti.
analyzed: khalam katvā dhaññam maddanti pamukhesu sayanti aññam pi bahum a phāsum karonti

original: Yatrāpi mahāsaṅghabhogo hoti, ārāmikā kulānaṃ gāvo rundhanti, udakavāraṃ paṭisedhenti,
analyzed: yatra api mahā saṅgha bhogaḥ hoti ārāmikā kulānam gāvaḥ rundhanti udaka vāram paṭisedhenti

original: manussā vīhisīsaṃ gahetvā “passatha tumhākaṃ ārāmikānaṃ kamma”nti saṅghassa dassenti.
analyzed: manussāḥ vīhi sīsam gahetvā passatha tumhākam ārāmikānam kammanti saṅghassa dassenti

original: Tena tena kāraṇena rājarājamahāmattānaṃ gharadvāraṃ gantabbaṃ hoti, ayampi khettasannissiteneva saṅgahito.
analyzed: tena tena kāraṇena rāja rāja mahāmattānam ghara dvāram gantabbam hoti ayam pi khetta sannissitena iva saṅgahito

original: Visabhāgānaṃ puggalānaṃ atthitāti yattha aññamaññaṃ visabhāgaverī bhikkhū viharanti,
analyzed: visabhāgānam puggalānam atthitā ati yattha aññamaññam bhikkhū viharanti

original: ye kalahaṃ karontā mā, bhante, evaṃ karothāti vāriyamānā etassa paṃsukūlikassa āgatakālato
analyzed: ye kalaham karontā mā bhante evam karotha ati vāriyamānāḥ etassa paṃsukūlikassa āgata kālataḥ

original: paṭṭhāya naṭṭhāmhāti vattāro bhavanti.
analyzed: paṭṭhāya naṭṭhāmha ati vattāraḥ bhavanti

original: Yopi udakapaṭṭanaṃ vā thalapaṭṭanaṃ vā nissito hoti, tattha abhiṇhaṃ nāvāhi ca satthehi ca āgatamanussā okāsaṃ detha, pānīyaṃ detha, loṇaṃ dethāti ghaṭṭayantā aphāsuṃ karonti.
analyzed: yaḥ api udaka paṭṭanam vā thala paṭṭanam vā nissitaḥ hoti tattha abhiṇham nāvāhi ca satthehi ca āgata manussāḥ okāsam detha pānīyam detha loṇam detha ati ghaṭṭayantāḥ aphāsum karonti

original: Paccantasannissite pana manussā buddhādīsu appasannā honti.
analyzed: paccanta sannissite pana manussāḥ buddha ādīsu appasannāḥ honti

original: Rajjasīmasannissite rājabhayaṃ hoti. Tañhi padesaṃ eko rājā na mayhaṃ vase vattatīti
analyzed: rajja sīma sannissite rāja bhayam hoti tam hi padesam ekaḥ rājā na mayham vase vattati iti

original: paharati, itaropi na mayhaṃ vase vattatīti. Tatrāyaṃ bhikkhu kadāci imassa rañño
analyzed: paharati itaraḥ api na mayham vase vattati iti tatra ayam bhikkhu kadāci imassa rañño

original: vijite vicarati, kadāci etassa. Atha naṃ “carapuriso aya”nti maññamānā anayabyasanaṃ pāpenti.
analyzed: vijite vicarati kadāci etassa atha nam cara purisaḥ ayanti maññamānāḥ anaya byasanam pāpenti

original: Asappāyatāti visabhāgarūpādiārammaṇasamosaraṇena vā amanussapariggahitatāya vā asappāyatā.
analyzed: asappāya tā ati visabhāga rūpa ādi ārammaṇa samosaraṇena vā amanussa pariggahita tāya vā asappāya tā

original: Tatridaṃ vatthu. Eko kira thero araññe vasati. Athassa ekā yakkhinī paṇṇasāladvāre
analyzed: tatra idam vatthu ekaḥ kira theraḥ araññe vasati atha assa ekā yakkhinī paṇṇasāla dvāre

original: ṭhatvā gāyi. So nikkhamitvā dvāre aṭṭhāsi, sā gantvā caṅkamanasīse gāyi. Thero caṅkamanasīsaṃ
analyzed: ṭhatvā gāyi so nikkhamitvā dvāre aṭṭhāsi sā gantvā caṅkamana sīse gāyi thero caṅkamana sīsaṃ

analyzed: agamāsi sā sataporise papāte ṭhatvā atha nam sā vegena āgantvā

original: gahetvā “mayā, bhante, na eko na dve tumhādisā khāditā”ti āha.
analyzed: gahetvā mayā bhante na ekaḥ na dve tumhādisā khāditā ati āha

original: Kalyāṇamittānaṃ alābhoti yattha na sakkā hoti ācariyaṃ vā ācariyasamaṃ vā upajjhāyaṃ

original: cetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu –
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāsu

original: Mahāvāsaṃ navāvāsaṃ, jarāvāsañca panthaniṃ;
analyzed: mahā vāsam nava āvāsam jarā vāsañca panthanim

analyzed: soṇḍim paṇṇam ca puppham ca phalam patthitam eva ca

original: Nagaraṃ dārunā khettaṃ, visabhāgena paṭṭanaṃ;
analyzed: nagaram dārunā khettam visa bhāgena paṭṭanam

original: Paccantasīmāsappāyaṃ, yattha mitto na labbhati.
analyzed: yattha mittaḥ na labbhati

analyzed: aṭṭhārasa itāni ṭhānāni iti viññāya paṇḍito

original: Ārakā parivajjeyya, maggaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ yathāti.
analyzed: ārakā parivajjeyya maggam sa paṭibhayam yathā ati

original: Anurūpavihāro
analyzed: anurūpa vihāraḥ

analyzed: yaḥ pana gocara gāmataḥ pañca haṅgehi samannāgataḥ ayam

analyzed: ayam samādhi bhāvanāya ananurūpam vihāram pahāya anurūpe vihāre viharantena ati ettha vitthāraḥ

original: Khuddakapalibodhā
analyzed: khuddaka pali bodhā

analyzed: evam upacchinna khuddaka palibodhena hi bhikkhunā pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantena

analyzed: tattha yena atīta bhave pi sāsane vā isipabbajjāya vā pabbajitvā pathavī kasiṇe catukka pañcaka jjhānāni

original: olokentassa taṃṭhānappamāṇameva nimittaṃ udapādi. So taṃ vaḍḍhetvā pañcakajjhānāni

analyzed: cattāro kasiṇa dose pariharantena kasiṇam kātabbam nīla pīta lohita odāta sambheda vasena

analyzed: aruṇa vaṇṇāya mattikāya kasiṇam kātabbam tat ca kho vihāra majjhe sāmaṇera ādīnam sañcaraṇa ṭhāne

analyzed: vā tatraṭṭhakam vā kātabbam tatra saṃhārimam catūsu daṇḍakesu pilotikam vā cammaṃ

analyzed: mattikāya vutta ppamāṇam vaṭṭam limpetvā kātabbam tam parikamma kāle bhūmiyam attharitvā

original: oloketabbaṃ. Tatraṭṭhakaṃ bhūmiyaṃ padumakaṇṇikākārena khāṇuke ākoṭetvā vallīhi vinandhitvā
analyzed: oloketabbam tatraṭṭhakam bhūmiyam paduma kaṇṇikā ākārena khāṇuke ākoṭetvā vallīhi vinandhitvā

original: kātabbaṃ. Yadi sā mattikā nappahoti, adho aññaṃ pakkhipitvā uparibhāge suparisodhitāya
analyzed: kātabbam yadi sā mattikā na pahoti adhas aññam pakkhipitvā upari bhāge su parisodhitāya

original: aruṇavaṇṇāya mattikāya vidatthicaturaṅgulavitthāraṃ vaṭṭaṃ kātabbaṃ. Etadeva hi pamāṇaṃ
analyzed: aruṇa vaṇṇāya mattikāya vidatthi catur aṅgula vitthāram vaṭṭam kātabbam etat eva hi pamāṇam

original: sandhāya “suppamattaṃ vā sarāvamattaṃ vā”ti vuttaṃ. “Sāntake no anantake”tiādi panassa
analyzed: sandhāya suppa mattam vā sarāva mattam vā iti vuttam sa antake no anantaka itiādi panassa

original: paricchedatthāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pariccheda tthāya vuttam

original: 56. Tasmā evaṃ vuttappamāṇaparicchedaṃ katvā rukkhapāṇikā visabhāgavaṇṇaṃ samuṭṭhapeti.
analyzed: tasmai evam vutta ppamāṇa paricchedam katvā rukkhapāṇikā visa bhāga vaṇṇam samuṭṭhapeti

original: Tasmā taṃ aggahetvā pāsāṇapāṇikāya ghaṃsetvā samaṃ bherītalasadisaṃ katvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tasmai tam aggahetvā pāsāṇa pāṇikāya ghaṃsetvā samam bherī tala sadisam katvā tam ṭhānam

original: sammajjitvā nhatvā āgantvā kasiṇamaṇḍalato aḍḍhateyyahatthantare padese paññatte
analyzed: sammajjitvā nhatvā āgantvā kasiṇa maṇḍalataḥ aḍḍhateyya hatthantare padese paññatte

original: vidatthicaturaṅgulapādake suatthate pīṭhe nisīditabbaṃ. Tato dūratare nisinnassa
analyzed: vidatthi catur aṅgula pādake su atthate pīṭhe nisīditabbam tatas dūratare nisinnassa

original: hi kasiṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, āsannatare kasiṇadosā paññāyanti. Uccatare nisinnena gīvaṃ
analyzed: hi kasiṇam na upaṭṭhāti āsannatare kasiṇa dosā paññāyanti uccatare nisinnena gīvam

original: onamitvā oloketabbaṃ hoti, nīcatare jaṇṇukāni rujanti. Tasmā vuttanayeneva nisīditvā
analyzed: onamitvā oloketabbam hoti nīcatare jaṇṇukāni rujanti tasmā vutta nayena iva nisīditvā

original: “appassādā kāmā”tiādinā nayena kāmesu ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā kāmanissaraṇe sabbadukkhasamatikkamupāyabhūte
analyzed: appassādā kāmā ti ādinā nayena kāmesu ādīnavam paccavekkhitvā kāma nissaraṇe sabba dukkha samatikkama upāya bhūte

original: nekkhamme jātābhilāsena buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇānussaraṇena pītipāmojjaṃ janayitvā
analyzed: nekkhamme jāta abhilāsena buddha dhamma saṅgha guṇa anussaraṇena pīti pāmojjam janayitvā

original: “ayaṃ dāni sā sabbabuddha paccekabuddha ariyasāvakehi paṭipannā nekkhammapaṭipadā”ti
analyzed: ayam dāni sā sabba buddha paccekabuddha ariyasāvakehi paṭipannā nekkhamma paṭipadā ti

original: paṭipattiyā sañjātagāravena “addhā imāya paṭipadāya pavivekasukharasassa bhāgī bhavissāmī”ti
analyzed: paṭipattiyā sañjāta gāravena addhā imāya paṭipadāya paviveka sukha rasassa bhāgī bhavissāmi iti

original: ussāhaṃ janayitvā samena ākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā nimittaṃ gaṇhantena bhāvetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ussāham janayitvā samena ākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā nimittam gaṇhantena bhāvetabbam

original: Atiummīlayato hi cakkhu kilamati, maṇḍalañca ativibhūtaṃ hoti, tenassa nimittaṃ nuppajjati.
analyzed: ati ummīlayataḥ hi cakkhu kilamati maṇḍalam ca ati vibhūtam hoti tena assa nimittam na uppajjati

original: Atimandaṃ ummīlayato maṇḍalamavibhūtaṃ hoti, cittañca līnaṃ hoti, evampi nimittaṃ
analyzed: atimandam ummīlayataḥ maṇḍalam avibhūtam hoti cittam ca līnam hoti evam pi nimittam

original: nuppajjati. Tasmā ādāsatale mukhanimittadassinā viya samenākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā
analyzed: nuppajjati tasmai ādāsa tale mukha nimitta dassinā viya samena ākārena cakkhūni ummīletvā

original: nimittaṃ gaṇhantena bhāvetabbaṃ, na vaṇṇo paccavekkhitabbo, na lakkhaṇaṃ manasikātabbaṃ.
analyzed: nimittam gaṇhantena bhāvetabbam na vaṇṇaḥ paccavekkhitabbaḥ na lakkhaṇam manasikātabbam

original: Apica vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā nissayasavaṇṇaṃ katvā ussadavasena paṇṇattidhamme cittaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
analyzed: apica vaṇṇam a muñcitvā nissaya sa vaṇṇam katvā ussada vasena paṇṇatti dhamme cittam paṭṭhapetvā

original: manasi kātabbaṃ. Pathavī mahī, medinī, bhūmi, vasudhā, vasundharātiādīsu pathavīnāmesu
analyzed: manasi kātabbam pathavī mahī medinī bhūmi vasudhā vasundharā ati ādīsu pathavī nāmesu

original: yamicchati, yadassa saññānukūlaṃ hoti, taṃ vattabbaṃ. Apica pathavīti etadeva nāmaṃ
analyzed: yam icchati yat assa saññā anukūlam hoti tam vattabbam apica pathavī iti etat eva nāmam

original: pākaṭaṃ, tasmā pākaṭavaseneva pathavī pathavīti bhāvetabbaṃ. Kālena ummīletvā kālena
analyzed: pākaṭam tasmā pākaṭa vasena iva pathavī pathavī iti bhāvetabbam kālena ummīletvā kālena

original: nimīletvā āvajjitabbaṃ. Yāva uggahanimittaṃ nuppajjati, tāva kālasatampi kālasahassampi
analyzed: nimīletvā āvajjitabbam yāva uggaha nimittam na uppajjati tāva kāla satam pi kāla sahassam pi

original: tato bhiyyopi eteneva nayena bhāvetabbaṃ.
analyzed: tatas bhiyyas pi etena iva nayena bhāvetabbam

original: 57. Tassevaṃ bhāvayato yadā nimīletvā āvajjantassa ummīlitakāle viya āpāthamāgacchati,
analyzed: tassa ivam bhāvayataḥ yadā nimīletvā āvajjantassa ummīlita kāle viya āpātham āgacchati

original: tadā uggahanimittaṃ jātaṃ nāma hoti. Tassa jātakālato paṭṭhāya na tasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditabbaṃ.
analyzed: tadā uggaha nimittam jātam nāma hoti tassa jāta kālataḥ paṭṭhāya na tasmin ṭhāne nisīditabbam

original: Attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā tattha nisinnena bhāvetabbaṃ. Pādadhovanapapañcaparihāratthaṃ
analyzed: attanaḥ vasanaṭṭhānam pavisitvā tattha nisinnena bhāvetabbam pāda dhovana papañca parihāra attham

original: panassa ekapaṭalikupāhanā ca kattaradaṇḍo ca icchitabbo. Athānena sace taruṇo samādhi
analyzed: panassa eka paṭalikupāhanā ca kattaradaṇḍo ca icchitabbo atha anena sace taruṇaḥ

original: kenacideva asappāyakāraṇena nassati, upāhanā āruyha kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ
analyzed: kenacid eva asappāya kāraṇena nassati upāhanā āruyha kattara daṇḍam gahetvā tam ṭhānam

original: gantvā nimittaṃ ādāya āgantvā sukhanisinnena bhāvetabbaṃ, punappunaṃ samannāharitabbaṃ,
analyzed: gantvā nimittam ādāya āgantvā sukha nisinnena bhāvetabbam punappunam samannāharitabbam

original: takkāhataṃ vitakkāhataṃ kātabbaṃ. Tassevaṃ karontassa anukkamena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti,
analyzed: takka āhatam vitakka āhatam kātabbam tassa evam karontassa anukkamena nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhanti

original: kilesā sannisīdanti, upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samādhiyati, paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppajjati.
analyzed: kilesāḥ sannisīdanti upacāra samādhinā cittam samādhiyati paṭibhāga nimittam uppajjati

original: Tatrāyaṃ purimassa ca uggahanimittassa imassa ca viseso, uggahanimitte kasiṇadoso
analyzed: tatra ayam purimassa ca uggaha nimittassa imassa ca visesaḥ uggaha nimitte kasiṇa doso

original: paññāyati, paṭibhāganimittaṃ thavikato nihatādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya sudhotasaṅkhathālaṃ
analyzed: paññāyati paṭibhāga nimittam thavikataḥ nihata ādāsa maṇḍalam viya sudhā uta saṅkha thālam

original: viya valāhakantarā nikkhantacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya meghamukhe balākā viya uggahanimittaṃ
analyzed: viya valāhaka antarā nikkhanta canda maṇḍalam viya megha mukhe balākā viya uggaha nimittam

original: padāletvā nikkhantamiva tato sataguṇaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ suparisuddhaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
analyzed: padāletvā nikkhantam iva tatas sataguṇam sahassaguṇam su parisuddham hutvā upaṭṭhāti

original: Tañca kho neva vaṇṇavantaṃ, na saṇṭhānavantaṃ. Yadi hi taṃ īdisaṃ bhaveyya, cakkhuviññeyyaṃ
analyzed: tat ca kho na iva vaṇṇavantam na saṇṭhānavantam yadi hi tam īdisam bhaveyya cakkhu viññeyyam

original: siyā oḷārikaṃ sammasanupagaṃ tilakkhaṇabbhāhataṃ, na panetaṃ tādisaṃ. Kevalañhi samādhilābhino
analyzed: siyā oḷārikam sammasan upagam ti lakkhaṇa bbhā hatam na pana itam tādisam kevalam hi samādhi lābhinaḥ

original: upaṭṭhānākāramattaṃ saññajametanti.
analyzed: upaṭṭhāna ākāra mattam saññajam etat ti

original: 58. Uppannakālato ca panassa paṭṭhāya nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāneva honti, kilesā sannisinnāva, upacārasamādhinā cittaṃ samāhitamevāti.
analyzed: uppanna kālataḥ ca pana assa paṭṭhāya nīvaraṇāni honti kilesā upacāra samādhinā cittam samāhitam eva ati

original: Duvidho hi samādhi upacārasamādhi ca appanāsamādhi ca. Dvīhākārehi cittaṃ samādhiyati
analyzed: duvidhaḥ hi samādhi upacāra samādhi ca appanā samādhi ca dvīhākārehi cittam samādhiyati

original: upacārabhūmiyaṃ vā paṭilābhabhūmiyaṃ vā. Tattha upacārabhūmiyaṃ nīvaraṇappahānena
analyzed: upacāra bhūmiyam vā paṭilābha bhūmiyam vā tattha upacāra bhūmiyam nīvaraṇa pahānena

original: cittaṃ samāhitaṃ hoti. Paṭilābhabhūmiyaṃ aṅgapātubhāvena.
analyzed: cittam samāhitam hoti aṅga pātubhāvena

original: Dvinnaṃ pana samādhīnaṃ idaṃ nānākāraṇaṃ, upacāre aṅgāni na thāmajātāni honti, aṅgānaṃ
analyzed: dvinnam pana samādhīnam idam nānā kāraṇam upacāre aṅgāni na honti

original: athāmajātattā, yathā nāma daharo kumārako ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: yathā nāma daharaḥ kumārakaḥ ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamānaḥ punappunam bhūmiyam

original: patati, evameva upacāre uppanne cittaṃ kālena nimittamārammaṇaṃ karoti, kālena bhavaṅgamotarati.
analyzed: patati evam eva upacāre uppanne cittam kālena nimittam ārammaṇam karoti kālena bhavaṅgamā utarati

original: Appanāyaṃ pana aṅgāni thāmajātāni honti, tesaṃ thāmajātattā, yathā nāma balavā puriso
analyzed: appanāyam pana aṅgāni thāma jātāni honti tesam thāma jāta ttā yathā nāma balavā purisaḥ

original: āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasampi tiṭṭheyya, evameva appanāsamādhimhi uppanne cittaṃ sakiṃ
analyzed: āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasam pi tiṭṭheyya evam eva appanā samādhimhi uppanne cittam sakim

original: bhavaṅgavāraṃ chinditvā kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divasaṃ tiṭṭhati, kusalajavanapaṭipāṭivaseneva pavattatīti.
analyzed: bhavaṅga vāram chinditvā kevalam pi rattim kevalam pi divasam tiṭṭhati kusala javana paṭipāṭi vasena iva pavattati iti

original: Tatra yadetaṃ upacārasamādhinā saddhiṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ uppannaṃ, tassa uppādanaṃ
analyzed: tatra yat etam upacāra samādhinā saddhim paṭibhāga nimittam uppannam tassa uppādanam

original: nāma atidukkaraṃ. Tasmā sace teneva pallaṅkena taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhetvā appanaṃ adhigantuṃ
analyzed: nāma ati dukkaram tasmai sace tena iva pallaṅkena tam nimittam vaḍḍhetvā appanam adhigantum

original: sakkoti, sundaraṃ. No ce sakkoti, athānena taṃ nimittaṃ appamattena cakkavattigabbho
analyzed: sakkoti sundaram no ce sakkoti atha anena tam nimittam appamattena cakkavatti gabbhaḥ

original: viya rakkhitabbaṃ. Evañhi –
analyzed: viya rakkhitabbam evam hi

original: Nimittaṃ rakkhato laddha-parihāni na vijjati;
analyzed: nimittam rakkhataḥ laddha parihāni na vijjati

original: Ārakkhamhi asantamhi, laddhaṃ laddhaṃ vinassati.
analyzed: ārakkhamhi a santamhi laddham laddham vinassati

original: Sattasappāyā
analyzed: satta sappāyā

original: 59. Tatrāyaṃ rakkhaṇavidhi –
analyzed: tatra ayam rakkhaṇa vidhi

original: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
analyzed: āvāsaḥ gocaraḥ bhassam puggalaḥ bhojanam utu

original: Iriyāpathoti sattete, asappāye vivajjaye.
analyzed: iriyāpathā uti satta ite asappāye vivajjaye

original: Sappāye satta sevetha, evañhi paṭipajjato;
analyzed: sappāye satta sevetha evam hi paṭipajjataḥ

original: Nacireneva kālena, hoti kassaci appanā.
analyzed: nacirena iva kālena hoti kassaci appanā

original: Tatrassa yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ vā nimittaṃ nuppajjati, uppannaṃ vā vinassati,
analyzed: yasmin āvāse vasantassa anuppannam vā nimittam na uppajjati uppannam vā vinassati

original: anupaṭṭhitā ca sati na upaṭṭhāti, asamāhitañca cittaṃ na samādhiyati, ayaṃ asappāyo.
analyzed: an upaṭṭhitā ca sati na upaṭṭhāti asamāhitam ca cittam na samādhiyati ayam a sappāyaḥ

original: Yattha nimittaṃ uppajjati ceva thāvarañca hoti, sati upaṭṭhāti, cittaṃ samādhiyati
analyzed: yattha nimittam uppajjati ca iva thāvarañca hoti sati upaṭṭhāti cittam samādhiyati

original: nāgapabbatavāsīpadhāniyatissattherassa viya, ayaṃ sappāyo. Tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū
analyzed: viya ayam sappāyo tasmai yasmin vihāre bahū

original: āvāsā honti, tattha ekamekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yatthassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ
analyzed: āvāsāḥ honti tattha ekam ekasmin tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yattha assa cittam ekaggaṃ

original: hoti, tattha vasitabbaṃ. Āvāsasappāyatāya hi tambapaṇṇidīpamhi cūḷanāgaleṇe vasantā
analyzed: hoti tattha vasitabbam āvāsa sappāyatāya hi tamba paṇṇi dīpamhi cūḷa nāga leṇe vasantā

original: tattheva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā pañcasatā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Sotāpannādīnaṃ
analyzed: tattha iva kammaṭṭhānam gahetvā pañca satā bhikkhū arahattam pāpuṇiṃsu sotāpanna ādīnam

original: pana aññattha ariyabhūmiṃ patvā tattha arahattappattānañca gaṇanā natthi. Evamaññesupi
analyzed: pana aññattha ariya bhūmim patvā tattha arahatta pattānam ca gaṇanā natthi evam aññesu pi

original: cittalapabbatavihārādīsu.
analyzed: cittala pabbata vihāra ādīsu

original: Gocaragāmo pana yo senāsanato uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vā nātidūre diyaḍḍhakosabbhantare hoti sulabhasampannabhikkho, so sappāyo. Viparīto asappāyo.
analyzed: gocara gāmaḥ pana yaḥ senāsanataḥ uttarena vā dakkhiṇena vā na atidūre hoti sulabha sampanna bhikkho so sappāyaḥ viparītaḥ asappāyaḥ

original: Bhassanti dvattiṃsatiracchānakathāpariyāpannaṃ asappāyaṃ, tañhissa nimittantaradhānāya saṃvattati. Dasakathāvatthunissitaṃ sappāyaṃ, tampi mattāya bhāsitabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhassanti dvattiṃsa tiracchāna kathā pariyāpannam a sappāyam tat hissa nimitta antaradhānāya saṃvattati dasa kathā vatthu nissitam sappāyam tam pi mattāya bhāsitabbam

original: Puggalopi atiracchānakathiko sīlādiguṇasampanno, yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ
analyzed: puggalaḥ api a tiracchāna kathikaḥ sīla ādi guṇa sampannaḥ yam nissāya asamāhitam vā cittam

original: samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ thirataraṃ hoti, evarūpo sappāyo. Kāyadaḷhībahulo
analyzed: samādhiyati samāhitam vā cittam thirataram hoti evarūpaḥ sappāyaḥ kāya daḷhī bahulo

original: pana tiracchānakathiko asappāyo. So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva
analyzed: pana tiracchāna kathikaḥ asappāyaḥ saḥ hi tam kaddama udakam iva accham udakam malīnam eva

original: karoti, tādisañca āgamma koṭapabbatavāsīdaharasseva samāpattipi nassati, pageva nimittaṃ.
analyzed: karoti tādisam ca āgamma samāpatti pi nassati pageva nimittam

original: Bhojanaṃ pana kassaci madhuraṃ, kassaci ambilaṃ sappāyaṃ hoti. Utupi kassaci sīto,
analyzed: bhojanam pana kassaci madhuram kassaci ambilam sappāyam hoti kassaci

original: kassaci uṇho sappāyo hoti. Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu hoti, asamāhitaṃ
analyzed: kassaci uṇhaḥ sappāyaḥ hoti tasmai yam bhojanam vā utum vā sevantassa phāsu hoti asamāhitam

original: vā cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā thirataraṃ hoti, taṃ bhojanaṃ so ca utu sappāyo.
analyzed: vā cittam samādhiyati samāhitam vā thirataram hoti tam bhojanam saḥ ca utu sappāyaḥ

original: Itaraṃ bhojanaṃ itaro ca utu asappāyo.
analyzed: itaram bhojanam itaraḥ ca utu asappāyaḥ

original: Iriyāpathesupi kassaci caṅkamo sappāyo hoti, kassaci sayanaṭṭhānanisajjānaṃ aññataro.
analyzed: iriyāpathesu pi kassaci caṅkamaḥ sappāyaḥ hoti kassaci sayana ṭṭhāna nisajjānam aññataro

original: Tasmā taṃ āvāsaṃ viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā yasmiṃ iriyāpathe asamāhitaṃ vā
analyzed: tasmā tam āvāsam viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā yasmin iriyāpathe asamāhitam vā

original: cittaṃ samādhiyati, samāhitaṃ vā thirataraṃ hoti, so sappāyo. Itaro asappāyoti veditabbo.
analyzed: cittam samādhiyati samāhitam vā thirataram hoti saḥ sappāyaḥ itaraḥ asappāyaḥ ti veditabbo

original: Iti imaṃ sattavidhaṃ asappāyaṃ vajjetvā sappāyaṃ sevitabbaṃ. Evaṃ paṭipannassa hi nimittāsevanabahulassa nacireneva kālena hoti kassaci appanā.
analyzed: iti imam sattavidham asappāyam vajjetvā sappāyam sevitabbam evam paṭipannassa hi nimitta āsevana bahulassa nacirena iva kālena hoti kassaci appanā

original: Dasavidhaappanākosallaṃ
analyzed: dasavidha appanā kosallam

original: tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati, asamāhitapuggalaparivajjanato, samāhitapuggalasevanato, tadadhimuttatoti.
analyzed: tasmin samaye cittam ajjhupekkhati asamāhita puggala parivajjanataḥ samāhita puggala sevanataḥ tad adhimuttataḥ ti

original: 61. Tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma ajjhattikabāhirānaṃ vatthūnaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: tattha vatthuvisadakiriyā nāma ajjhattika bāhirānam vatthūnam visada bhāva karaṇam

original: Yadā hissa kesanakhalomāni dīghāni honti, sarīraṃ vā sedamalaggahitaṃ, tadā ajjhattikavatthu
analyzed: yadā hissa kesa nakha lomāni dīghāni honti sarīram vā sa idam alagga hitam tadā ajjhattika vatthu

original: senāsanaṃ vā uklāpaṃ hoti, tadā bāhiravatthu avisadaṃ hoti aparisuddhaṃ. Ajjhattikabāhire

original: 62. Indriyasamattapaṭipādanaṃ nāma saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ samabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Sace

original: Tatrāpi soṇattheravatthu dassetabbaṃ. Evaṃ sesesupi ekassa balavabhāve sati itaresaṃ
analyzed: tatra api soṇatthera vatthu dassetabbam evam sesesu pi ekassa balava bhāve sati itaresam

analyzed: attanaḥ kiccesu asamattha tā veditabbā visesataḥ pana ittha saddhā paññānam samādhi vīriyānam ca

analyzed: cittassa paggaha niggahaḥ hoti iti

analyzed: paṭhamam uppannanti pi paṭhamam ārammaṇa upanijjhānato paccanīka jhāpanato vā jhānam

original: Pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ pana sakalaṭṭhena pathavīkasiṇanti vuccati, taṃ nissāya paṭiladdhanimittampi,

analyzed: pathavīkasiṇa nimitte paṭiladdha jhānam pi tatra imasmin atthe jhānam pathavīkasiṇanti

original: veditabbaṃ. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ adhigataṃ hoti pathavīkasiṇa”nti.

original: Ciraṭṭhitisampādanaṃ
76. Evamadhigate pana etasmiṃ tena yoginā vālavedhinā viya, sūdena viya ca ākārā

analyzed: evam eva yoginā api imam nāma me bhojanam bhuñjitvā evarūpam puggalam sevamānena evarūpe

original: Vāyokasiṇavasena vāyugatigamanaṃ, vātavuṭṭhisamuppādananti evamādīni ijjhanti.
analyzed: vāyu kasiṇa vasena vāyu gati gamanam vāta vuṭṭhi samuppādana nti evamādīni ijjhanti

original: Nīlakasiṇavasena nīlarūpanimmānaṃ, andhakārakaraṇaṃ, suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇanayena abhibhāyatanapaṭilābho, subhavimokkhādhigamoti evamādīni ijjhanti.

original: Pītakasiṇavasena pītakarūpanimmānaṃ, suvaṇṇanti adhimuccanā, vuttanayeneva abhibhāyatanapaṭilābho, subhavimokkhādhigamo cāti evamādīni ijjhanti.
analyzed: pītaka siṇa vasena pītaka rūpa nimmānam suvaṇṇanti adhimuccanā vutta nayena iva abhibha āyatana paṭilābho subha vimokkha adhigamo ca ati evamādīni ijjhanti

original: Lohitakasiṇavasena lohitakarūpanimmānaṃ, vuttanayeneva abhibhāyatanapaṭilābho, subhavimokkhādhigamoti evamādīni ijjhanti.
analyzed: lohitaka siṇa vasena lohitaka rūpa nimmānam vutta nayena iva abhibha āyatana paṭilābho subha vimokkha adhigamo ti evamādīni ijjhanti

original: Odātakasiṇavasena odātarūpanimmānaṃ, thinamiddhassa dūrabhāvakaraṇaṃ, andhakāravidhamanaṃ, dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthāya ālokakaraṇanti evamādīni ijjhanti.
analyzed: odāta kasiṇa vasena odāta rūpa nimmānam thinamiddhassa dūra bhāva karaṇam andhakāra vidhamanam dibbena cakkhunā rūpa dassana thāya āloka karaṇam ti evamādīni ijjhanti

original: Ālokakasiṇavasena sappabhārūpanimmānaṃ, thinamiddhassa dūrabhāvakaraṇaṃ, andhakāravidhamanaṃ, dibbena cakkhunā rūpadassanatthaṃ ālokakaraṇanti evamādīni ijjhanti.
analyzed: āloka kasiṇa vasena sappabhā rūpa nimmānam thinamiddhassa dūra bhāva karaṇam andhakāra vidhamanam dibbena cakkhunā rūpa dassana attham āloka karaṇanti evamādīni ijjhanti

original: Ākāsakasiṇavasena paṭicchannānaṃ vivaṭakaraṇaṃ, antopathavīpabbatādīsupi ākāsaṃ nimminitvā iriyāpathakappanaṃ, tirokuḍḍādīsu asajjamānagamananti evamādīni ijjhanti.
analyzed: ākāsa kasiṇa vasena paṭicchannānam vivaṭa karaṇam antar pathavī pabbata ādīsu pi ākāsam nimminitvā iriyāpatha kappanam tirokuḍḍa ādīsu asajjamāna gamanan ti evamādīni ijjhanti

original: Sabbāneva uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ advayaṃ appamāṇanti imaṃ pabhedaṃ labhanti. Vuttañhetaṃ “pathavīkasiṇameko sañjānāti. Uddhamadhotiriyaṃ advayamappamāṇa”ntiādi.
analyzed: sabbān eva uddham adhas tiriyam advayam appamāṇam ti imam pabhedam labhanti vuttam ha etam pathavī kasiṇam ekaḥ sañjānāti uddham adhas tiriyam advayam appamāṇam ti ādi

original: Tattha uddhanti uparigaganatalābhimukhaṃ. Adhoti heṭṭhābhūmitalābhimukhaṃ. Tiriyanti
analyzed: tattha uddhanti upari gagana tala abhimukham adhas ti heṭṭhā bhūmi tala abhimukham tiriyanti

analyzed: adhas ekaccaḥ samantataḥ tena tena vā kāraṇena evam pasāreti ālokam iva dibba cakkhunā

original: Paribhinnaṭṭhānesu vissandamānaṃ pubbaṃ vipubbaṃ, vipubbameva vipubbakaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vipubbanti vipubbakaṃ. Tathārūpassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.

original: Vicchiddaṃ vuccati dvidhā chindanena apadhāritaṃ, vicchiddameva vicchiddakaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ vicchiddanti vicchiddakaṃ. Vemajjhe chinnassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.

analyzed: vikkhāyitakam paṭikkūla ttā vā kucchitam vikkhāyitanti vikkhāyitakam tathārūpassa

original: Lohitaṃ kirati vikkhipati ito cito ca paggharatīti lohitakaṃ. Paggharitalohitamakkhitassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.

original: Puḷavā vuccanti kimayo, puḷave kiratīti puḷavakaṃ. Kimiparipuṇṇassa chavasarīrassetamadhivacanaṃ.

original: Aṭṭhiyeva aṭṭhikaṃ. Paṭikkūlattā vā kucchitaṃ aṭṭhīti aṭṭhikaṃ. Aṭṭhisaṅkhalikāyapi

original: ekaṭṭhikassapetamadhivacanaṃ. Imāni ca pana uddhumātakādīni nissāya uppannanimittānampi

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggahetabbaṃ. Tenassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathentena asubhanimittatthāya gamanavidhānaṃ,

original: samantā nimittupalakkhaṇaṃ, ekādasavidhena nimittaggāho, gatāgatamaggapaccavekkhaṇanti
analyzed: samantā nimitta upalakkhaṇam ekādasavidhena nimitta ggāhaḥ gata āgata magga paccavekkhaṇan ti

original: evaṃ appanāvidhānapariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ kathetabbaṃ. Tenāpi sabbaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetvā
analyzed: evam appanā vidhāna pariyosānam sabbam kathetabbam tena api sabbam sādhukam uggahetvā

original: pubbe vuttappakāraṃ senāsanaṃ upagantvā uddhumātakanimittaṃ pariyesantena vihātabbaṃ.
analyzed: pubbe vutta ppakāram senāsanam upagantvā uddhumātaka nimittam pariyesantena vihātabbam

original: 104. Evaṃ viharantena ca asukasmiṃ nāma gāmadvāre vā aṭavimukhe vā panthe vā pabbatapāde
analyzed: evam viharantena ca asukasmim nāma gāma dvāre vā aṭavi mukhe vā panthe vā pabbata pāde

original: na tāvadeva atitthena pakkhandantena viya gantabbaṃ. Kasmā? Asubhaṃ hi nāmetaṃ vāḷamigādhiṭṭhitampi
analyzed: na tāvat eva atitthena pakkhandantena viya gantabbam kasmai asubham hi nāma etam vāḷa miga adhiṭṭhitam pi

original: amanussādhiṭṭhitampi hoti. Tatrassa jīvitantarāyopi siyā. Gamanamaggo vā panettha
analyzed: a manussa dhiṭṭhitam pi hoti tatrassa jīvita antarāyaḥ api siyā gamana maggaḥ vā pana ittha

original: gāmadvārena vā nahānatitthena vā kedārakoṭiyā vā hoti. Tattha visabhāgarūpaṃ āpāthamāgacchati,
analyzed: gāma dvārena vā nahāna titthena vā kedāra koṭiyā vā hoti tattha visa bhāga rūpam āpātham āgacchati

original: tadeva vā sarīraṃ visabhāgaṃ hoti. Purisassa hi itthisarīraṃ itthiyā ca purisasarīraṃ
analyzed: tat eva vā sarīram visabhāgam hoti purisassa hi itthi sarīram itthiyā ca purisa sarīram

original: visabhāgaṃ, tadetaṃ adhunāmataṃ subhatopi upaṭṭhāti, tenassa brahmacariyantarāyopi
analyzed: visabhāgam tat etam subhataḥ api tena ssa brahmacariya antarāyaḥ api

original: siyā. Sace pana “nayidaṃ mādisassa bhāriya”nti attānaṃ takkayati, evaṃ takkayamānena gantabbaṃ.
analyzed: siyā sace pana nayidam mādisassa bhāriyanti attānam takkayati evam takkayamānena gantabbam

original: 105. Gacchantena ca saṅghattherassa vā aññatarassa vā abhiññātassa bhikkhuno kathetvā
analyzed: gacchantena ca saṅgha ttherassa vā aññatarassa vā abhiññātassa bhikkhuno kathetvā

original: gantabbaṃ. Kasmā? Sace hissa susāne amanussasīhabyagghādīnaṃ rūpasaddādianiṭṭhārammaṇābhibhūtassa

original: aṅgapaccaṅgāni vā pavedhenti, bhuttaṃ vā na parisaṇṭhāti, añño vā ābādho hoti. Athassa

original: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ gaccho idaṃ asubhanimitta”nti sallakkhetabbaṃ. Sace

original: latā hoti, sāpi “lābu vā kumbhaṇḍī vā sāmā vā kāḷavalli vā pūtilatā vā”ti vavatthapetabbā.
analyzed: latā hoti sā api lābu vā kumbhaṇḍī vā sāmā vā kāḷavalli vā pūtilatā vā ati vavatthapetabbā

original: Tato “imasmiṃ nāma okāse ayaṃ latā idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ, idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ ayaṃ
analyzed: tatas imasmin nāma okāse ayam idam asubha nimittam idam asubha nimittam ayam

original: latā”ti sallakkhetabbaṃ.
analyzed: latā ati sallakkhetabbam

original: 109. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ sanimittaṃ karoti sārammaṇaṃ karotīti, taṃ idheva antogadhaṃ.
analyzed: yam pana vuttam sa nimittam karoti sa ārammaṇam karoti iti tam idha iva antogadham

original: Punappunaṃ vavatthapento hi sanimittaṃ karoti nāma. Ayaṃ pāsāṇo idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ,
analyzed: punar punar vavatthapentaḥ hi sa nimittam karoti nāma ayam pāsāṇaḥ idam asubha nimittam

original: idaṃ asubhanimittaṃ ayaṃ pāsāṇoti evaṃ dve dve samāsetvā samāsetvā vavatthapento
analyzed: idam asubha nimittam ayam pāsāṇo ti evam dve dve samāsetvā samāsetvā vavatthapento

original: sārammaṇaṃ karoti nāma.
analyzed: sa ārammaṇam karoti nāma

original: Evaṃ sanimittaṃ sārammaṇañca katvā pana sabhāvabhāvato vavatthapetīti vuttattā yvāssa
analyzed: evam sa nimittam sa ārammaṇam ca katvā pana sa bhāva bhāvataḥ vavatthapeti iti vutta ttā

original: sabhāvabhāvo anaññasādhāraṇo attaniyo uddhumātakabhāvo, tena manasikātabbaṃ. Vaṇitaṃ
analyzed: sabhāva bhāvaḥ anañña sādhāraṇaḥ attaniyaḥ uddhumātaka bhāvo tena manasikātabbam vaṇitam

original: uddhumātakanti evaṃ sabhāvena sarasena vavatthapetabbanti attho.
analyzed: uddhumātakanti evam sabhāvena sarasena vavatthapetabbanti attho

original: 110. Evaṃ vavatthapetvā vaṇṇatopi liṅgatopi saṇṭhānatopi disatopi okāsatopi paricchedatopīti
analyzed: evam vavatthapetvā vaṇṇataḥ api liṅgataḥ api saṇṭhānataḥ api disataḥ api okāsataḥ api paricchedataḥ api iti

original: chabbidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tena hi yoginā idaṃ sarīraṃ kāḷassa vā odātassa
analyzed: chabbidhena nimittam gahetabbam katham tena hi yoginā idam sarīram kāḷassa vā odātassa

original: vā maṅguracchavino vāti vaṇṇato vavatthapetabbaṃ. Liṅgato pana itthiliṅgaṃ vā purisaliṅgaṃ
analyzed: vā maṅgura chavinaḥ vā ati vaṇṇataḥ vavatthapetabbam liṅgataḥ pana itthi liṅgam vā purisa liṅgam

original: vāti avavatthapetvā paṭhamavaye vā majjhimavaye vā pacchimavaye vā ṭhitassa idaṃ
analyzed: vāti paṭhama vaye vā majjhima vaye vā pacchima vaye vā ṭhitassa idam

original: sarīranti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Saṇṭhānato uddhumātakassa saṇṭhānavaseneva idamassa sīsasaṇṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: sarīranti vavatthapetabbam saṇṭhānataḥ uddhumātakassa saṇṭhāna vasena iva idam assa sīsa saṇṭhānam

original: idaṃ gīvāsaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ hatthasaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ udarasaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ nābhisaṇṭhānaṃ,
analyzed: idam gīvā saṇṭhānam idam hattha saṇṭhānam idam udara saṇṭhānam idam nābhi saṇṭhānam

original: idaṃ kaṭisaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ ūrusaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ jaṅghāsaṇṭhānaṃ, idaṃ pādasaṇṭhānanti
analyzed: idam kaṭi saṇṭhānam idam ūru saṇṭhānam idam jaṅghā saṇṭhānam idam pāda saṇṭhānam iti

original: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Disato pana imasmiṃ sarīre dve disā nābhiyā adho heṭṭhimadisā uddhaṃ
analyzed: vavatthapetabbam disatas pana imasmin sarīre dve disāḥ nābhiyā adhas heṭṭhima disāḥ uddham

original: uparimadisāti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha vā ahaṃ imissā disāya ṭhito asubhanimittaṃ imissāti
analyzed: uparima disā ati atha vā aham imissā disāya ṭhitaḥ asubha nimittam imissā ati

original: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Okāsato pana imasmiṃ nāma okāse hatthā, imasmiṃ pādā, imasmiṃ sīsaṃ,
analyzed: vavatthapetabbam okāsataḥ pana imasmin nāma okāse hatthāḥ imasmin pādāḥ imasmin sīsam

original: imasmiṃ majjhimakāyo ṭhitoti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha vā ahaṃ imasmiṃ okāse ṭhito asubhanimittaṃ
analyzed: imasmin majjhima kāyaḥ ṭhitaḥ iti vavatthapetabbam atha vā aham imasmin okāse ṭhitaḥ asubha nimittam

original: imasminti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Paricchedato idaṃ sarīraṃ adho pādatalena upari kesamatthakena
analyzed: imasmin ti vavatthapetabbam paricchedataḥ idam sarīram adho pāda talena upari kesa matthakena

original: tiriyaṃ tacena paricchinnaṃ, yathāparicchinne ca ṭhāne dvattiṃsakuṇapabharitamevāti
analyzed: tiriyam tacena paricchinnam yathā paricchinne ca ṭhāne dvattiṃsa kuṇapa bharitam eva ati

original: vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha vā ayamassa hatthaparicchedo, ayaṃ pādaparicchedo, ayaṃ sīsaparicchedo,
analyzed: atha vā ayam assa hattha paricchedaḥ ayam pāda paricchedaḥ ayam sīsa paricchedaḥ

original: ayaṃ majjhimakāyaparicchedoti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Yattakaṃ vā pana ṭhānaṃ gaṇhati,
analyzed: ayam majjhima kāya paricchedaḥ ti vavatthapetabbam yattakam vā pana ṭhānam gaṇhati

original: tattakameva idaṃ īdisaṃ uddhumātakanti paricchinditabbaṃ. Purisassa pana itthisarīraṃ
analyzed: tattakam eva idam īdisam uddhumātakam ti paricchinditabbam purisassa pana itthi sarīram

original: itthiyā vā purisasarīraṃ na vaṭṭati. Visabhāge sarīre ārammaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti, vipphandanasseva

original: vuttaṃ. Tasmā sabhāgasarīreyeva evaṃ chabbidhena nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam tasmā evam chabbidhena nimittam gaṇhitabbam

original: 111. Yo pana purimabuddhānaṃ santike āsevitakammaṭṭhāno parihatadhutaṅgo parimadditamahābhūto
analyzed: yaḥ pana purima buddhānam santike āsevita kammaṭṭhāno parihata dhutaṅgo parimaddita mahā bhūto

original: pariggahitasaṅkhāro vavatthāpitanāmarūpo ugghāṭitasattasañño katasamaṇadhammo vāsitavāsano
analyzed: pariggahita saṅkhāraḥ vavatthāpita nāma rūpaḥ ugghāṭita satta sañño kata samaṇa dhammo vāsita vāsano

original: bhāvitabhāvano sabījo ñāṇuttaro appakileso kulaputto, tassa olokitolokitaṭṭhāneyeva
analyzed: bhāvita bhāvano sa bījaḥ ñāṇa uttaraḥ appa kileso kula putto tassa olokita ulokita ṭṭhāneya iva

original: paṭibhāganimittaṃ upaṭṭhāti. No ce evaṃ upaṭṭhāti, athevaṃ chabbidhena nimittaṃ gaṇhato
analyzed: paṭibhāga nimittam upaṭṭhāti no ce evam upaṭṭhāti atha ivam chabbidhena nimittam gaṇhataḥ

original: upaṭṭhāti. Yassa pana evampi na upaṭṭhāti, tena sandhito vivarato ninnato thalato
analyzed: upaṭṭhāti yassa pana evam pi na upaṭṭhāti tena sandhitaḥ vivarataḥ ninnataḥ thalataḥ

original: samantatoti punapi pañcavidhena nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: samantataḥ ti puna api pañcavidhena nimittam gahetabbam

original: 112. Tattha sandhitoti asītisatasandhito. Uddhumātake pana kathaṃ asītisatasandhayo
analyzed: tattha sandhito ti asīti sata sandhitaḥ uddhu mātake pana katham asīti sata sandhayaḥ

original: vavatthapessati. Tasmānena tayo dakkhiṇahatthasandhī, tayo vāmahatthasandhī, tayo
analyzed: vavatthapessati tasmā anena tayaḥ dakkhiṇa hattha sandhī tayaḥ vāma hattha sandhī tayaḥ

analyzed: dakkhiṇa pāda sandhī tayaḥ vāma pāda sandhī ekaḥ gīva sandhi ekaḥ kaṭi sandhi iti evam cuddasa mahāsandhi vasena

analyzed: sandhitaḥ vavatthapetabbam vivarato ti vivaram nāma hattha antaram pāda antaram udara antaram

original: vā mukhassa ca pihitabhāvo vā vivaṭabhāvo vā vavatthapetabbo. Ninnatoti yaṃ sarīre
analyzed: vā mukhassa ca pihita bhāvaḥ vā vivaṭa bhāvaḥ vā ninna to ti yam sarīre

original: ninnaṭṭhānaṃ akkhikūpo vā antomukhaṃ vā galavāṭako vā, taṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Atha
analyzed: ninna ṭṭhānam akkhikūpaḥ vā antomukham vā galavāṭakaḥ vā tam vavatthapetabbam atha

analyzed: jaṇṇukam vā uraḥ vā nalāṭam vā tam atha vā aham thale ṭhitaḥ sarīram

original: ninneti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Samantatoti sabbaṃ sarīraṃ samantato vavatthapetabbaṃ.
analyzed: ninnā iti vavatthapetabbam samantataḥ iti sabbam sarīram samantataḥ vavatthapetabbam

analyzed: sakala sarīre ñāṇam cāretvā yam ṭhānam vibhūtam hutvā upaṭṭhāti tattha uddhumātakam

original: 113. Idāni “so taṃ nimittaṃ suggahitaṃ karotī”tiādīsu ayaṃ vinicchayakathā –

original: Tena yoginā tasmiṃ sarīre yathāvuttanimittaggāhavasena suṭṭhu nimittaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ.
analyzed: tena yoginā tasmim sarīre yathā vutta nimitta ggāha vasena suṭṭhu nimittam gaṇhitabbam

original: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā āvajjitabbaṃ. Evaṃ punappunaṃ karontena sādhukaṃ upadhāretabbañceva
analyzed: satim su upaṭṭhitam katvā āvajjitabbam evam punappunam karontena sādhukam upadhāretabbam ca iva

analyzed: tadā suggahitam nāma hoti

analyzed: saḥ tam nimittam evam suggahitam katvā su upadhāritam upadhāretvā su vavatthitam vavatthapetvā

analyzed: sace tattha iva bhāvanā pariyosānam pattum na sakkoti atha anena āgamana kāle vutta nayena iva

analyzed: indriyehi abahigatena mānasena attano senāsanam eva gantabbam

original: Susānā nikkhamanteneva ca āgamanamaggo vavatthapetabbo, yena maggena nikkhantosmi,

original: ayaṃ maggo pācīnadisābhimukho vā gacchati, pacchimauttaradakkhiṇadisābhimukho vā

original: gacchati, vidisābhimukho vā gacchati. Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne vāmato gacchati, imasmiṃ
analyzed: gacchati vidisā abhimukhaḥ vā gacchati imasmin pana ṭhāne vāmatas gacchati imasmin

analyzed: gaccha u imasmin latā ati evam āgamana maggam vavatthapetvā āgatena caṅkamantena api tad bhāgiyā uva

analyzed: caṅkamaḥ adhiṭṭhātabbaḥ asubha nimitta disa abhimukhe bhūmi ppadese caṅkamitabbanti attho

original: Nisīdantena āsanampi tabbhāgiyameva paññapetabbaṃ. Sace pana tassaṃ disāyaṃ sobbho
analyzed: nisīdantena āsanam pi tad bhāgiyam eva paññapetabbam sace pana tassam disā ayam

analyzed: caṅkamitum āsanam pi an okāsa ttā na sakkā paññapetum tam disam an apalokentena api okāsa anurūpe

analyzed: lomahaṃsam pāpuṇāti pāḷiyam hi vibhatta aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇesu aññam evarūpam bherava ārammaṇam

analyzed: nāma na atthi imasmin hi kammaṭṭhāne jhāna vibbhantakaḥ nāma hoti kasmai ati bheravattā

original: latā vā āgaccheyya, sarīrampi āgaccheyya. Yathā pana so pāsāṇo vā latā vā nāgacchati,
analyzed: latā vā āgaccheyya sarīram pi āgaccheyya yathā pana saḥ pāsāṇaḥ vā latā vā na āgacchati

original: evaṃ sarīrampi nāgacchati. Ayaṃ pana tuyhaṃ upaṭṭhānākāro saññajo saññāsambhavo,

original: Hatavikkhittakampi vicchiddake vuttappakāresuyeva ṭhānesu labbhati. Tasmā tattha

original: 120. Yathā cettha, evaṃ idaṃ ekādasavidhena nimittaggahaṇaṃ ito purimesu puḷavakādīsupi

original: pītisomanassajanakena, upacārāvahattā.
Imasmiṃ hi okāse yaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ, taṃ dvāraṃ datvāva vuttaṃ. Tathā hi tattha

original: vuttaṃ. Tasmā yaṃ vicāretvā avocumha, idamevettha yuttaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam tasmai yam vicāretvā avocumha idam eva itthā yuttam

original: Apica mahātissattherassa dantaṭṭhikamattāvalokanena sakalitthisarīrassa aṭṭhisaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhānādīni cettha nidassanānīti.

original: Iti asubhāni subhaguṇo, dasasatalocanena thutakitti;
analyzed: iti asubhāni subha guṇaḥ dasa sata locanena

original: Pakiṇṇakakathā
analyzed: pakiṇṇaka kathā

analyzed: etesu hi yattha katthaci adhigata jhānaḥ su vikkhambhita rāga ttā vīta rāgaḥ viya

original: yādisaṃ sakkā hoti laddhuṃ, tādise tādise uddhumātakapaṭikkūlaṃ vinīlakapaṭikkūlanti

original: Visesato cettha uddhumātakaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānavipattippakāsanato saṇṭhānarāgino sappāyaṃ.

analyzed: sappāyam lohitakam lohita makkhita paṭikkūla bhāva pakāsanataḥ alaṅkāra janita sobha rāginaḥ

analyzed: sappāyam puḷavakam kāyassa aneka kimi kula sādhāraṇa bhāva ppakāsanataḥ kāye mamatta rāgino

original: Yasmā pana dasavidhepi etasmiṃ asubhe seyyathāpi nāma aparisaṇṭhitajalāya sīghasotāya

original: ṭhapetuṃ, tasmā paṭhamajjhānamevettha hoti, na dutiyādīni.

original: Paṭikkūlepi ca etasmiṃ ārammaṇe “addhā imāya paṭipadāya jarāmaraṇamhā parimuccissāmī”ti

original: 122. Dasavidhampi cetaṃ asubhaṃ lakkhaṇato ekameva hoti. Dasavidhassāpi hetassa asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikkūlabhāvo

original: vācāya duccaritaṃ carati, manasā duccaritaṃ carati, duccaritapāripūriyā apāye upapajjati.

original: Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammanibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo,
analyzed: tattha assa upapatti hetu bhūtam kammam kamma bhavaḥ kamma nibbattā khandhāḥ upapatti bhavaḥ

original: khandhānaṃ nibbatti jāti, paripāko jarā, bhedo maraṇaṃ.
analyzed: khandhānam nibbatti jāti paripākaḥ jarā bhedaḥ maraṇam

original: Aparo saggasampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti tatheva sucaritaṃ carati, sucaritapāripūriyā sagge upapajjati. Tatthassa upapattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
analyzed: aparaḥ sagga sampattim anubhavissāmi iti tathā iva su caritam carati su carita pāripūriyā sagge upapajjati tattha assa upapatti hetu bhūtam kammam kamma bhavaḥ ti saḥ eva nayo

original: Aparo pana brahmalokasampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti kāmupādānapaccayāeva mettaṃ bhāveti,
analyzed: aparaḥ pana brahma loka sampattim anubhavissāmi iti kāma upādāna paccayā eva mā ittam bhāveti

original: karuṇaṃ, muditaṃ, upekkhaṃ bhāveti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā brahmaloke nibbattati. Tatthassa
analyzed: karuṇam muditam upekkham bhāveti bhāvanā pāripūriyā brahma loke nibbattati tattha assa

original: nibbattihetubhūtaṃ kammaṃ kammabhavoti so eva nayo.
analyzed: nibbatti hetu bhūtam kammam kamma bhavaḥ ti saḥ eva nayaḥ

original: Aparo arūpabhave sampattiṃ anubhavissāmīti tatheva ākāsānañcāyatanādisamāpattiyo
analyzed: aparaḥ arūpa bhave sampattim anubhavissāmi iti tathā iva ākāsa ānañca āyatana ādi samāpattiyaḥ

original: bhāveti, bhāvanāpāripūriyā tattha tattha nibbattati. Tatthassa nibbattihetubhūtaṃ
analyzed: bhāveti bhāvanā pāripūriyā tattha tattha nibbattati tatthassa nibbatti hetu bhūtam

original: kammaṃ kammabhavo, kammanibbattā khandhā upapattibhavo, khandhānaṃ nibbatti jāti,
analyzed: kammam kamma bhavaḥ kamma nibbattā khandhāḥ upapatti bhavaḥ khandhānam nibbatti jāti

original: paripāko jarā, bhedo maraṇanti. Esa nayo sesupādānamūlikāsupi yojanāsu.
analyzed: paripākaḥ jarā bhedaḥ yojanāsu

original: Evaṃ ayaṃ avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā, ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe
analyzed: evam ayam avijjā hetu saṅkhārāḥ hetu samuppannāḥ ubho upete hetu samuppannā ti paccaya pariggahe

original: paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ. Atītampi addhānaṃ anāgatampi addhānaṃ avijjā hetu, saṅkhārā

original: hetusamuppannā, ubhopete hetusamuppannāti paccayapariggahe paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti
analyzed: hetu samuppannā ubho upete hetu samuppannā ati paccaya pariggahe paññā dhamma ṭṭhiti ñāṇam ti

original: eteneva nayena sabbapadāni vitthāretabbāni.
analyzed: etena iva nayena sabba padāni vitthāretabbāni

original: Tattha avijjāsaṅkhārā eko saṅkhepo, viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanā eko, taṇhupādānabhavā
analyzed: tattha avijjā saṅkhārāḥ ekaḥ saṅkhepaḥ viññāṇa nāma rūpa saṅgāyatana phassa vedanā ekaḥ taṇhā upādāna bhavā

original: eko, jātijarāmaraṇaṃ eko. Purimasaṅkhepo cettha atīto addhā, dve majjhimā paccuppanno,

analyzed: kamma vaṭṭam jāti jarā maraṇa apadesena viññāṇa ādīnam niddiṭṭha ttā ime pañca dhammā āyatim

original: paññā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti. Iminā dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇena bhagavā te dhamme yathābhūtaṃ

original: ñatvā tesu nibbindanto virajjanto vimuccanto vuttappakārassa imassa saṃsāracakkassa
analyzed: ñatvā tesu nibbindantaḥ virajjantaḥ vimuccantaḥ vutta ppakārassa imassa saṃsāra cakkassa

original: are hani vihani viddhaṃsesi. Evampi arānaṃ hatattā arahaṃ.
analyzed: are hani vihani viddhaṃsesi evam pi hata ttā araham

original: Arā saṃsāracakkassa, hatā ñāṇāsinā yato;
analyzed: arā saṃsāra cakkassa hatā ñāṇa asinā yataḥ

original: Lokanāthena tenesa, arahanti pavuccati.
analyzed: lokanāthena tena isa arahanti pavuccati

original: 129. Aggadakkhiṇeyyattā ca cīvarādipaccaye arahati pūjāvisesañca. Teneva ca uppanne
analyzed: ca cīvara ādi paccaye arahati pūjā visesam ca tena iva ca uppanne

original: tathāgate yekeci mahesakkhā devamanussā, na te aññattha pūjaṃ karonti. Tathā hi brahmā
analyzed: tathāgate ye keci mahesakkhāḥ deva manussāḥ na te aññattha pūjam karonti tathā hi brahmā

original: sahampati sinerumattena ratanadāmena tathāgataṃ pūjesi. Yathābalañca aññe devā manussā

original: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahaṃ.

original: Pūjāvisesaṃ saha paccayehi,

original: Yasmā ayaṃ arahati lokanātho;

original: Atthānurūpaṃ arahanti loke,
analyzed: attha anurūpam arahanti loke

original: Tasmā jino arahati nāmametaṃ.
analyzed: tasmai jinaḥ arahati nāmam etam

original: 130. Yathā ca loke yekeci paṇḍitamānino bālā asilokabhayena raho pāpaṃ karonti, evamesa na kadāci karotīti pāpakaraṇe rahābhāvatopi arahaṃ.

original: Rahābhāvena tenesa, arahaṃ iti vissuto.

original: Ārakattā hatattā ca, kilesārīna so muni;

analyzed: hata saṃsāra cakkāro

analyzed: na rahaḥ karoti pāpāni araham tena vuccati iti

original: Tasmā have appamādaṃ, kayirātha sumedhaso;

original: domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Evampi kho, brāhmaṇa, sandiṭṭhiko dhammo hotī”ti. Apica

original: navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti, tena tena parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ

original: yathā rathena jayatīti rathiko, evaṃ navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sandiṭṭhiyā jayatīti sandiṭṭhiko.

original: Atha vā diṭṭhanti dassanaṃ vuccati. Diṭṭhameva sandiṭṭhaṃ, dassananti attho. Sandiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: atha vā diṭṭham ti dassanam vuccati diṭṭham eva sandiṭṭham dassanam ti attho sandiṭṭham

original: arahatīti sandiṭṭhiko. Lokuttaradhammo hi bhāvanābhisamayavasena sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena

original: ca dissamānoyeva vaṭṭabhayaṃ nivatteti. Tasmā yathā vatthaṃ arahatīti vatthiko, evaṃ
analyzed: ca dissamānaḥ yā iva vaṭṭa bhayam nivatteti tasmai yathā vattham arahati iti vatthikaḥ evam

original: sandiṭṭhaṃ arahatīti sandiṭṭhiko.
analyzed: sandiṭṭham arahati iti sandiṭṭhikaḥ

original: 149. Attano phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālo. Akāloyeva akāliko. Na pañcāhasattāhādibhedaṃ
analyzed: attano phala dānam sandhāya na assa kālo ti akālaḥ akāloya iva akālikaḥ na pañca aha satta aha ādi bhedam

original: kālaṃ khepetvā phalaṃ deti, attano pana pavattisamanantarameva phaladoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: kālam khepetvā phalam deti attanaḥ pana pavatti samanantaram eva phala do ti vuttam hoti

original: Atha vā attano phaladāne pakaṭṭho kālo patto assāti kāliko. Ko so? Lokiyo kusaladhammo.
analyzed: atha vā attanaḥ phala dāne pakaṭṭhaḥ kālaḥ pattaḥ assa ati kālikaḥ kaḥ so lokiyaḥ kusala dhammo

original: Ayaṃ pana samanantaraphalattā na kālikoti akāliko. Idaṃ maggameva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: ayam pana samanantara phala ttā na kālikaḥ ti akālikaḥ idam maggam eva sandhāya vuttam

original: 150. “Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
analyzed: ehi passa imam dhamman ti evam pavattam ehipassa vidhim arahati iti ehipassikaḥ

original: Kasmā panesa taṃ vidhiṃ arahatīti? Vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca. Rittamuṭṭhiyaṃ
analyzed: kasmai pana isa tam vidhim arahati iti vijjamāna ttā parisuddha ttā ca

original: hi hiraññaṃ vā suvaṇṇaṃ vā atthīti vatvāpi “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Kasmā?
analyzed: hi hiraññam vā suvaṇṇam vā atthi iti vatvā api ehi passa iman ti na sakkā vattum kasmā

original: Avijjamānattā. Vijjamānampi ca gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā manuññabhāvappakāsanena cittasampahaṃsanatthaṃ
analyzed: a vijjamāna ttā vijjamānam pi ca gūtham vā muttam vā manuñña bhāva ppakāsanena citta sampahaṃsana attham

original: “ehi passa ima”nti na sakkā vattuṃ. Apica kho pana tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbameva
analyzed: ehi passa iman ti na sakkā vattum apica kho pana tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā paṭicchādetabbam eva

original: hoti. Kasmā? Aparisuddhattā. Ayaṃ pana navavidhopi lokuttaradhammo sabhāvatova vijjamāno
analyzed: hoti kasmai a parisuddha ttā ayam pana navavidhaḥ api lokuttara dhammaḥ sabhāvataḥ va vijjamāno

original: vigatavalāhake ākāse sampuṇṇacandamaṇḍalaṃ viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya
analyzed: vigata valāhake ākāse sampuṇṇa canda maṇḍalam viya paṇḍu kambale nikkhitta jāti maṇi viya

original: ca parisuddho. Tasmā vijjamānattā parisuddhattā ca ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
analyzed: ca parisuddhaḥ tasmā vijjamāna ttā parisuddha ttā ca ehipassa vidhim arahati iti ehipassikaḥ

original: 151. Upanetabboti opaneyyiko. Ayaṃ panettha vinicchayo, upanayanaṃ upanayo, ādittaṃ
analyzed: upanetabbaḥ ti opaneyyikaḥ ayam pana ittha vinicchayaḥ upanayanam upanayaḥ ādittam

original: celaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayanaṃ arahatīti

original: gacchati, atha kho pucchitvāva gantabbaṃ hoti, evameva kevalaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ

original: pāpuṇāti, avibhūtaṃ pana hoti, na visesaṃ āvahati, tasmā nātisīghato manasikātabbaṃ.
analyzed: pāpuṇāti avibhūtam pana hoti na visesam āvahati tasmā na ati sīghataḥ manasikātabbam

original: Yathā ca nātisīghato, evaṃ nātisaṇikatopi. Atisaṇikato manasikaroto hi yathā nāma
analyzed: yathā ca na ati sīghataḥ evam na ati saṇikataḥ api ati saṇikataḥ manasikarotaḥ hi yathā nāma

original: tadaheva tiyojanamaggaṃ gantukāmassa purisassa antarāmagge rukkhapabbatataḷākādīsu
analyzed: tat aha iva ti yojana maggam gantu kāmassa purisassa antarāmagge rukkha pabbata taḷāka ādīsu

original: vilambamānassa maggo parikkhayaṃ na gacchati, dvīhatīhena pariyosāpetabbo hoti, evameva
analyzed: vilambamānassa maggaḥ parikkhayam na gacchati dvīhatīhena pariyosāpetabbaḥ hoti evam eva

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ pariyosānaṃ na gacchati, visesādhigamassa paccayo na hoti.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam pariyosānam na gacchati visesa adhigamassa paccayaḥ na hoti

original: Vikkhepapaṭibāhanatoti kammaṭṭhānaṃ vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cetaso vikkhepo
analyzed: vikkhepa paṭibāhanato ti kammaṭṭhānam vissajjetvā bahiddhā puthuttā ārammaṇe cetasaḥ vikkhepo

original: paṭibāhitabbo. Appaṭibāhato hi yathā nāma ekapadikaṃ papātamaggaṃ paṭipannassa purisassa
analyzed: paṭibāhitabbaḥ a paṭibāhataḥ hi yathā nāma ekapadikam papāta maggam paṭipannassa purisassa

original: akkamanapadaṃ asallakkhetvā ito cito ca vilokayato padavāro virajjhati, tato sataporise
analyzed: akkamana padam itas citas ca vilokayataḥ pada vāraḥ virajjhati tatas sa taporise

original: papāte patitabbaṃ hoti, evameva bahiddhā vikkhepe sati kammaṭṭhānaṃ parihāyati paridhaṃsati.
analyzed: papāte patitabbam hoti evam eva bahiddhā vikkhepe sati kammaṭṭhānam parihāyati paridhaṃsati

original: Tasmā vikkhepapaṭibāhanato manasikātabbaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā vikkhepa paṭibāhanataḥ manasikātabbam

analyzed: paṇṇatti sama tikkamanataḥ ti yā ayam kesāḥ loma ati ādikā paṇṇatti tam atikkamitvā paṭikkūlanti

original: tālapaṇṇādikaṃ kiñcideva saññāṇaṃ bandhitvā tena saññāṇena āgantvā nhāyanti ceva
analyzed: tāla paṇṇa ādikam kiñcid eva saññāṇam bandhitvā tena saññāṇena āgantvā nhāyanti ca iva

original: pivanti ca. Yadā pana nesaṃ abhiṇhasañcārena āgatāgatapadaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, tadā saññāṇena

original: Anupubbamuñcanatoti yo yo koṭṭhāso na upaṭṭhāti, taṃ taṃ muñcantena anupubbamuñcanato

analyzed: upaṭṭhitam pana tam eva punappunam manasikarontena appanā uppādetabbā

original: Tatrāyaṃ upamā – yathā hi dvattiṃsatālake tālavane vasantaṃ makkaṭaṃ gahetukāmo luddo

original: Makkaṭo viya cittaṃ. Luddo viya yogāvacaro. Makkaṭassa dvattiṃsatālake tālavane nivāso
