analyzed: chahi bhikkhave dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu bhabbaḥ anuttaram sīti bhāvam sacchikātum

original: Katamehi chahi? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ niggahetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ
analyzed: katamehi chahi idha bhikkhave bhikkhu yasmin samaye cittam niggahetabbam tasmin

original: samaye cittaṃ niggaṇhāti. Yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ paggahetabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ
analyzed: samaye cittam niggaṇhāti yasmin samaye cittam paggahetabbam tasmin samaye cittam

original: paggaṇhāti. Yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃsitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ sampahaṃseti.
analyzed: paggaṇhāti yasmin samaye cittam sampahaṃsitabbam tasmin samaye cittam sampahaṃseti

original: Yasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbaṃ, tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ ajjhupekkhati. Paṇītādhimuttiko
analyzed: yasmin samaye cittam ajjhupekkhitabbam tasmin samaye cittam ajjhupekkhati paṇīta adhimuttikaḥ

original: ca hoti nibbānābhirato. Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu
analyzed: ca hoti nibbāna abhirataḥ imehi kho bhikkhave chahi dhammehi samannāgataḥ bhikkhu

original: bhabbo anuttaraṃ sītibhāvaṃ sacchikātu”nti.
analyzed: bhabbaḥ anuttaram sīti bhāvam sacchikātunti

original: Idaṃ suttaṃ anuttaraṃ sītibhāvoti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: idam suttam anuttaram sīti bhāvaḥ ti veditabbam

original: Bojjhaṅgakosallaṃ “pana evameva kho, bhikkhave, yasmiṃ samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, akālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāyā”ti appanākosallakathāyaṃ dassitameva.
analyzed: bojjhaṅga kosallam pana evam eva kho bhikkhave yasmin samaye līnam cittam hoti akālo tasmin samaye passaddhi sambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya ati appanā kosalla kathāyam dassitam eva

original: Iti idaṃ sattavidhaṃ uggahakosallaṃ suggahitaṃ katvā idañca dasavidhaṃ manasikārakosallaṃ
analyzed: iti idam sattavidham uggaha kosallam su gahitam katvā idam ca dasavidham manasikāra kosallam

original: suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā tena yoginā ubhayakosallavasena kammaṭṭhānaṃ sādhukaṃ uggahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā tena yoginā ubhaya kosalla vasena kammaṭṭhānam sādhukam uggahetabbam

original: Sace panassa ācariyena saddhiṃ ekavihāreyeva phāsu hoti, evaṃ vitthārena akathāpetvā
analyzed: sace panassa ācariyena saddhim phāsu hoti evam vitthārena a kathāpetvā

original: kammaṭṭhānaṃ suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ anuyujjantena visesaṃ labhitvā uparūpari
analyzed: kammaṭṭhānam suṭṭhu vavatthapetvā kammaṭṭhānam anuyujjantena visesam labhitvā upari upari

original: kathāpetabbaṃ. Aññattha vasitukāmena yathāvuttena vidhinā vitthārato kathāpetvā punappunaṃ
analyzed: kathāpetabbam aññattha vasitu kāmena yathā vuttena vidhinā vitthārataḥ kathāpetvā punappunam

original: parivattetvā sabbaṃ gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ chinditvā pathavīkasiṇaniddese vuttanayeneva ananurūpaṃ
analyzed: parivattetvā sabbam gaṇṭhi ṭṭhānam chinditvā pathavī kasiṇa niddese vutta nayena iva ananurūpam

original: senāsanaṃ pahāya anurūpe vihāre vasantena khuddakapalibodhupacchedaṃ katvā paṭikkūlamanasikāre
analyzed: senāsanam pahāya anurūpe vihāre vasantena khuddaka pali bodha upacchedam katvā paṭikkūla manasikāre

original: parikammaṃ kātabbaṃ.
analyzed: parikammam kātabbam

original: Karontena pana kesesu tāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Ekaṃ vā dve vā kese luñcitvā
analyzed: karontena pana kesesu tāva nimittam gahetabbam katham ekam vā dve vā kese luñcitvā

original: hatthatale ṭhapetvā vaṇṇo tāva vavatthapetabbo. Chinnaṭṭhānepi kese oloketuṃ vaṭṭati.
analyzed: hattha tale ṭhapetvā vaṇṇo tāva vavatthapetabbo chinna ṭṭhāne pi kese oloketum vaṭṭati

original: Udakapatte vā yāgupatte vā oloketumpi vaṭṭatiyeva. Kāḷakakāle disvā kāḷakāti manasikātabbā.
analyzed: udaka patte vā yāgu patte vā oloketum pi vaṭṭatiyā iva kāḷaka kāle disvā kāḷakā ati manasikātabbā

original: Setakāle setāti. Missakakāle pana ussadavasena manasikātabbā honti. Yathā ca kesesu,
analyzed: seta kāle setāti missaka kāle pana ussada vasena manasikātabbāḥ honti yathā ca kesesu

original: evaṃ sakalepi tacapañcake disvāva nimittaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
analyzed: evam sakale api taca pañcake disvā ava nimittam gahetabbam

original: Koṭṭhāsavavatthāpanakathā
analyzed: koṭṭhāsa vavatthāpana kathā

original: 182. Evaṃ nimittaṃ gahetvā sabbakoṭṭhāse vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena vavatthapetvā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhaāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlato vavatthapetabbā.
analyzed: evam nimittam gahetvā sabba koṭṭhāse vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna disā ukāsa pariccheda vasena vavatthapetvā vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna gandha āsayokāsa vasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlataḥ vavatthapetabbā

original: Tatrāyaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu anupubbakathā. Kesā tāva pakativaṇṇena kāḷakā addāriṭṭhakavaṇṇā.
analyzed: tatra ayam sabba koṭṭhāsesu anupubba kathā kesā tāva pakati vaṇṇena kāḷakā addāriṭṭhaka vaṇṇā

original: Saṇṭhānato dīghavaṭṭalikā tulādaṇḍasaṇṭhānā. Disato uparimadisāya jātā. Okāsato ubhosu
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ dīgha vaṭṭalikā tulā daṇḍa saṇṭhānā disataḥ uparima disāya jātā okāsataḥ ubhosu

original: passesu kaṇṇacūḷikāhi, purato nalāṭantena, pacchato galavāṭakena paricchinnā. Sīsakaṭāhaveṭhanaṃ
analyzed: passesu kaṇṇa cūḷikāhi puratas nala aṭantena pacchatas galavāṭakena paricchinnā sīsa kaṭāha veṭhanam

original: allacammaṃ kesānaṃ okāso. Paricchedato kesā sīsaveṭhanacamme vīhaggamattaṃ pavisitvā
analyzed: alla cammam kesānam okāsaḥ paricchedataḥ kesā sīsa veṭhana camme vīhagga mattam pavisitvā

original: patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā,
analyzed: patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attanaḥ mūla talena upari ākāsena tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā

original: dve kesā ekato natthīti ayaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Kesā na lomā, lomā na kesāti evaṃ
analyzed: dve kesā ekatas natthi iti ayam sa bhāga paricchedo kesāḥ na lomā lomā na kesā ti evam

original: avasesaekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsehi amissīkatā kesā nāma pāṭiyekko ekakoṭṭhāsoti ayaṃ visabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: avasesa ekatiṃsa koṭṭhāsehi amissīkatā kesā nāma pāṭiyekkaḥ eka koṭṭhāso ti ayam visa bhāga paricchedo

original: Idaṃ kesānaṃ vaṇṇādito vavatthāpanaṃ.
analyzed: idam kesānam vaṇṇa āditaḥ vavatthāpanam

original: 183. Idaṃ pana nesaṃ vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlato vavatthāpanaṃ. Kesā nāmete vaṇṇatopi paṭikkūlā. Saṇṭhānatopi gandhatopi āsayatopi okāsatopi paṭikkūlā.
analyzed: idam pana nesam vaṇṇa ādi vasena pañcadhā paṭikkūlataḥ vavatthāpanam kesāḥ nāma ete vaṇṇataḥ api paṭikkūlā saṇṭhānataḥ api gandhataḥ api āsayataḥ api okāsataḥ api paṭikkūlā

original: Manuññepi hi yāgupatte vā bhattapatte vā kesavaṇṇaṃ kiñci disvā kesamissakamidaṃ
analyzed: manuññe pi hi yāgu patte vā bhatta patte vā kesa vaṇṇam kiñci disvā kesa missakam idam

original: haratha nanti jigucchanti. Evaṃ kesā vaṇṇato paṭikkūlā. Rattiṃ bhuñjantāpi kesasaṇṭhānaṃ
analyzed: haratha nanti jigucchanti evam kesāḥ vaṇṇataḥ paṭikkūlāḥ rattim bhuñjantā api kesa saṇṭhānam

original: akkavākaṃ vā makacivākaṃ vā chupitvāpi tatheva jigucchanti. Evaṃ saṇṭhānato paṭikkūlā.
analyzed: akkavākam vā makacivākam vā chupitvā api tathā iva jigucchanti evam saṇṭhānataḥ paṭikkūlā

original: Telamakkhanapupphadhūpādi saṅkhāravirahitānañca kesānaṃ gandho paramajeguccho hoti.
analyzed: tela makkhana puppha dhūpa ādi saṅkhāra virahitānam ca kesānam gandho parama jegucchaḥ hoti

original: Tato jegucchataro aggimhi pakkhittānaṃ. Kesā hi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlāpi siyuṃ,
analyzed: tatas jegucchataraḥ aggimhi pakkhittānam kesāḥ hi vaṇṇa saṇṭhānataḥ a paṭikkūlāḥ api siyum

original: gandhena pana paṭikkūlāyeva. Yathā hi daharassa kumārassa vaccaṃ vaṇṇato haliddivaṇṇaṃ,
analyzed: gandhena pana paṭikkūlāya iva yathā hi daharassa kumārassa vaccam vaṇṇataḥ haliddi vaṇṇam

original: saṇṭhānatopi haliddipiṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ. Saṅkāraṭṭhāne chaḍḍitañca uddhumātakakāḷasunakhasarīraṃ
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ pi haliddi piṇḍa saṇṭhānam saṅkāra ṭṭhāne chaḍḍitam ca uddhumātaka kāḷa su nakha sarīram

original: vaṇṇato tālapakkavaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭhamudiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ. Dāṭhāpissa
analyzed: vaṇṇataḥ tāla pakka vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ vaṭṭetvā vissaṭṭham udiṅga saṇṭhānam dāṭhāpissa

original: sumanamakuḷasadisāti ubhayampi vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikkūlaṃ gandhena pana paṭikkūlameva.
analyzed: sumana makuḷa sadisā ti ubhayam pi vaṇṇa saṇṭhānato siyā appaṭikkūlam gandhena pana paṭikkūlam eva

original: Evaṃ kesāpi siyuṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlā gandhena pana paṭikkūlāyevāti.
analyzed: evam kesā api siyum vaṇṇa saṇṭhānato appaṭikkūlāḥ gandhena pana paṭikkūlāya iva ati

original: Yathā pana asuciṭṭhāne gāmanissandena jātāni sūpeyyapaṇṇāni nāgarikamanussānaṃ jegucchāni
analyzed: yathā pana asuci ṭṭhāne gāma nissandena jātāni sūpeyya paṇṇāni nāgarika manussānam jegucchāni

original: honti aparibhogāni, evaṃ kesāpi pubbalohitamuttakarīsapittasemhādinissandena jātattā
analyzed: honti a paribhogāni evam kesā api pubba lohita mutta karīsa pitta semha ādi nissandena jāta ttā

original: jegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ āsayato pāṭikkulyaṃ.
analyzed: idam āsayataḥ pāṭikkulyam

original: Ime ca kesā nāma gūtharāsimhi uṭṭhitakaṇṇikaṃ viya ekatiṃsakoṭṭhāsarāsimhi jātā.
analyzed: ime ca kesāḥ nāma gūtha rāsimhi uṭṭhita kaṇṇikam viya ekatiṃsa koṭṭhāsa rāsimhi jātā

original: Te susānasaṅkāraṭṭhānādīsu jātasākaṃ viya parikkhādīsu jātakamalakuvalayādipupphaṃ
analyzed: te susāna saṅkāra ṭṭhāna ādīsu jāta sākam viya parikkhā ādīsu jāta kamala kuvalaya ādi puppham

original: viya ca asuciṭṭhāne jātattā paramajegucchāti idaṃ nesaṃ okāsato pāṭikkulyaṃ.
analyzed: ca asuci ṭṭhāne jāta ttā idam okāsataḥ pāṭikkulyam

original: Yathā ca kesānaṃ, evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānagandhāsayokāsavasena pañcadhā
analyzed: yathā ca kesānam evam sabba koṭṭhāsānam vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna gandha asayokāsa vasena pañcadhā

original: paṭikkūlatā veditabbā. Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena pana sabbepi visuṃ visuṃ vavatthapetabbā.
analyzed: paṭikkūla tā veditabbā vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna disā ukāsa pariccheda vasena pana sabbe pi visum visum

original: 184. Tattha lomā tāva pakativaṇṇato na kesā viya asambhinnakāḷakā, kāḷapiṅgalā pana
analyzed: tattha lomā tāva pakati vaṇṇataḥ na kesāḥ viya asambhinna kāḷakā kāḷa piṅgalā pana

original: honti. Saṇṭhānato onataggā tālamūlasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātā. Okāsato ṭhapetvā
analyzed: honti saṇṭhānataḥ ona taggāḥ tāla mūla saṇṭhānāḥ disataḥ dvīsu disāsu jātāḥ okāsataḥ ṭhapetvā

original: kesānaṃ patiṭṭhitokāsañca hatthapādatalāni ca yebhuyyena avasesasarīraveṭhanacamme
analyzed: kesānam patiṭṭhita ukāsam ca hattha pāda talāni ca yebhuyyena avasesa sarīra veṭhana camme

original: jātā. Paricchedato sarīraveṭhanacamme likhāmattaṃ pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano
analyzed: jātā paricchedataḥ sarīra veṭhana camme likhā mattam pavisitvā patiṭṭhitena heṭṭhā attano

original: mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā, dve lomā ekato natthi,
analyzed: mūla talena upari ākāsena tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā dve lomā ekatas natthi

original: ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: ayam sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: 185. Nakhāti vīsatiyā nakhapattānaṃ nāmaṃ. Te sabbepi vaṇṇato setā. Saṇṭhānato macchasakalikasaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: nakhā ti vīsatiyā nakhapattānam nāmam te sabbe pi vaṇṇato setā saṇṭhānataḥ macchasakalika saṇṭhānā

original: Disato pādanakhā heṭṭhimadisāya, hatthanakhā uparimadisāyāti dvīsu disāsu jātā. Okāsato
analyzed: disatas pāda nakhāḥ heṭṭhima disāya hattha nakhāḥ uparima disāya ati dvīsu disāsu jātāḥ okāsato

original: aṅgulīnaṃ aggapiṭṭhesu patiṭṭhitā. Paricchedato dvīsu disāsu aṅgulikoṭimaṃsehi, anto
analyzed: aṅgulīnam agga piṭṭhesu patiṭṭhitā paricchedataḥ dvīsu disāsu aṅguli koṭi maṃsehi anto

original: aṅgulipiṭṭhimaṃsena, bahi ceva agge ca ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnā,
analyzed: aṅguli piṭṭhim aṃsena bahi ca iva agge ca ākāsena tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnā

original: dve nakhā ekato natthi, ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: dve nakhā ekatas natthi ayam nesam sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedo pana

original: 186. Dantāti paripuṇṇadantassa dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhikāni. Tepi vaṇṇato setā. Saṇṭhānato
analyzed: danta ati paripuṇṇa dantassa dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhikāni te pi vaṇṇato setā saṇṭhānato

original: anekasaṇṭhānā. Tesaṃ hi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyā majjhe cattāro dantā mattikāpiṇḍe
analyzed: aneka saṇṭhānā tesam hi heṭṭhimāya tāva dantapāḷiyāḥ majjhe cattāro dantāḥ mattikā piṇḍe

original: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitaalābubījasaṇṭhānā. Tesaṃ ubhosu passesu ekeko ekamūlako ekakoṭiko
analyzed: paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapita alābu bīja saṇṭhānā tesam ubhosu passesu ekekaḥ eka mūlakaḥ eka koṭiko

original: mallikamakuḷasaṇṭhāno. Tato ekeko dvimūlako dvikoṭiko yānakaupatthambhinisaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: mallika makuḷa saṇṭhānaḥ tatas ekekaḥ dvi mūlakaḥ dvi koṭikaḥ yānaka upatthambhini saṇṭhānaḥ

original: Tato dve dve timūlā tikoṭikā. Tato dve dve catumūlā catukoṭikāti. Uparimapāḷiyāpi
analyzed: tatas dve dve ti mūlā ti koṭikā tatas dve dve catu mūlā catu koṭikā ati uparima pāḷiyā api

original: eseva nayo. Disato uparimadisāya jātā. Okāsato dvīsu hanukaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitā. Paricchedato
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ disataḥ uparima disāya jātā okāsataḥ dvīsu hanu kaṭṭhikesu patiṭṭhitā paricchedato

original: heṭṭhā hanukaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitena attano mūlatalena, upari ākāsena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena
analyzed: heṭṭhā hanu kaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitena attanaḥ mūla talena upari ākāsena tiriyam aññamaññena

original: paricchinnā, dve dantā ekato natthi, ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo
analyzed: paricchinnāḥ dve dantāḥ ekatas natthi ayam nesam sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedo

original: pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: pana kesa sadisā uyā iva

original: 187. Tacoti sakalasarīraṃ veṭhetvā ṭhitacammaṃ. Tassa upari kāḷasāmapītādivaṇṇā chavi
analyzed: tacā uti sakala sarīram veṭhetvā ṭhita cammam tassa upari kāḷa sāma pīta ādi vaṇṇā chavi

original: nāma yā sakalasarīratopi saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā badaraṭṭhimattā hoti. Taco pana vaṇṇato
analyzed: nāma yā sakala sarīrataḥ pi saṅkaḍḍhiyamānā badaraṭṭhimattā hoti taco pana vaṇṇato

original: setoyeva. So cassa setabhāvo aggijālābhighātapaharaṇappahārādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā
analyzed: so cassa seta bhāvaḥ aggi jāla abhighāta paharaṇa ppahāra ādīhi viddhaṃsitāya chaviyā

original: pākaṭo hoti. Saṇṭhānato sarīrasaṇṭhānova hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo.
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ hoti saṇṭhānataḥ sarīra saṇṭhānaḥ upa hoti ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ

original: Vitthārato pana pādaṅgulittaco kosakārakakosasaṇṭhāno. Piṭṭhipādattaco puṭabandhaupāhanasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: vitthārato pana kosakārakakosa saṇṭhāno piṭṭhi pāda ttaco puṭabandha upāhana saṇṭhāno

original: Jaṅghattaco bhattapuṭakatālapaṇṇasaṇṭhāno. Ūruttaco taṇḍulabharitadīghatthavikasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: jaṅghattacaḥ bhatta puṭaka tāla paṇṇa saṇṭhānaḥ ūruttacaḥ taṇḍula bharita dīghatthavika saṇṭhānaḥ

original: Ānisadattaco udakapūritapaṭaparissāvanasaṇṭhāno. Piṭṭhittaco phalakonaddhacammasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: udaka pūrita paṭa parissāvana saṇṭhāno piṭṭhittaco phalakonaddha camma saṇṭhāno

original: Kucchittaco vīṇādoṇikonaddhacammasaṇṭhāno. Urattaco yebhuyyena caturassasaṇṭhāno.
analyzed: kucchittacaḥ vīṇā doṇikā naddha camma saṇṭhānaḥ urattacaḥ yebhuyyena catur assa saṇṭhānaḥ

original: Ubhayabāhuttaco tūṇironaddhacammasaṇṭhāno. Piṭṭhihatthattaco khurakosasaṇṭhāno, phaṇakatthavikasaṇṭhāno
analyzed: ubhaya bāhu ttacaḥ tūṇiraḥ naddha camma saṇṭhāno piṭṭhi hattha ttacaḥ khura kosa saṇṭhāno phaṇakatthavika saṇṭhāno

original: vā. Hatthaṅgulittaco kuñcikākosakasaṇṭhāno. Gīvattaco galakañcukasaṇṭhāno. Mukhattaco
analyzed: vā kuñcikā kosaka saṇṭhānaḥ gīvattacaḥ gala kañcuka saṇṭhānaḥ mukhattacaḥ

original: chiddāvachiddo kīṭakulāvakasaṇṭhāno. Sīsattaco pattatthavikasaṇṭhānoti.
analyzed: chidda avachiddaḥ kīṭa kulāvaka saṇṭhāno sīsa ttaco patta tthavika saṇṭhāno ti

original: Tacapariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttaroṭṭhato paṭṭhāya uparimukhaṃ ñāṇaṃ pesetvā
analyzed: taca pariggaṇhakena ca yogāvacarena uttara uṭṭhataḥ paṭṭhāya upari mukham ñāṇam pesetvā

original: paṭhamaṃ tāva mukhaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tato nalāṭaṭṭhicammaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhamam tāva mukham pariyonandhitvā ṭhita cammam vavatthapetabbam tatas nalāṭa ṭṭhi cammam

original: Tato thavikāya pakkhittapattassa ca thavikāya ca antarena hatthamiva sīsaṭṭhikassa
analyzed: tatas thavikāya pakkhitta pattassa ca thavikāya ca antarena hattham iva sīsaṭṭhikassa

original: ca sīsacammassa ca antarena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā aṭṭhikena saddhiṃ cammassa ekābaddhabhāvaṃ
analyzed: ca sīsa cammassa ca antarena ñāṇam pesetvā aṭṭhikena saddhim cammassa ekābaddha bhāvam

original: viyojentena sīsacammaṃ vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tato khandhacammaṃ. Tato anulomena paṭilomena
analyzed: viyojentena sīsa cammam vavatthapetabbam tatas khandha cammam tatas anulomena paṭilomena

original: ca dakkhiṇahatthacammaṃ. Atha teneva nayena vāmahatthacammaṃ. Tato piṭṭhicammaṃ taṃ
analyzed: ca dakkhiṇa hattha cammam atha tena iva nayena vāma hattha cammam tatas piṭṭhi cammam taṃ

original: vavatthapetvā anulomena paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇapādacammaṃ. Atha teneva nayena vāmapādacammaṃ.
analyzed: vavatthapetvā anulomena paṭilomena ca dakkhiṇa pāda cammam atha tena iva nayena vāma pāda cammam

original: Tato anukkameneva vatthiudarahadayagīvacammāni vavatthapetabbāni. Atha gīvacammānantaraṃ
analyzed: tatas anukkamena iva vatthi udara hadaya gīva cammāni atha gīva camma anantaram

original: heṭṭhimahanucammaṃ vavatthapetvā adharoṭṭhapariyosānaṃ pāpetvā niṭṭhapetabbaṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: heṭṭhima hanu cammam vavatthapetvā adhara uṭṭha pariyosānam pāpetvā niṭṭhapetabbam evam

original: oḷārikoḷārikaṃ pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti. Disato dvīsu disāsu jāto.
analyzed: oḷārika uḷārikam pariggaṇhantassa sukhumam pi pākaṭam hoti disatas dvīsu disāsu jātaḥ

original: Okāsato sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhito. Paricchedato heṭṭhā patiṭṭhitatalena,
analyzed: okāsataḥ sakala sarīram pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaḥ paricchedataḥ heṭṭhā patiṭṭhita talena

original: upari ākāsena paricchinno, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: upari ākāsena paricchinnaḥ ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: 188. Maṃsanti nava maṃsapesisatāni. Taṃ sabbampi vaṇṇato rattaṃ kiṃsukapupphasadisaṃ.
analyzed: maṃsanti nava maṃsapesi satāni tam sabbam pi vaṇṇataḥ rattam kiṃsuka puppha sadisam

original: Saṇṭhānato jaṅghapiṇḍikamaṃsaṃ tālapaṇṇapuṭabhattasaṇṭhānaṃ. Ūrumaṃsaṃ nisadapotasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ jaṅgha piṇḍika maṃsam tāla paṇṇa puṭa bhatta saṇṭhānam ūru maṃsam nisada pota saṇṭhānam

original: Ānisadamaṃsaṃ uddhanakoṭisaṇṭhānaṃ. Piṭṭhimaṃsaṃ tālaguḷapaṭalasaṇṭhānaṃ. Phāsukadvayamaṃsaṃ
analyzed: ānisada maṃsam uddhana koṭi saṇṭhānam piṭṭhi maṃsam tāla guḷa paṭala saṇṭhānam phāsuka dvaya maṃsam

original: koṭṭhalikāya kucchiyaṃ tanumattikālepasaṇṭhānaṃ. Thanamaṃsaṃ vaṭṭetvā avakkhittamattikāpiṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: koṭṭhalikāya kucchiyam tanu mattikā lepa saṇṭhānam thana maṃsam vaṭṭetvā avakkhitta mattikā piṇḍa saṇṭhānam

original: Bāhudvayamaṃsaṃ dviguṇaṃ katvā ṭhapitaniccammamahāmūsikasaṇṭhānaṃ. Evaṃ oḷārikoḷārikaṃ
analyzed: bāhu dvayam aṃsam dviguṇam katvā ṭhapita niccamma mahāmūsika saṇṭhānam evam oḷārika uḷārikam

original: pariggaṇhantassa sukhumampi pākaṭaṃ hoti. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato vīsādhikāni
analyzed: pariggaṇhantassa sukhumam pi pākaṭam hoti disataḥ dvīsu disāsu jātam okāsataḥ vīsa adhikāni

original: tīṇi aṭṭhisatāni anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato heṭṭhā aṭṭhisaṅghāte patiṭṭhitatalena,
analyzed: tīṇi aṭṭhi satāni anulimpitvā ṭhitam paricchedataḥ heṭṭhā aṭṭhi saṅghāte patiṭṭhita talena

original: upari tacena, tiriyaṃ aññamaññena paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo
analyzed: upari tacena tiriyam aññamaññena paricchinnam ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ

original: pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: pana kesa sadisā uyā iva

original: 189. Nhārūti nava nhārusatāni. Vaṇṇato sabbepi nhārū setā. Saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: nhārū ti nava nhāru satāni vaṇṇato sabbe pi nhārū setā saṇṭhānataḥ nānā saṇṭhānā

original: Etesu hi gīvāya uparimabhāgato paṭṭhāya pañca mahānhārū sarīraṃ vinandhamānā purimapassena
analyzed: etesu hi uparima bhāgataḥ paṭṭhāya pañca mahānhārū sarīram vinandhamānā purima passena

original: otiṇṇā. Pañca pacchimapassena. Pañca dakkhiṇapassena. Pañca vāmapassena. Dakkhiṇahatthaṃ
analyzed: otiṇṇā pañca pacchima passena pañca dakkhiṇa passena pañca vāma passena dakkhiṇa hattham

original: vinandhamānāpi hatthassa purimapassena pañca. Pacchimapassena pañca. Tathā vāmahatthaṃ
analyzed: vinandhamānā api hatthassa purima passena pañca pacchima passena pañca tathā vāma hattham

original: vinandhamānā. Dakkhiṇapādaṃ vinandhamānāpi pādassa purimapassena pañca. Pacchimapassena
analyzed: vinandhamānā dakkhiṇa pādam vinandhamānā api pādassa purima passena pañca pacchima passena

original: pañca. Tathā vāmapādaṃ vinandhamānāpīti evaṃ sarīradhārakā nāma saṭṭhimahānhārū kāyaṃ
analyzed: pañca tathā vāma pādam vinandhamānā api iti evam sarīradhārakāḥ nāma kāyam

original: vinandhamānā otiṇṇā. Ye kaṇḍarātipi vuccanti. Te sabbepi kandalamakuḷasaṇṭhānā. Aññe
analyzed: vinandhamānāḥ otiṇṇāḥ ye kaṇḍarā atipi vuccanti te sabbe pi kandala makuḷa saṇṭhānāḥ aññe

original: pana taṃ taṃ padesaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā. Tato sukhumatarā suttarajjukasaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: pana tam tam padesam ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā tatas sukhumatarā sutta rajjuka saṇṭhānā

original: Aññe tato sukhumatarā pūtilatāsaṇṭhānā, aññe tato sukhumatarā mahāvīṇātantisaṇṭhānā.
analyzed: aññe tatas sukhumatarā pūti latā saṇṭhānā aññe tatas sukhumatarā mahā vīṇā tanti saṇṭhānā

original: Aññe thūlasuttakasaṇṭhānā. Hatthapādapiṭṭhīsu nhārū sakuṇapādasaṇṭhānā. Sīse nhārū
analyzed: aññe thūla suttaka saṇṭhānā hattha pāda piṭṭhīsu nhārū sakuṇa pāda saṇṭhānā sīse nhārū

original: dārakānaṃ sīsajālakasaṇṭhānā. Piṭṭhiyaṃ nhārū ātape pasāritaallajālasaṇṭhānā. Avasesā
analyzed: dārakānam sīsa jālaka saṇṭhānā piṭṭhiyam nhārū ātape pasārita alla jāla saṇṭhānā avasesā

original: taṃtaṃaṅgapaccaṅgānugatā nhārū sarīre paṭimukkajālakañcukasaṇṭhānā. Disato dvīsu
analyzed: taṃ taṃaṅga paccaṅga anugatāḥ sarīre paṭimukka jāla kañcuka saṇṭhānāḥ disatas dvīsu

original: disāsu jātā. Okāsato sakalasarīre aṭṭhīni ābandhitvā ṭhitā. Paricchedato heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: disāsu jātā okāsato sakala sarīre aṭṭhīni ābandhitvā ṭhitā paricchedato heṭṭhā tiṇṇam

original: aṭṭhisatānaṃ upari patiṭṭhitatalehi, upari maṃsacammāni āhacca ṭhitappadesehi, tiriyaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhi satānam upari patiṭṭhita talehi upari maṃsa cammāni āhacca ṭhita ppadesehi tiriyam

original: aññamaññena paricchinnā, ayaṃ nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: aññam aññena paricchinnāḥ ayam sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: 190. Aṭṭhīti ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa dantaṭṭhīni avasesāni catusaṭṭhi hatthaṭṭhīni, catusaṭṭhi
analyzed: aṭṭhi iti ṭhapetvā dvattiṃsa danta ṭṭhīni avasesāni catusaṭṭhi hattha ṭṭhīni catusaṭṭhi

original: pādaṭṭhīni, catusaṭṭhi maṃsanissitāni muduaṭṭhīni, dve paṇhikaṭṭhīni, ekekasmiṃ pāde
analyzed: pāda aṭṭhīni catusaṭṭhi maṃsa nissitāni mudu aṭṭhīni dve paṇhika aṭṭhīni ekekasmin pāde

original: dve dve gopphakaṭṭhīni, dve jaṅghaṭṭhīni, ekaṃ jaṇṇukaṭṭhi, ekaṃ ūruṭṭhi, dve kaṭiṭṭhīni,
analyzed: dve dve gopphakaṭṭhīni dve jaṅgha ṭṭhīni ekam jaṇṇuka ṭṭhi ekam ūruṭṭhi dve kaṭiṭṭhīni

original: aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni, catuvīsati phāsukaṭṭhīni, cuddasa uraṭṭhīni, ekaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni catuvīsati phāsukaṭṭhīni cuddasa uraṭṭhīni ekam

original: hadayaṭṭhi, dve akkhakaṭṭhīni, dve koṭṭaṭṭhīni, dve bāhuṭṭhīni, dve dve aggabāhuṭṭhīni,
analyzed: hadaya ṭṭhi dve akkhaka ṭṭhīni dve koṭṭa ṭṭhīni dve bāhu ṭṭhīni dve dve agga bāhu ṭṭhīni

original: satta gīvaṭṭhīni, dve hanukaṭṭhīni, ekaṃ nāsikaṭṭhi, dve akkhiṭṭhīni, dve kaṇṇaṭṭhīni,
analyzed: satta gīva ṭṭhīni dve hanuka ṭṭhīni ekam nāsika ṭṭhi dve akkhiṭṭhīni dve kaṇṇa ṭṭhīni

original: ekaṃ nalāṭaṭṭhi. Ekaṃ muddhaṭṭhi, nava sīsakapālaṭṭhīnīti evaṃ timattāni aṭṭhisatāni,
analyzed: ekam nalāṭa ṭṭhi ekam muddha ṭṭhi nava sīsa kapāla ṭṭhīni iti evam timattāni aṭṭhi satāni

original: tāni sabbānipi vaṇṇato setāni. Saṇṭhānato nānāsaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: tāni sabbāni api vaṇṇato setāni saṇṭhānataḥ nānā saṇṭhānāni

original: Tattha hi aggapādaṅguliaṭṭhīni katakabījasaṇṭhānāni. Tadanantarāni majjhapabbaṭṭhīni
analyzed: tattha hi agga pāda aṅguli aṭṭhīni kataka bīja saṇṭhānāni tad anantarāni majjha pabbaṭṭhīni

original: panasaṭṭhisaṇṭhānāni. Mūlapabbaṭṭhīni paṇavasaṇṭhānāni. Piṭṭhipādaṭṭhīni koṭṭitakandalakandarāsisaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: panasa ṭṭhi saṇṭhānāni mūla pabbaṭṭhīni paṇava saṇṭhānāni piṭṭhi pādaṭṭhīni koṭṭita kandala kandara rāsi saṇṭhānāni

original: Paṇhikaṭṭhi ekaṭṭhitālaphalabījasaṇṭhānaṃ. Gopphakaṭṭhīni baddhakīḷāgoḷakasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: paṇhikaṭṭhi ekaṭṭhi tāla phala bīja saṇṭhānam gopphakaṭṭhīni baddha kīḷā goḷaka saṇṭhānāni

original: Jaṅghaṭṭhīnaṃ gopphakaṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ apanītatacasindikaḷīrasaṇṭhānaṃ. Khuddakajaṅghaṭṭhikaṃ
analyzed: jaṅgha ṭṭhīnam gopphaka ṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhita ṭṭhānam apanīta taca sindi kaḷīra saṇṭhānam khuddaka jaṅgha ṭṭhikam

original: dhanukadaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ. Mahantaṃ milātasappapiṭṭhisaṇṭhānaṃ. Jaṇṇukaṭṭhi ekato parikkhīṇapheṇakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: dhanuka daṇḍa saṇṭhānam mahantam milāta sappa piṭṭhi saṇṭhānam ekatas parikkhīṇa pheṇaka saṇṭhānam

original: Tattha jaṅghaṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikhiṇaggagosiṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ. Ūruṭṭhi duttacchitavāsiparasudaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: tattha jaṅgha ṭṭhikassa patiṭṭhita ṭhānam ati khiṇagga go siṅga saṇṭhānam ūruṭṭhi

original: Tassa kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ kīḷāgoḷakasaṇṭhānaṃ. Tena kaṭiṭṭhino patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ
analyzed: tassa kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhita ṭhānam kīḷā goḷaka saṇṭhānam tena kaṭiṭṭhino patiṭṭhita ṭhānam

original: aggacchinnamahāpunnāgaphalasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: agga chinna mahā punnāga phala saṇṭhānam

original: Kaṭiṭṭhīni dvepi ekābaddhāni hutvā kumbhakārikauddhanasaṇṭhānāni. Pāṭiyekkaṃ kammārakūṭayottakasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: kaṭiṭṭhīni dve api eka ābaddhāni hutvā kumbhakārika auddhana saṇṭhānāni pāṭiyekkam kammārakūṭa yottaka saṇṭhānāni

original: Koṭiyaṃ ṭhitaṃ ānisadaṭṭhi adhomukhaṃ katvā gahitasappaphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ, sattaṭṭhaṭṭhānesu
analyzed: koṭiyam ṭhitam adhomukham katvā gahita sappa phaṇa saṇṭhānam sattaṭṭha ṭṭhānesu

original: chiddāvachiddaṃ. Piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni abbhantarato uparūpari ṭhapitasīsapaṭṭaveṭhakasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: chidda avachiddam piṭṭhi kaṇṭa kaṭṭhīni abbhantarataḥ upari upari ṭhapita sīsa paṭṭa veṭhaka saṇṭhānāni

original: Bāhirato vaṭṭanāvaḷisaṇṭhānāni. Tesaṃ antarantarā kakacadantasadisā dve tayo kaṇṭakā
analyzed: bāhiratas vaṭṭana avaḷi saṇṭhānāni tesam antar antarā dve tayo

original: honti. Catuvīsatiyā phāsukaṭṭhīsu aparipuṇṇāni aparipuṇṇaasisaṇṭhānāni. Paripuṇṇāni
analyzed: honti catuvīsatiyā phāsu kaṭṭhīsu a paripuṇṇāni a paripuṇṇa asi saṇṭhānāni paripuṇṇāni

original: paripuṇṇaasisaṇṭhānāni. Sabbānipi odātakukkuṭassa pasāritapakkhasaṇṭhānāni. Cuddasa
analyzed: paripuṇṇa asi saṇṭhānāni sabbāni api odāta kukkuṭassa pasārita pakkha saṇṭhānāni cuddasa

original: uraṭṭhīni jiṇṇasandamānikapañjarasaṇṭhānāni. Hadayaṭṭhi dabbiphaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: uraṭṭhīni jiṇṇa sanda mānika pañjara saṇṭhānāni hadayaṭṭhi dabbi phaṇa saṇṭhānam

original: Akkhakaṭṭhīni khuddakalohavāsidaṇḍasaṇṭhānāni. Koṭṭaṭṭhīni ekato parikkhīṇasīhaḷakuddālasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: akkha kaṭṭhīni khuddaka loha vāsi daṇḍa saṇṭhānāni koṭṭaṭṭhīni ekatas parikkhīṇa sīhaḷa kuddāla saṇṭhānāni

original: Bāhuṭṭhīni ādāsadaṇḍakasaṇṭhānāni. Aggabāhuṭṭhīni yamakatālakandasaṇṭhānāni. Maṇibandhaṭṭhīni
analyzed: bāhu ṭṭhīni ādāsa daṇḍaka saṇṭhānāni aggabāhu ṭṭhīni yamaka tāla kanda saṇṭhānāni maṇibandha ṭṭhīni

original: ekato alliyāpetvā ṭhapitasīsakapaṭṭaveṭhakasaṇṭhānāni. Piṭṭhihatthaṭṭhīni koṭṭitakandalakandarāsisaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: ekatas ṭhapita sīsaka paṭṭa veṭhaka saṇṭhānāni piṭṭhi hattha ṭṭhīni koṭṭita kandala kandara asi saṇṭhānāni

original: Hatthaṅgulīsu mūlapabbaṭṭhīni paṇavasaṇṭhānāni. Majjhapabbaṭṭhīni aparipuṇṇapanasaṭṭhisaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: hattha aṅgulīsu mūla pabbaṭṭhīni paṇava saṇṭhānāni majjha pabbaṭṭhīni a paripuṇṇa panasaṭṭhi saṇṭhānāni

original: Aggapabbaṭṭhīni katakabījasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: agga pabbaṭṭhīni kataka bīja saṇṭhānāni

original: Satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍena vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitavaṃsakaḷīracakkalakasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: satta gīvaṭṭhīni daṇḍena vijjhitvā paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapita vaṃsa kaḷīra cakkalaka saṇṭhānāni

original: Heṭṭhimahanukaṭṭhi kammārānaṃ ayokūṭayottakasaṇṭhānaṃ. Uparimaṃ avalekhanasatthakasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: kammārānam ayokūṭa yottaka saṇṭhānam uparimam avalekhana satthaka saṇṭhānam

original: Akkhikūpanāsakūpaṭṭhīni apanītamiñjataruṇatālaṭṭhisaṇṭhānāni. Nalāṭaṭṭhi adhomukhaṭṭhapitasaṅkhathālakakapālasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: akkhi kūpa nāsa kūpa aṭṭhīni apanīta miñja taruṇa tāla ṭṭhi saṇṭhānāni nalāṭa ṭṭhi adhomukha ṭṭhapita saṅkhathālaka kapāla saṇṭhānam

original: Kaṇṇacūḷikaṭṭhīni nhāpitakhurakosasaṇṭhānāni. Nalāṭakaṇṇacūḷikānaṃ upari paṭṭabandhanokāse
analyzed: kaṇṇa cūḷi kaṭṭhīni nhāpita khura kosa saṇṭhānāni nalāṭa kaṇṇa cūḷikānam upari paṭṭabandhana ukāse

original: aṭṭhisaṅkuṭitaghaṭapuṇṇapaṭalakhaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ. Muddhaṭṭhi mukhacchinnavaṅkanāḷikerasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhi saṅkuṭita ghaṭa puṇṇa paṭala khaṇḍa saṇṭhānam muddhaṭṭhi mukha chinna vaṅka nāḷikera saṇṭhānam

original: Sīsaṭṭhīni sibbetvā ṭhapitajajjaralābukaṭāhasaṇṭhānāni.
analyzed: sīsa ṭṭhīni sibbetvā ṭhapita jajjara lābu kaṭāha saṇṭhānāni

original: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātāni. Okāsato avisesena sakalasarīre ṭhitāni. Visesena panettha
analyzed: disatas dvīsu disāsu jātāni okāsataḥ avisesena sakala sarīre ṭhitāni visesena pana ittha

original: sīsaṭṭhīni givaṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitāni. Gīvaṭṭhīni piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīsu. Piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni
analyzed: sīsa ṭṭhīni giva ṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitāni gīva ṭṭhīni piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīsu piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhīni

original: kaṭiṭṭhīsu. Kaṭiṭṭhīni ūruṭṭhīsu. Ūruṭṭhīni jaṇṇukaṭṭhīsu. Jaṇṇukaṭṭhīni jaṅghaṭṭhīsu.
analyzed: kaṭiṭṭhīsu kaṭiṭṭhīni ūruṭṭhīsu ūruṭṭhīni jaṇṇukaṭṭhīsu jaṇṇukaṭṭhīni jaṅghaṭṭhīsu

original: Jaṅghaṭṭhīni gopphakaṭṭhīsu. Gopphakaṭṭhīni piṭṭhipādaṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitāni. Paricchedato
analyzed: jaṅgha ṭṭhīni gopphaka ṭṭhīsu gopphaka ṭṭhīni piṭṭhi pāda ṭṭhīsu patiṭṭhitāni paricchedato

original: anto aṭṭhimiñjena, uparito maṃsena, agge mūle ca aññamaññena paricchinnāni, ayaṃ
analyzed: antar aṭṭhimiñjena uparitas maṃsena agge mūle ca aññamaññena paricchinnāni ayaṃ

original: nesaṃ sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: 191. Aṭṭhimiñjanti tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ miñjaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ.
analyzed: aṭṭhimiñjanti tesam tesam aṭṭhīnam abbhantara gatam miñjam tam vaṇṇato setam

original: Saṇṭhānato mahantamahantānaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaragataṃ veḷunāḷiyaṃ pakkhittaseditamahāvettaggasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ mahanta mahantānam aṭṭhīnam abbhantara gatam veḷu nāḷiyam pakkhitta sedita mahā vettagga saṇṭhānam

original: Khuddānukhuddakānaṃ abbhantaragataṃ veḷuyaṭṭhipabbesu pakkhittaseditatanuvettaggasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: khudda anukhuddakānam abbhantara gatam veḷu yaṭṭhi pabbesu pakkhitta sedita tanu vettagga saṇṭhānam

original: Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare patiṭṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato
analyzed: disatas dvīsu disāsu jātam okāsataḥ aṭṭhīnam abbhantare patiṭṭhitam paricchedato

original: aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantaratalehi paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo
analyzed: aṭṭhīnam abbhantara talehi paricchinnam ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ

original: pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: pana kesa sadisā uyā iva

original: 192. Vakkanti ekabandhanā dve maṃsapiṇḍikā. Taṃ vaṇṇato mandarattaṃ pāḷibhaddakaṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: eka bandhanā dve maṃsa piṇḍikā tam vaṇṇataḥ manda rattam pāḷi bhadda kaṭṭhi vaṇṇam

original: Saṇṭhānato dārakānaṃ yamakakīḷāgoḷakasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekavaṇṭapaṭibaddhaambaphaladvayasaṇṭhānaṃ
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ dārakānam yamaka kīḷā goḷaka saṇṭhānam eka vaṇṭa paṭibaddha amba phala dvaya saṇṭhānam

original: vā. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato galavāṭakā nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ
analyzed: vā disataḥ uparimāya disāya jātam okāsataḥ galavāṭakā nikkhantena eka mūlena thokam

original: gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā
analyzed: gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūla nhārunā vinibaddham hutvā hadaya maṃsam parikkhipitvā

original: ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato vakkaṃ vakkabhāgena paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: ṭhitam paricchedataḥ vakkam vakka bhāgena paricchinnam ayam assa sa bhāga paricchedaḥ

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana

original: 193. Hadayanti hadayamaṃsaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato rattapadumapattapiṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato
analyzed: hadayanti hadaya maṃsam tam vaṇṇataḥ ratta paduma patta piṭṭhi vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ

original: bāhirapattāni apanetvā adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitapadumamakuḷasaṇṭhānaṃ. Bahi maṭṭhaṃ, anto
analyzed: bāhira pattāni apanetvā adhomukham ṭhapita paduma makuḷa saṇṭhānam bahi maṭṭham antar

original: kosātakīphalassa abbhantarasadisaṃ. Paññavantānaṃ thokaṃ vikasitaṃ, mandapaññānaṃ
analyzed: kosātakī phalassa abbhantara sadisam paññavantānam thokam vikasitam manda paññānam

original: makuḷitameva. Anto cassa punnāgaṭṭhipatiṭṭhānamatto āvāṭako hoti, yattha addhapasatamattaṃ
analyzed: makuḷitam eva antaḥ cassa punnāga aṭṭhi patiṭṭhāna mattaḥ āvāṭakaḥ hoti yattha addha pasata mattam

original: lohitaṃ saṇṭhāti, yaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca vattanti. Taṃ panetaṃ
analyzed: lohitam saṇṭhāti yam nissāya manaḥ dhātu ca manaḥ viññāṇa dhātu ca vattanti tam pana itam

original: rāgacaritassa rattaṃ hoti, dosacaritassa kāḷakaṃ, mohacaritassa maṃsadhovanaudakasadisaṃ,
analyzed: rāga caritassa rattam hoti dosa caritassa kāḷakam moha caritassa maṃsa dhovana odaka sadisam

original: vitakkacaritassa kulatthayūsavaṇṇaṃ, saddhācaritassa kaṇikārapupphavaṇṇaṃ, paññācaritassa
analyzed: vitakka caritassa kulattha yūsa vaṇṇam saddhā caritassa kaṇikāra puppha vaṇṇam paññā caritassa

original: acchaṃ vippasannaṃ anāvilaṃ paṇḍaraṃ parisuddhaṃ niddhotajātimaṇi viya jutimantaṃ
analyzed: accham vippasannam anāvilam paṇḍaram parisuddham viya jutimantam

original: khāyati. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ
analyzed: khāyati disatas uparimāya disāya jātam okāsataḥ sarīra abbhantare dvinnam

original: majjhe patiṭṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato hadayaṃ hadayabhāgena paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: majjhe patiṭṭhitam paricchedataḥ hadayam hadaya bhāgena paricchinnam ayam assa sa bhāga paricchedaḥ

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana

original: 194. Yakananti yamakamaṃsapaṭalaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ paṇḍukadhātukaṃ nātirattakumudassa
analyzed: yamakam aṃsa paṭalam tam vaṇṇataḥ rattam paṇḍuka dhātukam na ati ratta kumudassa

original: pattapiṭṭhivaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato mūle ekaṃ agge yamakaṃ koviḷārapattasaṇṭhānaṃ. Tañca
analyzed: patta piṭṭhi vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ mūle ekam agge yamakam koviḷāra patta saṇṭhānam tat ca

original: dandhānaṃ ekameva hoti mahantaṃ, paññavantānaṃ dve vā tīṇi vā khuddakāni. Disato
analyzed: dandhānam ekam eva hoti mahantam paññavantānam dve vā tīṇi vā khuddakāni disatas

original: uparimāya disāya jātaṃ, okāsato dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ abbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya
analyzed: uparimāya disāya jātam okāsataḥ dvinnam thanānam abbhantare dakkhiṇa passam nissāya

original: ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato yakanaṃ yakanabhāgena paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: ṭhitam paricchedataḥ yakanam yakana bhāgena paricchinnam ayam assa sa bhāga paricchedaḥ

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana

original: 195. Kilomakanti paṭicchannāpaṭicchannabhedato duvidhaṃ pariyonahanamaṃsaṃ. Taṃ duvidhampi
analyzed: paṭicchanna apaṭicchanna bhedataḥ duvidham tam

original: vaṇṇato setaṃ dukūlapilotikavaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato attano okāsasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato paṭicchannakilomakaṃ
analyzed: vaṇṇataḥ setam dukūla pilotika vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ attanaḥ okāsa saṇṭhānam disataḥ paṭicchanna kilomakam

original: uparimāya disāya. Itaraṃ dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca
analyzed: uparimāya disāya itaram dvīsu disāsu jātam okāsataḥ paṭicchanna kilomakam hadayam ca

original: vakkañca paṭicchādetvā, appaṭicchannakilomakaṃ sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ
analyzed: vakkam ca paṭicchādetvā appaṭicchanna kilomakam sakala sarīre cammassa heṭṭhatas maṃsam

original: pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato heṭṭhā maṃsena, upari cammena, tiriyaṃ kilomakabhāgena
analyzed: ṭhitam paricchedataḥ heṭṭhā maṃsena upari cammena tiriyam kilomaka bhāgena

original: paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: paricchinnam ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: 196. Pihakanti udarajivhāmaṃsaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato nīlaṃ nigguṇḍipupphavaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato
analyzed: pihakam ti udara jivhā maṃsam tat vaṇṇataḥ nīlam nigguṇḍi puppha vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ

original: sattaṅgulappamāṇaṃ abandhanaṃ kāḷavacchakajivhāsaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya
analyzed: satta ṅgula ppamāṇam abandhanam kāḷa vacchaka jivhā saṇṭhānam disatas uparimāya disāya

original: jātaṃ. Okāsato hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ,
analyzed: jātam okāsataḥ hadayassa vāma passe udara paṭalassa matthaka passam nissāya ṭhitam

original: yasmiṃ paharaṇappahārena bahinikkhante sattānaṃ jīvitakkhayo hoti. Paricchedato pihakabhāgena
analyzed: yasmin paharaṇa ppahārena bahi nikkhante sattānam jīvita kkhayaḥ hoti paricchedato pihaka bhāgena

original: paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: paricchinnam ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: 197. Papphāsanti dvattiṃsamaṃsakhaṇḍappabhedaṃ papphāsamaṃsaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato rattaṃ
analyzed: papphāsanti dvattiṃsa maṃsa khaṇḍa ppabhedam papphāsa maṃsam tat vaṇṇataḥ rattam

original: nātipakkaudumbaraphalavaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato visamacchinnabahalapūvakhaṇḍasaṇṭhānaṃ.
analyzed: na ati pakka audumbara phala vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ visama chinna bahala pūva khaṇḍa saṇṭhānam

original: Abbhantare asitapītānaṃ abhāve uggatena kammajatejusmānā abbhāhatattā saṃkhāditapalālapiṇḍamiva
analyzed: abbhantare asita pītānam abhāve uggatena kamma ja teju smānā saṃkhādita palāla piṇḍam iva

original: nirasaṃ nirojaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ. Okāsato sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānaṃ
analyzed: nirasam nirojam disatas uparimāya disāya jātam okāsataḥ sarīra abbhantare dvinnam

original: antare hadayañca yakanañca upari chādetvā olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato papphāsabhāgena
analyzed: antare hadayam ca yakanam ca upari chādetvā olambantam ṭhitam paricchedataḥ papphāsa bhāgena

original: paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: paricchinnam ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: 198. Antanti purisassa dvattiṃsahatthā itthiyā aṭṭhavīsatihatthā ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu
analyzed: purisassa dvattiṃsa hatthā itthiyā aṭṭhavīsati hatthā ekavīsatiyā ṭhānesu

original: obhaggā antavaṭṭi. Tadetaṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ sakkharasudhāvaṇṇaṃ. Saṇṭhānato lohitadoṇiyaṃ
analyzed: obhaggā anta vaṭṭi tat etam vaṇṇato setam sakkhara sudhā vaṇṇam saṇṭhānataḥ lohita doṇiyam

original: ābhujitvā ṭhapitasīsacchinnasappasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato upari
analyzed: ābhujitvā ṭhapita sīsa chinna sappa saṇṭhānam disatas dvīsu disāsu jātam okāsataḥ upari

original: galavāṭake heṭṭhā ca karīsamagge vinibandhattā galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare
analyzed: galavāṭake heṭṭhā ca karīsa magge galavāṭaka karīsa magga pariyante sarīra abbhantare

original: ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato antabhāgena paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo
analyzed: ṭhitam paricchedataḥ anta bhāgena paricchinnam ayam assa sa bhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ

original: pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: pana kesa sadisā uyā iva

original: 199. Antaguṇanti antabhogaṭṭhānesu bandhanaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ dakasītalikamūlavaṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: anta guṇanti anta bhogaṭṭhānesu bandhanam tam vaṇṇato setam daka sītalika mūla vaṇṇam

original: Saṇṭhānato dakasītalikamūlasaṇṭhānameva. Disato dvīsu disāsu jātaṃ. Okāsato kuddālapharasukammādīni
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ daka sītalika mūla saṇṭhānam eva disataḥ dvīsu disāsu jātam okāsataḥ kuddāla phara su kamma ādīni

original: karontānaṃ yantākaḍḍhanakāle yantasuttakamiva yantaphalakāni antabhoge ekato agaḷante
analyzed: karontānam yanta ākaḍḍhana kāle yanta suttakam iva yanta phalakāni anta bhoge ekatas

original: ābandhitvā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakassa antarā saṃsibbitvā ṭhitarajjukā viya ekavīsatiyā
analyzed: ābandhitvā pāda puñchana rajju maṇḍalakassa antarā saṃsibbitvā ṭhita rajjukā viya ekavīsatiyā

original: antabhogānaṃ antarā ṭhitaṃ. Paricchedato antaguṇabhāgena paricchinnaṃ, ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo.
analyzed: anta bhogānam antarā ṭhitam paricchedataḥ anta guṇa bhāgena paricchinnam ayam assa sa bhāga paricchedaḥ

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: visa bhāga paricchedo pana

original: 200. Udariyanti udare bhavaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato ajjhohaṭāhāravaṇṇaṃ.
analyzed: udariyanti udare bhavam asita pīta khāyita sāyitam tam vaṇṇataḥ ajjhohaṭa āhāra vaṇṇam

original: Saṇṭhānato parissāvane sithilabaddhataṇḍulasaṇṭhānaṃ. Disato uparimāya disāya jātaṃ.
analyzed: saṇṭhānataḥ parissāvane sithila baddha taṇḍula saṇṭhānam disataḥ uparimāya disāya jātam

original: Okāsato udare ṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: okāsataḥ udare ṭhitam

original: Udaraṃ nāma ubhato nippīḷiyamānassa allasāṭakassa majjhe sañjātaphoṭakasadisaṃ antapaṭalaṃ,
analyzed: udaram nāma ubhatas nippīḷiyamānassa alla sāṭakassa majjhe sañjāta phoṭaka sadisam anta paṭalam

original: bahi maṭṭhaṃ, anto maṃsakasambupaliveṭhanakiliṭṭhapāvārakapupphakasadisaṃ, kuthitapanasatacassa
analyzed: bahi maṭṭham antar maṃsaka sambu paliveṭhana kiliṭṭha pāvāraka pupphaka sadisam kuthita panasa tacassa

original: abbhantarasadisantipi vattuṃ vaṭṭati, yattha takkoṭakā gaṇḍuppādakā tālahīrakā sūcimukhakā
analyzed: vattum vaṭṭati takkoṭakā gaṇḍuppādakā tālahīrakā sūcimukhakā

original: paṭatantasuttakā iccevamādidvattiṃsakulappabhedā kimayo ākulabyākulā saṇḍasaṇḍacārino
analyzed: paṭa tanta suttakāḥ ākula byākulā saṇḍa saṇḍa cārino

original: hutvā nivasanti, ye pānabhojanādimhi avijjamāne ullaṅghitvā viravantā hadayamaṃsaṃ
analyzed: hutvā nivasanti ye pāna bhojana ādimhi a vijjamāne ullaṅghitvā viravantā hadaya maṃsam

original: abhihananti, pānabhojanādiajjhoharaṇavelāyañca uddhaṃmukhā hutvā paṭhamajjhohaṭe
analyzed: abhihananti pāna bhojana ādi ajjhoharaṇa velāyan ca uddhaṃmukhāḥ hutvā paṭhama jhohaṭe

original: dve tayo ālope turitaturitā viluppanti, yaṃ tesaṃ kimīnaṃ sūtigharaṃ vaccakuṭi gilānasālā
analyzed: dve tayo ālope turita turitāḥ viluppanti yam tesam kimīnam sūtigharam vaccakuṭi gilāna sālā

original: susānañca hoti. Yattha seyyathāpi nāma caṇḍālagāmadvāre candanikāya nidāghasamaye

original: 202. Matthaluṅganti sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitamiñjarāsi. Taṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ ahicchattakapiṇḍavaṇṇaṃ.

analyzed: disatas uparimāya disāya jātam okāsataḥ sīsa kaṭāha abbhantare cattāraḥ sibbi nimagge nissāya

original: Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.

original: 203. Pittanti dve pittāni baddhapittañca abaddhapittañca. Tattha baddhapittaṃ vaṇṇato

original: ayamassa sabhāgaparicchedo. Visabhāgaparicchedo pana kesasadisoyeva.
analyzed: ayam assa sabhāga paricchedaḥ visabhāga paricchedaḥ pana

original: 204. Semhanti sarīrabbhantare ekapatthapūrappamāṇaṃ semhaṃ. Taṃ vaṇṇato setaṃ nāgabalāpaṇṇarasavaṇṇaṃ.

original: Paricchedato heṭṭhā maṃsena, upari cammena, tiriyaṃ medabhāgena paricchinno, ayamassa

original: vuṭṭhāya assāsapassāsānaṃ samudayo karajakāyo ca cittañcāti passati. Yathā hi kammāragaggariyā

original: taṃsampayuttadhamme ca arūpanti vavatthapeti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo. Vitthārato pana
analyzed: tad sampayutta dhamme ca arūpanti vavatthapeti ayam ettha saṅkhepaḥ vitthārato pana

analyzed: nāma rūpa vavatthānam paratas

original: Ettāvatā cassa gaṇanaṃ ādiṃ katvā vipassanāpariyosānā ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanā samattā hotīti ayaṃ sabbākārato paṭhamacatukkavaṇṇanā.
analyzed: ettāvatā ca ssa gaṇanam ādim katvā vipassanā pariyosānā āna apāna ssati samādhi bhāvanā samattā hoti iti ayam sabba ākārato paṭhama catukka vaṇṇanā

original: 234. Itaresu pana tīsu catukkesu yasmā visuṃ kammaṭṭhānabhāvanānayo nāma natthi. Tasmā anupadavaṇṇanānayeneva tesaṃ evaṃ attho veditabbo.

original: Pītipaṭisaṃvedīti pītiṃ paṭisaṃviditaṃ karonto pākaṭaṃ karonto assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhati. Tattha dvīhākārehi pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca.
analyzed: pīti paṭisaṃvedī iti pītim paṭisaṃviditam karontaḥ pākaṭam karontaḥ assasissāmi passasissāmi iti sikkhati tattha dvīhā ākārehi pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca

original: Kathaṃ ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati. Tassa
analyzed: katham ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti sa pītike dve jhāne samāpajjati tassa

original: pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ –

original: “Dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti.

analyzed: kāya saṅkhāram assāsa passāsa vasena cittassa ekagga tam avikkhepam pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā

analyzed: hoti tāya satiyā tena ñāṇena sā pi iti paṭisaṃviditā hoti āvajjataḥ sā pi iti paṭisaṃviditā

original: hoti. Jānato passato paccavekkhato cittaṃ adhiṭṭhahato saddhāya adhimuccato vīriyaṃ
analyzed: hoti jānataḥ passataḥ paccavekkhataḥ cittam adhiṭṭhahataḥ saddhāya adhimuccataḥ vīriyam

original: pahātabbaṃ bhāvetabbaṃ sacchikātabbaṃ sacchikaroto sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Evaṃ

analyzed: sā pi iti paṭisaṃviditā hoti iti

original: Eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbāni. Idampanettha visesamattaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ
analyzed: etena iva nayena avasesa padāni api atthataḥ veditabbāni idam pana ittha visesa mattam

original: jhānānaṃ vasena sukhapaṭisaṃveditā, catunnampi vasena cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃveditā

analyzed: veditabbā citta saṅkhāro ti vedanā ādayaḥ dve khandhā sukha paṭisaṃvedī pade ca ittha vipassanā bhūmi dassana attham

analyzed: cittam iti cittam modento pamodento hāsento pahāsento assasissāmi passasissāmi iti sikkhati

original: Tattha dvīhākārehi abhippamodo hoti samādhivasena ca vipassanāvasena ca.
analyzed: tattha dvīhākārehi abhippamodaḥ hoti samādhi vasena ca vipassanā vasena ca

original: assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti vuccati.
analyzed: assasissāmi passasissāmi iti sikkhati iti vuccati

analyzed: assasati ca iva passasati ca tena vuccati vimocayan cittam assasissāmi passasissāmi iti

original: sikkhatī”ti. Evaṃ cittānupassanāvasena idaṃ catukkaṃ bhāsitanti veditabbaṃ.

original: 236. Catutthacatukke pana aniccānupassīti ettha tāva aniccaṃ veditabbaṃ. Aniccatā veditabbā. Aniccānupassanā veditabbā. Aniccānupassī veditabbo.

original: Tattha aniccanti pañcakkhandhā. Kasmā? Uppādavayaññathattabhāvā. Aniccatāti tesaṃyeva

analyzed: saṅkhārānam khaṇa bhaṅgaḥ accanta virāgo ti nibbānam virāga anupassanā ati tad ubhaya dassana vasena

analyzed: pavattā vipassanā ca maggo ca tāya duvidhāya api anupassanāya samannāgataḥ hutvā assasanto

original: passasanto ca “virāgānupassī assasissāmi passasissāmīti sikkhatī”ti veditabbo. Nirodhānupassīpadepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: passasantaḥ ca virāga anupassī assasissāmi passasissāmi iti sikkhati iti veditabbaḥ nirodha anupassī pade pi esā eva nayo

original: Paṭinissaggānupassīti etthāpi dve paṭinissaggā pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ca pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo

original: ca. Paṭinissaggoyeva anupassanā paṭinissaggānupassanā. Vipassanāmaggānaṃ etamadhivacanaṃ.

original: ca vuccati. Maggo samucchedavasena saddhiṃ khandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati,
analyzed: ca vuccati maggaḥ samuccheda vasena saddhim khandha abhisaṅkhārehi kilese pariccajati

original: ca vuccati. Ubhayampi pana purimapurimaññāṇānaṃ anuanupassanato anupassanāti vuccati.
analyzed: ca vuccati ubhayam pi pana purima purima ññāṇānaṃ anuanupassanataḥ anupassanā ti vuccati

original: Tāya duvidhāyapi paṭinissaggānupassanāya samannāgato hutvā assasanto passasanto ca

analyzed: paṭinissagga anupassī assasissāmi passasissāmi iti sikkhati iti veditabbo

original: Idaṃ catutthacatukkaṃ suddhavipassanāvaseneva vuttaṃ. Purimāni pana tīṇi samathavipassanāvasena.
analyzed: idam catuttha catukkam suddha vipassanā vasena iva vuttam purimāni pana tīṇi samatha vipassanā vasena

original: Evaṃ catunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena soḷasavatthukāya ānāpānassatiyā bhāvanā veditabbā.
analyzed: evam catunnam catukkānam vasena soḷasa vatthukāya ānāpāna ssatiyāḥ bhāvanā veditabbā

original: 258. Tattha sukhaṃ supatīti yathā sesā janā samparivattamānā kākacchamānā dukkhaṃ supanti, evaṃ asupitvā sukhaṃ supati. Niddaṃ okkantopi samāpattiṃ samāpanno viya hoti.

original: Sukhaṃ paṭibujjhatīti yathā aññe nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhanti, evaṃ appaṭibujjhitvā vikasamānamiva padumaṃ sukhaṃ nibbikāraṃ paṭibujjhati.

original: upādinnaṃ, ayaṃ vuccatāvuso, ajjhattikā vāyodhātū”ti ca –

original: Evaṃ nātitikkhapaññassa dhātukammaṭṭhānikassa vasena vitthārato āgataṃ. Yathā cettha, evaṃ rāhulovādadhātuvibhaṅgesupi.

original: Tatrāyaṃ anuttānapadavaṇṇanā, ajjhattaṃ paccattanti idaṃ tāva ubhayampi niyakassa

original: Yaṃ vā panaññampi kiñcīti avasesesu tīsu koṭṭhāsesu pathavīdhātu saṅgahitā.

original: Vissandanabhāvena taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ appotīti āpo. Kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena nānāvidhesu āpesu gatanti āpogataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Āpodhātuyā ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ.

original: Tejanavasena tejo, vuttanayeneva tejesu gatanti tejogataṃ. Kiṃ taṃ? Uṇhattalakkhaṇaṃ.

analyzed: ettha ca purimā tayo tejodhātu samuṭṭhānā pacchimo kamma samuṭṭhānaḥ va
