original: dhātuyo pākaṭā honti. Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
analyzed: dhātuyaḥ pākaṭāḥ honti tā punappunam āvajjataḥ manasikarotaḥ vutta nayena iva upacāra samādhi uppajjati

original: 310. Yassa pana evaṃ bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati, tena sasambhāravibhattito
analyzed: yassa pana evam bhāvayataḥ kammaṭṭhānam na ijjhati tena sa sambhāra vibhattitaḥ

original: bhāvetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tena hi bhikkhunā yaṃ taṃ kāyagatāsatikammaṭṭhānaniddese sattadhā
analyzed: bhāvetabbam katham tena hi bhikkhunā yam tam kāyagata asati kammaṭṭhāna niddese sattadhā

original: uggahakosallaṃ dasadhā manasikārakosallañca vuttaṃ. Dvattiṃsākāre tāva taṃ sabbaṃ
analyzed: uggaha kosallam dasadhā manasikāra kosallam ca vuttam dvattiṃsa ākāre tāva tat sabbam

original: aparihāpetvā tacapañcakādīnaṃ anulomapaṭilomato vacasā sajjhāyaṃ ādiṃkatvā sabbaṃ
analyzed: a parihāpetvā taca pañcaka ādīnam anuloma paṭilomataḥ vacasā sajjhāyam ādiṃkatvā sabbam

original: tattha vuttavidhānaṃ kātabbaṃ. Ayameva hi viseso, tattha vaṇṇasaṇṭhānadisokāsaparicchedavasena
analyzed: tattha vutta vidhānam kātabbam ayam eva hi visesaḥ tattha vaṇṇa saṇṭhāna disā ukāsa pariccheda vasena

original: kesādayo manasikaritvāpi paṭikkūlavasena cittaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, idha dhātuvasena. Tasmā
analyzed: kesa ādayaḥ manasi karitvā api paṭikkūla vasena cittam ṭhapetabbam idha dhātu vasena tasmā

original: vaṇṇādivasena pañcadhā pañcadhā kesādayo manasikaritvā avasāne evaṃ manasikāro pavattetabbo.
analyzed: vaṇṇa ādi vasena pañcadhā pañcadhā kesa ādayaḥ manasikaritvā avasāne evam manasikāraḥ pavattetabbo

original: 311. Ime kesā nāma sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacamme jātā. Tattha yathāvammikamatthake jātesu
analyzed: ime kesāḥ nāma sīsa kaṭāha paliveṭhana camme jātā tattha yathā vammika matthake jātesu

original: kuṇṭhatiṇesu na vammikamatthako jānāti mayi kuṇṭhatiṇāni jātānīti, napi kuṇṭhatiṇāni
analyzed: kuṇṭha tiṇesu na vammika matthakaḥ jānāti mayi kuṇṭha tiṇāni jātāni iti na pi kuṇṭha tiṇāni

original: jānanti mayaṃ vammikamatthake jātānīti, evameva na sīsakaṭāhapaliveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti
analyzed: jānanti mayam vammika matthake jātāni iti evam eva na sīsa kaṭāha paliveṭhana cammam jānāti

original: mayi kesā jātāti, napi kesā jānanti mayaṃ sīsakaṭāhaveṭhanacamme jātāti, aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: mayi kesāḥ jātā ati na pi kesāḥ jānanti mayam sīsa kaṭāha veṭhana camme jātā ati aññam aññam

original: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti kesā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso
analyzed: ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti kesāḥ nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāso

original: acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: acetanaḥ a byākataḥ suññaḥ nissatto thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātū ti

original: 312. Lomā sarīraveṭhanacamme jātā. Tattha yathā suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātesu dabbatiṇakesu
analyzed: lomā sarīra veṭhana camme jātā tattha yathā suñña gāmaṭṭhāne jātesu dabba tiṇakesu

original: na suññagāmaṭṭhānaṃ jānāti mayi dabbatiṇakāni jātānīti, napi dabbatiṇakāni jānanti
analyzed: na suñña gāmaṭṭhānam jānāti mayi dabba tiṇakāni jātāni iti na pi dabba tiṇakāni jānanti

original: mayaṃ suññagāmaṭṭhāne jātānīti, evameva na sarīraveṭhanacammaṃ jānāti mayi lomā jātāti.
analyzed: mayam suñña gāmaṭṭhāne jātāni iti evam eva na sarīra veṭhana cammam jānāti mayi lomā jātā ati

original: Napi lomā jānanti mayaṃ sarīraveṭhanacamme jātāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: na pi lomā jānanti mayam sarīra veṭhana camme jātā ati aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti lomā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti lomā nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 313. Nakhā aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātā. Tattha yathā kumārakesu daṇḍakehi madhukaṭṭhike
analyzed: nakhāḥ aṅgulīnam aggesu jātā tattha yathā kumārakesu daṇḍakehi madhukaṭṭhike

original: vijjhitvā kīḷantesu na daṇḍakā jānanti amhesu madhukaṭṭhikā ṭhapitāti, napi madhukaṭṭhikā
analyzed: vijjhitvā kīḷantesu na daṇḍakāḥ jānanti amhesu madhu kaṭṭhikā ṭhapitā ati na pi madhu kaṭṭhikā

original: jānanti mayaṃ daṇḍakesu ṭhapitāti, evameva na aṅguliyo jānanti amhākaṃ aggesu nakhā
analyzed: jānanti mayam daṇḍakesu ṭhapitā ati evam eva na aṅguliyaḥ jānanti amhākam aggesu nakhā

original: jātāti. Napi nakhā jānanti mayaṃ aṅgulīnaṃ aggesu jātāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: jātā ati nakhāḥ jānanti mayam aṅgulīnam aggesu jātā ati aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti nakhā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti nakhāḥ nāma imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 314. Dantā hanukaṭṭhikesu jātā. Tattha yathā vaḍḍhakīhi pāsāṇaudukkhalakesu kenacideva
analyzed: dantāḥ hanu kaṭṭhikesu jātā tattha yathā vaḍḍhakīhi pāsāṇa odukkhalakesu kenacid eva

original: silesajātena bandhitvā ṭhapitathambhesu na udukkhalā jānanti amhesu thambhā ṭhitāti.
analyzed: silesa jātena bandhitvā ṭhapita thambhesu na udukkhalāḥ jānanti amhesu thambhā ṭhitā ati

original: Napi thambhā jānanti mayaṃ udukkhalesu ṭhitāti, evameva na hanukaṭṭhīni jānanti amhesu
analyzed: na pi thambhāḥ jānanti mayam udukkhalesu ṭhitā ati evam eva na hanu kaṭṭhīni jānanti amhesu

original: dantā jātāti. Napi dantā jānanti mayaṃ hanukaṭṭhīsu jātāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: dantāḥ jātā ati na pi dantāḥ jānanti mayam hanu kaṭṭhīsu jātā ati aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti dantā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti dantāḥ nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 315. Taco sakalasarīraṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhito. Tattha yathā allagocammapariyonaddhāya
analyzed: sakala sarīram pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaḥ tattha yathā allago camma pariyonaddhāya

original: mahāvīṇāya na mahāvīṇā jānāti ahaṃ allagocammena pariyonaddhāti. Napi allagocammaṃ
analyzed: mahāvīṇāya na mahāvīṇā jānāti aham allago cammena na pi allago cammam

original: jānāti mayā mahāvīṇā pariyonaddhāti, evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti ahaṃ tacena pariyonaddhanti.
analyzed: jānāti mayā mahā vīṇā evam eva na sarīram jānāti aham tacena

original: Napi taco jānāti mayā sarīraṃ pariyonaddhanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: tacaḥ jānāti mayā sarīram pariyonaddhanti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti taco nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti tacaḥ nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 316. Maṃsaṃ aṭṭhisaṅghāṭaṃ anulimpitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā mahāmattikalittāya bhittiyā
analyzed: maṃsam aṭṭhi saṅghāṭam anulimpitvā ṭhitam tattha yathā mahā mattika littāya bhittiyā

original: na bhitti jānāti ahaṃ mahāmattikāya littāti. Napi mahāmattikā jānāti mayā bhitti
analyzed: na bhitti jānāti aham mahā mattikāya na pi mahā mattikā jānāti mayā bhitti

original: littāti, evameva na aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo jānāti ahaṃ navapesisatappabhedena maṃsena littoti.
analyzed: littā ati evam eva na aṭṭhi saṅghāṭaḥ jānāti aham nava pesi satappa bhedena maṃsena litto ti

original: Napi maṃsaṃ jānāti mayā aṭṭhisaṅghāṭo littoti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: na pi maṃsam jānāti mayā aṭṭhi saṅghāṭaḥ littaḥ ti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti maṃsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammāḥ iti maṃsam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 317. Nhāru sarīrabbhantare aṭṭhīni ābandhamānā ṭhitā. Tattha yathā vallīhi vinaddhesu
analyzed: nhāru sarīra abbhantare aṭṭhīni ābandhamānā ṭhitā tattha yathā vallīhi vinaddhesu

original: kuṭṭadārūsu na kuṭṭadārūni jānanti mayaṃ vallīhi vinaddhānīti. Napi valliyo jānanti
analyzed: kuṭṭadārūsu na kuṭṭadārūni jānanti mayam vallīhi vinaddhāni iti na pi valliyaḥ jānanti

original: amhehi kuṭṭadārūni vinaddhānīti, evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti mayaṃ nhārūhi ābaddhānīti.
analyzed: amhehi kuṭṭadārūni vinaddhāni iti evam eva na aṭṭhīni jānanti mayam ābaddhāni iti

original: Napi nhārū jānanti amhehi aṭṭhīni ābaddhānīti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: na pi nhārū jānanti amhehi aṭṭhīni ābaddhāni iti aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti nhāru nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti nhāru nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 318. Aṭṭhīsu paṇhikaṭṭhi gopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Gopphakaṭṭhi jaṅghaṭṭhiṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhīsu paṇhika ṭṭhi gopphaka ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhitam gopphaka ṭṭhi jaṅgha ṭṭhim

original: ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Jaṅghaṭṭhi ūruṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Ūruṭṭhi kaṭiṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
analyzed: ukkhipitvā ṭhitam jaṅgha ṭṭhi ūru ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhitam ūru ṭṭhi kaṭi ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā

original: ṭhitaṃ. Kaṭiṭṭhi piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ, piṭṭhikaṇṭako gīvaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
analyzed: ṭhitam kaṭiṭṭhi piṭṭhi kaṇṭakam ukkhipitvā ṭhitam piṭṭhi kaṇṭakaḥ gīvaṭṭhim ukkhipitvā

original: ṭhito. Gīvaṭṭhi sīsaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Sīsaṭṭhi gīvaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ. Gīvaṭṭhi
analyzed: ṭhitaḥ gīva ṭṭhi sīsa ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhitam sīsa ṭṭhi gīva ṭṭhike patiṭṭhitam gīva ṭṭhi

original: piṭṭhikaṇṭake patiṭṭhitaṃ. Piṭṭhikaṇṭako kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhito. Kaṭiṭṭhi ūruṭṭhike
analyzed: piṭṭhi kaṇṭake patiṭṭhitam piṭṭhi kaṇṭakaḥ kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitaḥ kaṭiṭṭhi ūruṭṭhike

original: patiṭṭhitaṃ. Ūruṭṭhi jaṅghaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ. Jaṅghaṭṭhi gopphakaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: patiṭṭhitam ūruṭṭhi jaṅgha ṭṭhike patiṭṭhitam jaṅgha ṭṭhi gopphaka ṭṭhike patiṭṭhitam

original: Gopphakaṭṭhi paṇhikaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: goppha kaṭṭhi paṇhi kaṭṭhike patiṭṭhitam

original: Tattha yathā iṭṭhakadārugomayādisañcayesu na heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā jānanti mayaṃ uparime
analyzed: tattha yathā iṭṭhaka dāru gomaya ādi sañcayesu na heṭṭhimāḥ heṭṭhimāḥ jānanti mayam uparime

original: uparime ukkhipitvā ṭhitāti. Napi uparimā uparimā jānanti mayaṃ heṭṭhimesu heṭṭhimesu
analyzed: uparime ukkhipitvā ṭhitāti uparimāḥ uparimāḥ jānanti mayam heṭṭhimesu heṭṭhimesu

original: patiṭṭhitāti, evameva na paṇhikaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
analyzed: patiṭṭhitā ati evam eva na paṇhika ṭṭhi jānāti aham gopphaka ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti

original: Na gopphakaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti. Na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti
analyzed: na gopphakaṭṭhi jānāti aham jaṅgha ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti na jaṅgha ṭṭhi jānāti

original: ahaṃ ūruṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti. Na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti.
analyzed: aham ūruṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti na ūruṭṭhi jānāti aham kaṭiṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti

original: Na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti. Na piṭṭhikaṇṭako jānāti
analyzed: na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti aham piṭṭhi kaṇṭakam ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti na piṭṭhi kaṇṭakaḥ jānāti

original: ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti. Na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ sīsaṭṭhiṃ ukkhipitvā
analyzed: aham gīva ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā ṭhitanti na gīva ṭṭhi jānāti aham sīsa ṭṭhim ukkhipitvā

original: ṭhitanti. Na sīsaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gīvaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti. Na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ
analyzed: ṭhitanti na sīsaṭṭhi jānāti aham gīvaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti na gīvaṭṭhi jānāti aham

original: piṭṭhikaṇṭake patiṭṭhitanti. Na piṭṭhikaṇṭako jānāti ahaṃ kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitoti.
analyzed: piṭṭhikaṇṭake patiṭṭhitanti na piṭṭhikaṇṭakaḥ jānāti aham kaṭiṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitaḥ ti

original: Na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ ūruṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti. Na ūruṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ jaṅghaṭṭhimhi
analyzed: na kaṭiṭṭhi jānāti aham ūruṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti na ūruṭṭhi jānāti aham jaṅgha ṭṭhimhi

original: patiṭṭhitanti. Na jaṅghaṭṭhi jānāti ahaṃ gopphakaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti. Na gopphakaṭṭhi
analyzed: patiṭṭhitanti na jaṅgha ṭṭhi jānāti aham gopphaka ṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti na gopphaka ṭṭhi

original: jānāti ahaṃ paṇhikaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete
analyzed: jānāti aham paṇhi kaṭṭhimhi patiṭṭhitanti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete

original: dhammā. Iti aṭṭhi nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
analyzed: dhammā iti aṭṭhi nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto

original: thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pathavī dhātu uti

original: 319. Aṭṭhimiñjaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ abbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā veḷupabbādīnaṃ
analyzed: aṭṭhimiñjam tesam tesam aṭṭhīnam abbhantare ṭhitam tattha yathā veḷu pabba ādīnam

original: anto pakkhittachinnavettaggādīsu na veḷupabbādīni jānanti amhesu vettaggādīni pakkhittānīti.
analyzed: antar pakkhitta chinna vettagga ādīsu na veḷu pabba ādīni jānanti amhesu vettagga ādīni pakkhittāni iti

original: Napi vettaggādīni jānanti mayaṃ veḷupabbādīsu ṭhitānīti, evameva na aṭṭhīni jānanti
analyzed: vettagga ādīni jānanti mayam veḷu pabba ādīsu ṭhitāni iti evam eva na aṭṭhīni jānanti

original: amhākaṃ anto miñjaṃ ṭhitanti. Nāpi miñjaṃ jānāti ahaṃ aṭṭhīnaṃ anto ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: amhākam antar miñjam ṭhitanti na api miñjam jānāti aham aṭṭhīnam antar ṭhitanti aññamaññam

original: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti aṭṭhimiñjaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
analyzed: ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti aṭṭhimiñjam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekko

original: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātū ti

original: 320. Vakkaṃ galavāṭakato nikkhantena ekamūlena thokaṃ gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūlanhārunā
analyzed: vakkam galavāṭakataḥ nikkhantena eka mūlena thokam gantvā dvidhā bhinnena thūla nhārunā

original: vinibaddhaṃ hutvā hadayamaṃsaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā vaṇṭupanibaddhe
analyzed: vinibaddham hutvā hadaya maṃsam parikkhipitvā ṭhitam tattha yathā

original: ambaphaladvaye na vaṇṭaṃ jānāti mayā ambaphaladvayaṃ upanibaddhanti. Napi ambaphaladvayaṃ
analyzed: amba phala dvaye na vaṇṭam jānāti mayā amba phala dvayam amba phala dvayam

original: jānāti ahaṃ vaṇṭena upanibaddhanti, evameva na thūlanhāru jānāti mayā vakkaṃ upanibaddhanti.
analyzed: jānāti aham vaṇṭena evam eva na jānāti mayā vakkam upanibaddhanti

original: Napi vakkaṃ jānāti ahaṃ thūlanhārunā upanibaddhanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: na pi vakkam jānāti aham thūla nhārunā upanibaddha nti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti vakkaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti vakkam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 321. Hadayaṃ sarīrabbhantare uraṭṭhipañjaramajjhaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ
analyzed: hadayam sarīra abbhantare uraṭṭhi pañjara majjham nissāya ṭhitam tattha yathā jiṇṇa sandamānika pañjaram

original: nissāya ṭhapitāya maṃsapesiyā na sandamānikapañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya
analyzed: nissāya ṭhapitāya maṃsapesiyā na sandamānika pañjara abbhantaram jānāti mam nissāya

original: maṃsapesi ṭhitāti. Napi maṃsapesi jānāti ahaṃ jiṇṇasandamānikapañjaraṃ nissāya ṭhitāti,
analyzed: maṃsapesi ṭhitā ati na pi maṃsapesi jānāti aham jiṇṇa sandamānika pañjaram nissāya ṭhitā ati

original: evameva na uraṭṭhipañjarabbhantaraṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya hadayaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi hadayaṃ
analyzed: evam eva na uraṭṭhi pañjara abbhantaram jānāti mam nissāya hadayam hadayam

original: jānāti ahaṃ uraṭṭhipañjaraṃ nissāya ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: jānāti aham uraṭṭhi pañjaram nissāya ṭhitanti aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti hadayaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammāḥ iti hadayam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 322. Yakanaṃ antosarīre dvinnaṃ thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: ya kanam antosarīre dvinnam tha nānam abbhantare dakkhiṇa passam nissāya ṭhitam

original: Tattha yathā ukkhalikapālapassamhi lagge yamakamaṃsapiṇḍe na ukkhalikapālapassaṃ
analyzed: tattha yathā ukkhali kapāla passamhi lagge yamaka maṃsa piṇḍe na ukkhali kapāla passam

original: jānāti mayi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo laggoti. Napi yamakamaṃsapiṇḍo jānāti ahaṃ ukkhalikapālapasse
analyzed: jānāti mayi yamaka maṃsa piṇḍaḥ laggo ti yamaka maṃsa piṇḍaḥ jānāti aham ukkhali kapāla passe

original: laggoti, evameva na thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya yakanaṃ
analyzed: laggo ti evam eva na tha nānam abbhantare dakkhiṇa passam jānāti mam nissāya ya kanam

original: ṭhitanti. Napi yakanaṃ jānāti ahaṃ thanānamabbhantare dakkhiṇapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
analyzed: ṭhitanti na pi ya kanam jānāti aham tha nānam abbhantare dakkhiṇa passam nissāya ṭhitanti

original: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti yakanaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
analyzed: aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti yakanam nāma imasmim sarīre

original: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddho pathavī dhātū ti

original: 323. Kilomakesu paṭicchannakilomakaṃ hadayañca vakkañca parivāretvā ṭhitaṃ. Appaṭicchannakilomakaṃ
analyzed: kilomakesu paṭicchanna kilomakam hadayam ca vakkam ca parivāretvā ṭhitam appaṭicchanna kilomakam

original: sakalasarīre cammassa heṭṭhato maṃsaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pilotikapaliveṭhite
analyzed: sakala sarīre cammassa heṭṭhatas maṃsam pariyonandhitvā ṭhitam tattha yathā pilotika paliveṭhite

original: maṃse na maṃsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pilotikāya paliveṭhitanti. Napi pilotikā jānāti mayā
analyzed: maṃse na maṃsam jānāti aham pilotikāya na pilotikā jānāti mayā

original: maṃsaṃ paliveṭhitanti, evameva na vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre ca maṃsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ
analyzed: maṃsam evam eva na sakala sarīre ca maṃsam jānāti aham

original: kilomakena paṭicchannanti. Napi kilomakaṃ jānāti mayā vakkahadayāni sakalasarīre
analyzed: kilomakena kilomakam jānāti mayā sakala sarīre

original: ca maṃsaṃ paṭicchannanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti kilomakaṃ
analyzed: ca maṃsam paṭicchannanti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti kilomakam

original: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nāma imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 324. Pihakaṃ hadayassa vāmapasse udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: pihakam hadayassa vāma passe udara paṭalassa matthaka passam nissāya ṭhitam tattha

original: yathā koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitāya gomayapiṇḍiyā na koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ
analyzed: yathā koṭṭha matthaka passam nissāya ṭhitāya gomaya piṇḍiyā na koṭṭha matthaka passam

original: jānāti gomayapiṇḍi maṃ nissāya ṭhitāti. Napi gomayapiṇḍi jānāti ahaṃ koṭṭhamatthakapassaṃ
analyzed: jānāti gomaya piṇḍi mam nissāya ṭhitā ati na pi gomaya piṇḍi jānāti aham koṭṭha matthaka passam

original: nissāya ṭhitāti, evameva na udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ jānāti pihakaṃ maṃ nissāya
analyzed: nissāya ṭhitā ati evam eva na udara paṭalassa matthaka passam jānāti pihakam mam nissāya

original: ṭhitanti. Napi pihakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udarapaṭalassa matthakapassaṃ nissāya ṭhitanti.
analyzed: na pi pihakam jānāti aham udara paṭalassa matthaka passam nissāya ṭhitanti

original: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti pihakaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
analyzed: aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti pihakam nāma imasmim sarīre

original: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddho pathavī dhātū ti

original: 325. Papphāsaṃ sarīrabbhantare dvinnaṃ thanānamantare hadayañca yakanañca upari chādetvā
analyzed: papphāsam sarīra abbhantare dvinnam thanānam antare hadayam ca yakanam ca upari chādetvā

original: olambantaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāne sakuṇakulāvake na
analyzed: olambantam ṭhitam tattha yathā jiṇṇa koṭṭhabbha antare lambamāne sa kuṇa kulāvake na

original: jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantaraṃ jānāti mayi sakuṇakulāvako lambamāno ṭhitoti. Napi sakuṇakulāvako
analyzed: jiṇṇa koṭṭhabbhantaram jānāti mayi sa kuṇa kulāvakaḥ lambamānaḥ ṭhitaḥ iti sa kuṇa kulāvakaḥ

original: jānāti ahaṃ jiṇṇakoṭṭhabbhantare lambamāno ṭhitoti, evameva na taṃ sarīrabbhantaraṃ
analyzed: jānāti aham jiṇṇa koṭṭhabbhantare lambamānaḥ ṭhitaḥ iti evam eva na tam sarīra bbhantaram

original: jānāti mayi papphāsaṃ lambamānaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi papphāsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ evarūpe sarīrabbhantare
analyzed: jānāti mayi papphāsam lambamānam ṭhitanti na pi papphāsam jānāti aham evarūpe sarīra abbhantare

original: lambamānaṃ ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti papphāsaṃ
analyzed: lambamānam ṭhitan ti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti papphāsam

original: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nāma imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 326. Antaṃ galavāṭakakarīsamaggapariyante sarīrabbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā lohitadoṇikāya
analyzed: antam galavāṭaka karīsa magga pariyante sarīra abbhantare ṭhitam tattha yathā lohitadoṇikāya

original: obhujitvā ṭhapite chinnasīsadhammanikaḷevare na lohitadoṇi jānāti mayi dhammanikaḷevaraṃ
analyzed: obhujitvā ṭhapite chinna sīsa dhamma nikaḷevare na lohita doṇi jānāti mayi dhamma nikaḷevaram

original: ṭhitanti. Napi dhammanikaḷevaraṃ jānāti ahaṃ lohitadoṇiyā ṭhitanti, evameva na sarīrabbhantaraṃ
analyzed: dhamma nikaḷevaram jānāti aham lohita doṇiyā evam eva na sarīra bbhantaram

original: jānāti mayi antaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi antaṃ jānāti ahaṃ sarīrabbhantare ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: jānāti mayi antam antam antam jānāti aham sarīra abbhantare aññam aññam

original: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti antaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso
analyzed: ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti antam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāso

original: acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: acetanaḥ a byākataḥ suññaḥ nissatto thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātū ti

original: 327. Antaguṇaṃ antantare ekavīsatiantabhoge bandhitvā ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ
analyzed: anta guṇam anta antare ekavīsati anta bhoge bandhitvā ṭhitam yathā pāda puñchana rajju maṇḍalakam

original: sibbetvā ṭhitesu rajjukesu na pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ jānāti rajjukā maṃ sibbitvā
analyzed: sibbetvā ṭhitesu rajjukesu na pāda puñchana rajju maṇḍalakam jānāti rajjukāḥ mama sibbitvā

original: ṭhitāti. Napi rajjukā jānanti mayaṃ pādapuñchanarajjumaṇḍalakaṃ sibbitvā ṭhitāti,
analyzed: ṭhitā ati rajjukāḥ jānanti mayam pāda puñchana rajju maṇḍalakam sibbitvā ṭhitā ati

original: evameva na antaṃ jānāti antaguṇaṃ maṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitanti. Napi antaguṇaṃ jānāti
analyzed: evam eva na antam jānāti anta guṇam mam anta guṇam jānāti

original: ahaṃ antaṃ ābandhitvā ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
analyzed: aham antam ābandhitvā ṭhitanti aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammā

original: Iti antaguṇaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
analyzed: iti anta guṇam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto

original: thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pathavī dhātu uti

original: 328. Udariyaṃ udare ṭhitaṃ asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ. Tattha yathā suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhite
analyzed: udariyam udare ṭhitam asita pīta khāyita sāyitam tattha yathā suvāna doṇiyam ṭhite

original: suvānavamathumhi na suvānadoṇi jānāti mayi suvānavamathu ṭhitoti. Napi suvānavamathu
analyzed: na suvāna doṇi jānāti mayi suvāna vamathu ṭhitaḥ iti na pi suvāna vamathu

original: jānāti ahaṃ suvānadoṇiyaṃ ṭhitoti, evameva na udaraṃ jānāti mayi udariyaṃ ṭhitanti.
analyzed: jānāti aham suvāna doṇiyam ṭhitā iti evam eva naḥ udaram jānāti mayi udariyam ṭhitanti

original: Napi udariyaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udare ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete
analyzed: udariyam jānāti aham udare aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete

original: dhammā. Iti udariyaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: dhammāḥ iti udariyam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātu uti

original: 329. Karīsaṃ pakkāsayasaṅkhāte aṭṭhaṅgulaveḷupabbasadise antapariyosāne ṭhitaṃ. Tattha
analyzed: karīsam pakka āsaya saṅkhāte aṭṭhaṅgula veḷu pabba sadise anta pariyosāne ṭhitam tattha

original: yathā veḷupabbe omadditvā pakkhittāya saṇhapaṇḍumattikāya na veḷupabbaṃ jānāti mayi
analyzed: yathā veḷu pabbe omadditvā pakkhittāya saṇha paṇḍu mattikāya na veḷu pabbam jānāti mayi

original: paṇḍumattikā ṭhitāti. Napi paṇḍumattikā jānāti ahaṃ veḷupabbe ṭhitāti, evameva na
analyzed: paṇḍu mattikā ṭhitā ati na pi paṇḍu mattikā jānāti aham veḷu pabbe ṭhitā ati evam eva na

original: pakkāsayo jānāti mayi karīsaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi karīsaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pakkāsaye ṭhitanti.
analyzed: pakka āsayaḥ jānāti mayi karīsam ṭhitanti na pi karīsam jānāti aham pakka āsaye ṭhitanti

original: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti karīsaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
analyzed: aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti karīsam nāma imasmim sarīre

original: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddho pathavī dhātū ti

original: 330. Matthaluṅgaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā purāṇalābukaṭāhe pakkhittāya
analyzed: mattha luṅgam sīsa kaṭāha abbhantare ṭhitam tattha yathā purāṇa lābu kaṭāhe pakkhittāya

original: piṭṭhapiṇḍiyā na lābukaṭāhaṃ jānāti mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi ṭhitāti. Napi piṭṭhapiṇḍi jānāti
analyzed: piṭṭhapiṇḍiyā na lābu kaṭāham jānāti mayi piṭṭhapiṇḍi ṭhitā ati na pi piṭṭhapiṇḍi jānāti

original: ahaṃ lābukaṭāhe ṭhitāti, evameva na sīsakaṭāhabbhantaraṃ jānāti mayi matthaluṅgaṃ
analyzed: aham lābu kaṭāhe ṭhitā ati evam eva na sīsa kaṭāha bbhantaram jānāti mayi mattha luṅgam

original: ṭhitanti. Napi matthaluṅgaṃ jānāti ahaṃ sīsakaṭāhabbhantare ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: mattha luṅgam jānāti aham sīsa kaṭāha bhantare ṭhitanti aññam aññam

original: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti matthaluṅgaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
analyzed: ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti matthaluṅgam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekko

original: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto thaddho pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto thaddhaḥ pathavī dhātū ti

original: 331. Pittesu abaddhapittaṃ jīvitindriyapaṭibaddhaṃ sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: pittesu abaddhapittam jīvitindriya paṭibaddham sakala sarīram byāpetvā ṭhitam

original: Baddhapittaṃ pittakosake ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhite tele na pūvaṃ
analyzed: baddha pittam pitta kosake ṭhitam tattha yathā pūvam byāpetvā ṭhite tele na pūvam

original: jānāti telaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti. Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ pūvaṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti,
analyzed: jānāti telam mam byāpetvā ṭhitanti napi telam jānāti aham pūvam byāpetvā ṭhitanti

original: evameva na sarīraṃ jānāti abaddhapittaṃ maṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti. Napi abaddhapittaṃ
analyzed: evam eva na sarīram jānāti abaddha pittam mam abaddha pittam

original: jānāti ahaṃ sarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitanti. Yathā vassodakena puṇṇe kosātakikosake na
analyzed: jānāti aham sarīram byāpetvā ṭhitanti yathā vassa udakena puṇṇe kosātaki kosake na

original: kosātakikosako jānāti mayi vassodakaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi vassodakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ kosātakikosake
analyzed: kosātaki kosakaḥ jānāti mayi vassa udakam ṭhitanti na pi vassa udakam jānāti aham kosātaki kosake

original: ṭhitanti, evameva na pittakosako jānāti mayi baddhapittaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi baddhapittaṃ
analyzed: evam eva na pitta kosakaḥ jānāti mayi baddha pittam ṭhitanti na pi baddha pittam

original: jānāti ahaṃ pittakosake ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
analyzed: jānāti aham pittakosake ṭhitanti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammā

original: Iti pittaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
analyzed: iti pittam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto

original: yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ

original: 332. Semhaṃ ekapatthapūrappamāṇaṃ udarapaṭale ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā upari sañjātapheṇapaṭalāya
analyzed: semham eka pattha pūra ppamāṇam udara paṭale ṭhitam yathā upari sañjāta pheṇa paṭalāya

original: candanikāya na candanikā jānāti mayi pheṇapaṭalaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi pheṇapaṭalaṃ jānāti
analyzed: candanikāya na candanikā jānāti mayi pheṇa paṭalam na pi pheṇa paṭalam jānāti

original: ahaṃ candanikāya ṭhitanti, evameva na udarapaṭalaṃ jānāti mayi semhaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi
analyzed: aham candanikāya evam eva na udara paṭalam jānāti mayi semham

original: semhaṃ jānāti ahaṃ udarapaṭale ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete
analyzed: sa imham jānāti aham udara paṭale ṭhitanti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete

original: dhammā. Iti semhaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: dhammāḥ iti semham nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ āpodhātu iti

original: 333. Pubbo anibaddhokāso yattha yattheva khāṇukaṇṭakappaharaṇaaggijālādīhi abhihate
analyzed: pubbaḥ a nibaddha ukāsaḥ yattha yattha iva khāṇu kaṇṭaka paharaṇa aggi jāla ādīhi abhihate

original: sarīrappadese lohitaṃ saṇṭhahitvā paccati, gaṇḍapīḷakādayo vā uppajjanti, tattha
analyzed: sarīra ppadese lohitam saṇṭhahitvā paccati gaṇḍa pīḷaka ādayaḥ vā uppajjanti tattha

original: tattha tiṭṭhati. Tattha yathā pharasuppahārādivasena paggharitaniyyāse rukkhe na
analyzed: tattha tiṭṭhati tattha yathā phara suppahāra ādi vasena paggharita niyyāse rukkhe na

original: rukkhassa pahārādippadesā jānanti amhesu niyyāso ṭhitoti, napi niyyāso jānāti ahaṃ
analyzed: rukkhassa pahāra ādi padesāḥ jānanti amhesu niyyāsaḥ ṭhitaḥ ti na pi niyyāsaḥ jānāti aham

original: rukkhassa pahārādippadesesu ṭhitoti, evameva na sarīrassa khāṇukaṇṭakādīhi abhihatappadesā
analyzed: rukkhassa pahāra ādi ppadesesu ṭhitaḥ ti evam eva na sarīrassa khāṇu kaṇṭaka ādīhi abhihata ppadesā

original: jānanti amhesu pubbo ṭhitoti. Napi pubbo jānāti ahaṃ tesu padesesu ṭhitoti. Aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: jānanti amhesu pubbaḥ ṭhito ti na pi pubbaḥ jānāti aham tesu padesesu ṭhitaḥ iti aññam aññam

original: ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti pubbo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso
analyzed: ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti pubbaḥ nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāso

original: acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: acetanaḥ a byākataḥ suññaḥ nissattaḥ yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ āpodhātu uti

original: 334. Lohitesu saṃsaraṇalohitaṃ pittaṃ viya sakalasarīraṃ byāpetvā ṭhitaṃ. Sannicitalohitaṃ
analyzed: lohitesu saṃsaraṇa lohitam pittam sakala sarīram ṭhitam sannicita lohitam

original: yakanaṭṭhānassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā ekapatthapūramattaṃ vakkahadayayakanapapphāsāni
analyzed: yakana ṭṭhānassa heṭṭhā bhāgam pūretvā eka pattha pūra mattam vakkahadaya yakana papphāsāni

original: tementaṃ ṭhitaṃ. Tattha saṃsaraṇalohite abaddhapittasadisova vinicchayo. Itaraṃ pana
analyzed: ṭhitam tattha saṃsaraṇa lohite abaddha pitta sadisaḥ uva vinicchayaḥ itaram pana

original: yathā jajjarakapāle ovaṭṭhe udake heṭṭhā leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni temayamāne na leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni
analyzed: yathā jajjara kapāle ovaṭṭhe udake heṭṭhā leḍḍu khaṇḍa ādīni temayamāne na leḍḍu khaṇḍa ādīni

original: jānanti mayaṃ udakena temiyamānāti. Napi udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ leḍḍukhaṇḍādīni tememīti,
analyzed: jānanti udakena udakam udakam jānāti aham leḍḍu khaṇḍa ādīni tememi iti

original: evameva na yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṭṭhānaṃ vakkādīni vā jānanti mayi lohitaṃ ṭhitaṃ
analyzed: evam eva na yakanassa heṭṭhā bhāga ṭṭhānam vakka ādīni vā jānanti mayi lohitam ṭhitam

original: amhe vā temayamānaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi lohitaṃ jānāti ahaṃ yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgaṃ pūretvā
analyzed: vā temayamānam ṭhitanti lohitam jānāti aham yakanassa heṭṭhābhāgam pūretvā

original: vakkādīni temayamānaṃ ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
analyzed: vakka ādīni temayamānam ṭhitanti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammā

original: Iti lohitaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
analyzed: iti lohitam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto

original: yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ

original: 335. Sedo aggisantāpādikālesu kesalomakūpavivarāni pūretvā tiṭṭhati ceva paggharati
analyzed: sedaḥ aggi santāpa ādi kālesu kesa lomakūpa vivarāni pūretvā tiṭṭhati ca iva paggharati

original: ca. Tattha yathā udakā abbūḷhamattesu bhisamuḷālakumudanāḷakalāpesu na bhisādikalāpavivarāni
analyzed: ca tattha yathā udakāḥ abbūḷha mattesu bhisa muḷāla kumuda nāḷa kalāpesu na bhisa ādi kalāpa vivarāni

original: jānanti amhehi udakaṃ paggharatīti. Napi bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharantaṃ udakaṃ
analyzed: jānanti amhehi udakam paggharati iti bhisa ādi kalāpa vivarehi paggharantam udakam

original: jānāti ahaṃ bhisādikalāpavivarehi paggharāmīti, evameva na kesalomakūpavivarāni jānanti
analyzed: jānāti aham bhisa ādi kalāpa vivarehi paggharāmi iti evam eva na kesa lomakūpa vivarāni jānanti

original: amhehi sedo paggharatīti. Napi sedo jānāti ahaṃ kesalomakūpavivarehi paggharāmīti.
analyzed: amhehi sedaḥ paggharati iti na pi sedaḥ jānāti aham kesa lomakūpa vivarehi paggharāmi iti

original: Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti sedo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
analyzed: aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti sedaḥ nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekko

original: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissattaḥ yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ āpodhātu uti

original: 336. Medo thūlassa sakalasarīraṃ pharitvā kisassa jaṅghamaṃsādīni nissāya ṭhito patthinnasineho.
analyzed: medaḥ thūlassa sakala sarīram pharitvā kisassa jaṅgha maṃsa ādīni nissāya ṭhitaḥ patthinna sinehaḥ

original: Tattha yathā haliddipilotikapaṭicchanne maṃsapuñje na maṃsapuñjo jānāti maṃ nissāya
analyzed: tattha yathā haliddi pilotika paṭicchanne maṃsa puñje na maṃsa puñjaḥ jānāti mam nissāya

original: haliddipilotikā ṭhitāti. Napi haliddipilotikā jānāti ahaṃ maṃsapuñjaṃ nissāya ṭhitāti,
analyzed: haliddi pilotikā ṭhitā ati na pi haliddi pilotikā jānāti aham maṃsa puñjam nissāya ṭhitā ati

original: evameva na sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ jānāti maṃ nissāya medo ṭhitoti. Napi
analyzed: evam eva na sakala sarīre jaṅghā ādīsu vā maṃsam jānāti mam nissāya medaḥ ṭhito ti na pi

original: medo jānāti ahaṃ sakalasarīre jaṅghādīsu vā maṃsaṃ nissāya ṭhitoti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: medaḥ jānāti aham sakala sarīre jaṅghā ādīsu vā maṃsam nissāya ṭhitaḥ ti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti medo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti medaḥ nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto patthinnayūso ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ patthinna yūsaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ āpodhātu iti

original: 337. Assu yadā sañjāyati tadā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā. Tattha
analyzed: assu yadā sañjāyati tadā akkhikūpake pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā

original: yathā udakapuṇṇesu taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu na taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakā jānanti amhesu
analyzed: yathā udaka puṇṇesu taruṇa tālaṭṭhi kūpakesu na taruṇa tālaṭṭhi kūpakāḥ jānanti amhesu

original: udakaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ taruṇatālaṭṭhikūpakesu
analyzed: udakam taruṇa tāla ṭṭhi kūpakesu udakam jānāti aham taruṇa tāla ṭṭhi kūpakesu

original: ṭhitanti, evameva na akkhikūpakā jānanti amhesu assu ṭhitanti. Napi assu jānāti ahaṃ
analyzed: evam eva na akkhikūpakāḥ jānanti amhesu assu ṭhitanti na pi assu jānāti aham

original: akkhikūpakesu ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti assu
analyzed: akkhi kūpakesu ṭhitanti aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti

original: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto
analyzed: nāma imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissattaḥ yūsa bhūto

original: ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: ābandhana ākāraḥ

original: 338. Vasā aggisantāpādikāle hatthatalahatthapiṭṭhipādatalapādapiṭṭhi nāsāpuṭanalāṭaaṃsakūṭesu
analyzed: vasā aggi santāpa ādi kāle hattha talahattha piṭṭhi pāda tala pāda piṭṭhi nāsā puṭa na lāṭa aṃsakūṭesu

original: ṭhitavilīnasneho. Tattha yathā pakkhittatele ācāme na ācāmo jānāti maṃ telaṃ ajjhottharitvā
analyzed: ṭhita vilīna snehaḥ tattha yathā pakkhitta tele ācāme na ācāmaḥ jānāti mam telam ajjhottharitvā

original: ṭhitanti. Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ ācāmaṃ ajjhottharitvā ṭhitanti, evameva na hatthatalādippadeso
analyzed: telam jānāti aham ācāmam ajjhottharitvā ṭhitanti evam eva na hattha tala ādi ppadeso

original: jānāti maṃ vasā ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāti. Napi vasā jānāti ahaṃ hatthatalādippadesaṃ
analyzed: jānāti mam vasā ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā ati vasā jānāti aham hattha tala ādi ppadesam

original: ajjhottharitvā ṭhitāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti vasā
analyzed: ajjhottharitvā ṭhitā ati aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti vasā

original: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto
analyzed: nāma imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissattaḥ yūsa bhūto

original: ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: ābandhana ākāraḥ

original: 339. Kheḷo tathārūpe kheḷuppattipaccaye sati ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale
analyzed: kheḍaḥ tathārūpe kheḷa uppatti paccaye sati ubhohi kapola passehi orohitvā jivhā tale

original: tiṭṭhati. Tattha yathā abbocchinnaudakanissande nadītīrakūpake na kūpatalaṃ jānāti
analyzed: tiṭṭhati tattha yathā abba ucchinna audaka nissande nadī tīra kūpake na kūpa talam jānāti

original: mayi udakaṃ santiṭṭhatīti. Napi udakaṃ jānāti ahaṃ kūpatale santiṭṭhāmīti, evameva
analyzed: mayi udakam santiṭṭhati iti udakam jānāti aham kūpa tale santiṭṭhāmi iti evam eva

original: na jivhātalaṃ jānāti mayi ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā kheḷo ṭhitoti. Napi kheḷo
analyzed: na jivhā talam jānāti mayi ubhohi kapola passehi orohitvā kheḷaḥ ṭhitaḥ ti na pi kheḷaḥ

original: jānāti ahaṃ ubhohi kapolapassehi orohitvā jivhātale ṭhitoti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: jānāti aham ubhohi kapola passehi orohitvā jivhā tale ṭhitaḥ ti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti kheḷo nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño
analyzed: ete dhammā iti kheḷaḥ nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suñño

original: nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: nissattaḥ yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ āpodhātu iti

original: 340. Siṅghāṇikā yadā sañjāyati, tadā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā.
analyzed: siṅghāṇikā yadā sañjāyati tadā nāsāpuṭe pūretvā tiṭṭhati vā paggharati vā

original: Tattha yathā pūtidadhibharitāya sippikāya na sippikā jānāti mayi pūtidadhi ṭhitanti.
analyzed: tattha yathā pūti dadhi bharitāya sippikāya na sippikā jānāti mayi pūti dadhi ṭhitan ti

original: Napi pūtidadhi jānāti ahaṃ sippikāya ṭhitanti, evameva na nāsāpuṭā jānanti amhesu
analyzed: pūti dadhi jānāti aham sippikāya evam eva na nāsāpuṭāḥ jānanti amhesu

original: siṅghāṇikā ṭhitāti. Napi siṅghāṇikā jānāti ahaṃ nāsāpuṭesu ṭhitāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā
analyzed: siṅghāṇikā ṭhitā ati na pi siṅghāṇikā jānāti aham nāsā puṭesu ṭhitā ati aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitā

original: ete dhammā. Iti siṅghāṇikā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato
analyzed: ete dhammāḥ iti siṅghāṇikā nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato

original: suñño nissatto yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: suññaḥ nissattaḥ yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ āpodhātu uti

original: 341. Lasikā aṭṭhikasandhīnaṃ abbhañjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā asītisatasandhīsu ṭhitā.
analyzed: lasikā aṭṭhika sandhīnam abbhañjana kiccam sādhayamānā asīti sata sandhīsu ṭhitā

original: Tattha yathā telabbhañjite akkhe na akkho jānāti maṃ telaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhitanti.
analyzed: tattha yathā tela bbhañjite akkhe na akkhaḥ jānāti mam telam abbhañjitvā ṭhitanti

original: Napi telaṃ jānāti ahaṃ akkhaṃ abbhañjitvā ṭhitanti, evameva na asītisatasandhayo
analyzed: na pi telam jānāti aham akkham abbhañjitvā ṭhitanti evam eva na asīti sata sandhayaḥ

original: jānanti lasikā amhe abbhañjitvā ṭhitāti. Napi lasikā jānāti ahaṃ asītisatasandhayo
analyzed: jānanti lasikāḥ amhe ṭhitā ati lasikā jānāti aham asi iti sata sandhayaḥ

original: abbhañjitvā ṭhitāti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā. Iti lasikā
analyzed: abbhañjitvā ṭhitā ati aññamaññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammāḥ iti lasikā

original: nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto yūsabhūto
analyzed: nāma imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissattaḥ yūsa bhūto

original: ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: ābandhana ākāraḥ

original: 342. Muttaṃ vatthissa abbhantare ṭhitaṃ. Tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe
analyzed: muttam vatthissa abbhantare ṭhitam tattha yathā candanikāya pakkhitte amukhe

original: ravaṇaghaṭe na ravaṇaghaṭo jānāti mayi candanikāraso ṭhitoti. Napi candanikāraso
analyzed: ravaṇa ghaṭe na ravaṇa ghaṭaḥ jānāti mayi candanikā rasaḥ ṭhitaḥ iti candanikā rasaḥ

original: jānāti ahaṃ ravaṇaghaṭe ṭhitoti, evameva na vatthi jānāti mayi muttaṃ ṭhitanti. Napi
analyzed: jānāti aham ravaṇa ghaṭe ṭhitaḥ iti evam eva na jānāti mayi muttam ṭhitanti na pi

original: muttaṃ jānāti ahaṃ vatthimhi ṭhitanti. Aññamaññaṃ ābhogapaccavekkhaṇarahitā ete dhammā.
analyzed: muttam jānāti aham vatthimhi ṭhitanti aññam aññam ābhoga paccavekkhaṇa rahitāḥ ete dhammā

original: Iti muttaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto
analyzed: iti muttam nāma imasmim sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto

original: yūsabhūto ābandhanākāro āpodhātūti.
analyzed: yūsa bhūtaḥ ābandhana ākāraḥ

original: 343. Evaṃ kesādīsu manasikāraṃ pavattetvā yena santappati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko
analyzed: evam kesa ādīsu manasikāram pavattetvā yena santappati ayam imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ

original: koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātūti, yena jīrīyati,
analyzed: koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto paripācana ākāro tejaḥ dhātu uti yena jīrīyati

original: yena pariḍayhati, yena asitapītakhāyitasāyitaṃ sammā pariṇāmaṃ gacchati, ayaṃ imasmiṃ
analyzed: yena pariḍayhati yena asita pīta khāyita sāyitam sammā pariṇāmam gacchati ayam imasmin

original: sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto paripācanākāro tejodhātūti
analyzed: sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissatto paripācana ākāro tejaḥ dhātu uti

original: evaṃ tejokoṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattetabbo.
analyzed: evam tejaḥ koṭṭhāsesu manasikāraḥ pavattetabbo

original: 344. Tato uddhaṅgame vāte uddhaṅgamavasena pariggahetvā adhogame adhogamavasena,
analyzed: tatas uddhaṅgame vāte uddhaṅgama vasena pariggahetvā adhogame adhogama vasena

original: kucchisaye kucchisayavasena, koṭṭhāsaye koṭṭhāsayavasena, aṅgamaṅgānusārimhi aṅgamaṅgānusārivasena,
analyzed: kucchi saye kucchi saya vasena koṭṭhāsaye koṭṭhāsaya vasena aṅgamaṅga anusārimhi aṅgamaṅga anusāri vasena

original: assāsapassāse assāsapassāsavasena pariggahetvā uddhaṅgamā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre
analyzed: assāsa passāse assāsa passāsa vasena pariggahetvā uddhaṅgamāḥ vātāḥ nāma imasmim sarīre

original: pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro vāyodhātūti,
analyzed: pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato suññaḥ nissattaḥ vitthambhana ākāraḥ vāyodhātu uti

original: adhogamā vātā nāma, kucchisayā vātā nāma, koṭṭhāsayā vātā nāma, aṅgamaṅgānusārino
analyzed: adhogamāḥ vātāḥ nāma kucchisayāḥ vātāḥ nāma koṭṭhāsayāḥ vātāḥ nāma aṅgamaṅga anusārino

original: vātā nāma, assāsapassāsā vātā nāma imasmiṃ sarīre pāṭiyekko koṭṭhāso acetano abyākato
analyzed: vātāḥ nāma assāsa passāsāḥ vātāḥ nāma imasmin sarīre pāṭiyekkaḥ koṭṭhāsaḥ acetanaḥ abyākato

original: suñño nissatto vitthambhanākāro vāyodhātūti evaṃ vāyokoṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattetabbo.
analyzed: suññaḥ nissattaḥ vitthambhana ākāraḥ vāyo dhātu iti evam vāyo koṭṭhāsesu manasikāro pavattetabbo

original: Tassevaṃ pavattamanasikārassa dhātuyo pākaṭā honti. Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto
analyzed: tassa ivam pavatta manasikārassa dhātuyaḥ pākaṭāḥ honti tā punappunam āvajjataḥ manasikaroto

original: vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
analyzed: vutta nayena iva upacāra samādhi uppajjati

original: 345. Yassa pana evaṃ bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati, tena salakkhaṇasaṅkhepato
analyzed: yassa pana evam bhāvayataḥ kammaṭṭhānam na ijjhati tena sa lakkhaṇa saṅkhepato

original: bhāvetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ.
analyzed: bhāvetabbam katham vīsatiyā koṭṭhāsesu thaddha lakkhaṇam pathavī dhātu uti vavatthapetabbam

original: Tattheva ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti. Paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti. Vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti.
analyzed: tattha iva ābandhana lakkhaṇam āpaḥ dhātu uti paripācana lakkhaṇam tejaḥ dhātu uti vitthambhana lakkhaṇam vāyaḥ dhātu uti

original: Dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tattheva paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti. Vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti. Thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti.
analyzed: dvādasasu koṭṭhāsesu ābandhana lakkhaṇam āpaḥ dhātu uti vavatthapetabbam tattha eva paripācana lakkhaṇam tejaḥ dhātu uti vitthambhana lakkhaṇam vāyo dhātu uti thaddha lakkhaṇam pathavī dhātu uti

original: Catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tena avinibhuttaṃ
analyzed: catūsu koṭṭhāsesu paripācana lakkhaṇam tejodhātu uti vavatthapetabbam tena a vinibhuttam

original: vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti. Thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ pathavīdhātūti. Ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti.
analyzed: vitthambhana lakkhaṇam vāyo dhātu uti thaddha lakkhaṇam pathavī dhātu uti ābandhana lakkhaṇam āpaḥ dhātu uti

original: Chasu koṭṭhāsesu vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tattheva thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: chasu koṭṭhāsesu vitthambhana lakkhaṇam vāyodhātu uti vavatthapetabbam tattha iva thaddha lakkhaṇam

original: pathavīdhātūti. Ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti. Paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ tejodhātūti. Tassevaṃ
analyzed: pathavī dhātu uti ābandhana lakkhaṇam āpaḥ dhātu uti paripācana lakkhaṇam tejaḥ dhātu uti tassa evam

original: vavatthāpayato dhātuyo pākaṭā honti. Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva
analyzed: vavatthāpayataḥ dhātuyaḥ pākaṭāḥ honti tāḥ punappunam āvajjataḥ manasikarotaḥ vutta nayena iva

original: upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
analyzed: upacāra samādhi uppajjati

original: 346. Yassa pana evampi bhāvayato kammaṭṭhānaṃ na ijjhati, tena salakkhaṇavibhattito
analyzed: yassa pana evam pi bhāvayataḥ kammaṭṭhānam na ijjhati tena sa lakkhaṇa vibhattitaḥ

original: bhāvetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Pubbe vuttanayeneva kesādayo pariggahetvā kesamhi thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: bhāvetabbam katham pubbe vutta nayena iva kesa ādayo pariggahetvā kesamhi thaddha lakkhaṇam

original: pathavīdhātūti vavatthapetabbaṃ. Tattheva ābandhanalakkhaṇaṃ āpodhātūti. Paripācanalakkhaṇaṃ
analyzed: pathavī dhātū ti tattha eva ābandhana lakkhaṇam āpaḥ dhātū ti paripācana lakkhaṇam

original: tejodhātūti. Vitthambhanalakkhaṇaṃ vāyodhātūti. Evaṃ sabbakoṭṭhāsesu ekekasmiṃ koṭṭhāse
analyzed: tejaḥ dhātu uti vitthambhana lakkhaṇam vāyo dhātu uti evam sabba koṭṭhāsesu ekekasmin koṭṭhāse

original: catasso catasso dhātuyo vavatthapetabbā. Tassevaṃ vavatthāpayato dhātuyo pākaṭā honti.
analyzed: catassaḥ catassaḥ dhātuyaḥ vavatthapetabbā tassa ivam vavatthāpayataḥ dhātuyaḥ pākaṭāḥ honti

original: Tā punappunaṃ āvajjato manasikaroto vuttanayeneva upacārasamādhi uppajjati.
analyzed: tā punappunam āvajjataḥ manasikarotaḥ vutta nayena iva upacāra samādhi uppajjati

original: Apica kho pana vacanatthato, kalāpato, cuṇṇato, lakkhaṇādito, samuṭṭhānato, nānattekattato,
analyzed: apica kho pana vacana atthataḥ kalāpataḥ cuṇṇataḥ lakkhaṇa āditaḥ samuṭṭhānataḥ nānatta ekattato

original: vinibbhogāvinibbhogato, sabhāgavisabhāgato, ajjhattikabāhiravisesato, saṅgahato,
analyzed: vinibbhoga avinibbhogataḥ sabhāga visabhāgataḥ ajjhattika bāhira visesataḥ saṅgahato

original: paccayato, asamannāhārato, paccayavibhāgatoti imehipi ākārehi dhātuyo manasikātabbā.
analyzed: paccayataḥ asamannāhārataḥ paccaya vibhāgato ti imehi pi ākārehi dhātuyaḥ manasikātabbā

original: 347. Tattha vacanatthato manasikarontena patthaṭattā pathavī. Appoti āpiyati appāyatīti
analyzed: tattha vacanatthataḥ manasikarontena patthaṭattā pathavī āpiyati appāyati iti

original: vā āpo. Tejatīti tejo. Vāyatīti vāyo. Avisesena pana salakkhaṇadhāraṇato dukkhādānato
analyzed: vā tejati iti tejaḥ vāyati iti vāyo avisesena pana sa lakkhaṇa dhāraṇato dukkha ādānato

original: dukkhādhānato ca dhātūti. Evaṃ visesasāmaññavasena vacanatthato manasikātabbā.
analyzed: dukkha ādhānato ca dhātū ti evam visesa sāmañña vasena vacana atthataḥ manasikātabbā

original: 348. Kalāpatoti yā ayaṃ kesā lomātiādinā nayena vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavīdhātu, pittaṃ semhanti ca ādinā nayena dvādasahākārehi āpodhātu niddiṭṭhā, tattha yasmā –
analyzed: yā ayam kesāḥ loma ati ādinā nayena vīsatiyā ākārehi pathavī dhātu pittam ca ādinā nayena dvādasahā ākārehi āpodhātu niddiṭṭhā tattha yasmā

original: Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā, catasso cāpi dhātuyo;
analyzed: vaṇṇaḥ gandhaḥ rasaḥ ojā catasso ca api dhātuyaḥ

original: Aṭṭhadhammasamodhānā, hoti kesāti sammuti;
analyzed: aṭṭha dhamma samodhānā hoti kesā ati sammuti

original: Tesaṃyeva vinibbhogā, natthi kesāti sammuti.
analyzed: tesam yeva vinibbhogāḥ natthi kesā ati sammuti

original: Tasmā kesāpi aṭṭhadhammakalāpamattameva. Tathā lomādayoti. Yo panettha kammasamuṭṭhāno
analyzed: tasmā kesā api aṭṭha dhamma kalāpa mattam eva tathā loma ādayaḥ ti yo pana ittha kamma samuṭṭhāno

original: koṭṭhāso, so jīvitindriyena ca bhāvena ca saddhiṃ dasadhammakalāpopi hoti. Ussadavasena
analyzed: koṭṭhāsaḥ so jīvitindriyena ca bhāvena ca saddhim dasa dhamma kalāpaḥ api hoti ussada vasena

original: pana pathavīdhātu āpodhātūti saṅkhaṃ gato. Evaṃ kalāpato manasikātabbā.
analyzed: pana pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu uti saṅkham gataḥ evam kalāpataḥ manasikātabbā

original: 349. Cuṇṇatoti imasmiṃ hi sarīre majjhimena pamāṇena pariggayhamānā paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā
analyzed: cuṇṇāt ti imasmin hi sarīre majjhimena pamāṇena pariggayhamānā paramāṇu bheda sañcuṇṇā

original: sukhumarajabhūtā pathavīdhātu doṇamattā siyā. Sā tato upaḍḍhappamāṇāya āpodhātuyā
analyzed: sukhuma raja bhūtā pathavī dhātu doṇa mattā siyā sā tatas upaḍḍhappamāṇāya āpas dhātuyā

original: saṅgahitā, tejodhātuyā anupālitā vāyodhātuyā vitthambhitā na vikiriyati na viddhaṃsiyati,
analyzed: saṅgahitā tejaḥ dhātuyā anupālitā vāyo dhātuyā vitthambhitā na na

original: avikiriyamānā aviddhaṃsiyamānā anekavidhaṃ itthipurisaliṅgādibhāvavikappaṃ upagacchati,
analyzed: a vikiriyamānā anekavidham itthi purisa liṅga ādi bhāva vikappam upagacchati

original: aṇuthūladīgharassathirakathinādibhāvañca pakāseti.
analyzed: aṇu thūla dīgha rassa thira ka thin ādi bhāvam ca pakāseti

original: Yūsagatā ābandhanākārabhūtā panettha āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejānupālitā vāyovitthambhitā na paggharati na parissavati, apaggharamānā aparissavamānā pīṇitapīṇitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: yūsa gatā ābandhana ākāra bhūtā pana ittha āpodhātu pathavī patiṭṭhitā teja anupālitā vāyo vitthambhitā na paggharati na parissavati a paggharamānā a parissavamānā pīṇita pīṇita bhāvam dasseti

original: Asitapītādipācakā cettha usumākārabhūtā uṇhattalakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā
analyzed: asita pīta ādi pācakā ca ittha usuma ākāra bhūtā uṇhatta lakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavī patiṭṭhitā

original: āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti, vaṇṇasampattiñcassa āvahati.
analyzed: āposaṅga hitā vāyovitthambhitā imam kāyam paripāca iti vaṇṇa sampattim ca assa āvahati

original: Tāya ca pana paripācito ayaṃ kāyo na pūtibhāvaṃ dasseti.
analyzed: tāya ca pana paripācitaḥ ayam kāyaḥ na pūti bhāvam dasseti

original: Aṅgamaṅgānusaṭā cettha samudīraṇavitthambhanalakkhaṇā vāyodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā
analyzed: ca ittha samudīraṇa vitthambhana lakkhaṇā vāyodhātu pathavī patiṭṭhitā

original: āposaṅgahitā tejānupālitā imaṃ kāyaṃ vitthambheti. Tāya ca pana vitthambhito ayaṃ
analyzed: āposaṅga hitā teja anupālitā imam kāyam vitthambheti tāya ca pana vitthambhitaḥ ayam

original: kāyo na paripatati, ujukaṃ saṇṭhāti. Aparāya vāyodhātuyā samabbhāhato gamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsayanairiyāpathesu
analyzed: kāyaḥ na paripatati ujukam saṇṭhāti aparāya vāyodhātuyā samabbhāhataḥ gamana ṭṭhāna nisajjā sayana eriyāpathesu

original: viññattiṃ dasseti, samiñjeti, sampasāreti, hatthapādaṃ lāḷeti. Evametaṃ itthipurisādibhāvena
analyzed: viññattim dasseti samiñjeti sampasāreti hattha pādam lāḷeti evam etam itthi purisa ādi bhāvena

original: bālajanavañcanaṃ māyārūpasadisaṃ dhātuyantaṃ pavattatīti evaṃ cuṇṇato manasikātabbā.
analyzed: bāla jana vañcanam māyā rūpa sadisam dhātuyantam pavattati iti evam cuṇṇataḥ manasikātabbā

original: 350. Lakkhaṇāditoti pathavīdhātu kiṃ lakkhaṇā, kiṃ rasā, kiṃ paccupaṭṭhānāti evaṃ
analyzed: lakkhaṇa āditaḥ ti pathavī dhātu kim lakkhaṇā kim rasā kim paccupaṭṭhānā ati evam

original: catassopi dhātuyo āvajjetvā pathavīdhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇā, patiṭṭhānarasā, sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
analyzed: catasso api dhātuyaḥ āvajjetvā pathavī dhātu kakkhaḷatta lakkhaṇā patiṭṭhāna rasā sampaṭicchana paccupaṭṭhānā

original: Āpodhātu paggharaṇalakkhaṇā, brūhanarasā, saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānā. Tejodhātu uṇhattalakkhaṇā,
analyzed: āpaḥ dhātu paggharaṇa lakkhaṇā brūhana rasā saṅgaha paccupaṭṭhānā tejaḥ dhātu uṇhatta lakkhaṇā

original: paripācanarasā, maddavānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā. Vāyodhātu vitthambhanalakkhaṇā, samudīraṇarasā.
analyzed: paripācana rasā maddava anuppadāna paccupaṭṭhānā vāyodhātu vitthambhana lakkhaṇā samudīraṇa rasā

original: Abhinīhārapaccupaṭṭhānāti evaṃ lakkhaṇādito manasikātabbā.
analyzed: abhinīhāra paccupaṭṭhānā ti evam lakkhaṇa āditaḥ manasikātabbā

original: 351. Samuṭṭhānatoti ye ime pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ vitthārato dassanavasena kesādayo dvācattālīsa
analyzed: samuṭṭhānato ti ye ime pathavī dhātu ādīnam vitthārataḥ dassana vasena kesa ādayaḥ dvācattālīsa

original: koṭṭhāsā dassitā. Tesu udariyaṃ karīsaṃ pubbo muttanti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā utusamuṭṭhānāva.
analyzed: koṭṭhāsā dassitā tesu udariyam karīsam pubbaḥ muttanti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā utu samuṭṭhānā va

original: Assu sedo kheḷo siṅghāṇikāti ime cattāro utucittasamuṭṭhānā. Asitādiparipācako tejo
analyzed: assu sedaḥ kheḷaḥ siṅghāṇikā ati ime cattāro utu citta samuṭṭhānāḥ asita ādi paripācako tejo

original: kammasamuṭṭhānova. Assāsapassāsā cittasamuṭṭhānāva. Avasesā sabbepi catusamuṭṭhānāti
analyzed: kamma samuṭṭhānā uva assāsa passāsā citta samuṭṭhānā ava avasesā sabbe pi catu samuṭṭhānā ti

original: evaṃ samuṭṭhānato manasikātabbā.
analyzed: evam samuṭṭhānataḥ manasikātabbā

original: 352. Nānattekattatoti sabbāsampi dhātūnaṃ salakkhaṇādito nānattaṃ. Aññāneva hi pathavīdhātuyā
analyzed: nānatta ekattato ti sabbāsam pi dhātūnam salakkhaṇa āditaḥ nānattam aññānā iva hi pathavī dhātuyā

original: lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānāni. Aññāni āpodhātuādīnaṃ. Evaṃ lakkhaṇādivasena pana kammasamuṭṭhānādivasena
analyzed: lakkhaṇa rasa paccupaṭṭhānāni aññāni āpodhātu ādīnam evam lakkhaṇa ādi vasena pana kamma samuṭṭhāna ādi vasena

original: ca nānattabhūtānampi etāsaṃ rūpamahābhūtadhātudhammaaniccādivasena ekattaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ca etāsam rūpa mahābhūta dhātu dhamma anicca ādi vasena ekattam hoti

original: Sabbāpi hi dhātuyo ruppanalakkhaṇaṃ anatītattā rūpāni. Mahantapātubhāvādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni.
analyzed: sabbā api hi dhātuyaḥ ruppana lakkhaṇam anatīta ttā rūpāni mahanta pātubhāva ādīhi kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni

original: Mahantapātubhāvādīhīti etā hi dhātuyo mahantapātubhāvato, mahābhūtasāmaññato, mahāparihārato, mahāvikārato, mahattā bhūtattā cāti imehi kāraṇehi mahābhūtānīti vuccanti.
analyzed: mahanta pātubhāva ādīhi iti etāḥ hi dhātuyaḥ mahanta pātubhāvataḥ mahābhūta sāmaññataḥ mahā parihārataḥ mahā vikārataḥ mahattā bhūtattā ca ati imehi kāraṇehi mahābhūtāni iti vuccanti

original: Tattha mahantapātubhāvatoti etāni hi anupādinnasantānepi upādinnasantānepi mahantāni pātubhūtāni. Tesaṃ anupādinnasantāne –
analyzed: tattha mahanta pātubhāvato ti etāni hi an upādinna santāne pi upādinna santāne pi mahantāni pātubhūtāni tesam an upādinna santāne

original: Duve satasahassāni, cattāri nahutāni ca;
analyzed: duve sata sahassāni cattāri nahutāni ca

original: Ettakaṃ bahalattena, saṅkhātāyaṃ vasundharāti. –
analyzed: ettakam bahalattena saṅkhātā ayam vasundharā ati

original: Ādinā nayena mahantapātubhāvatā buddhānussatiniddese vuttāva.
analyzed: ādinā nayena mahanta pātubhāva tā buddhānussatiniddese vuttā ava

original: Upādinnasantānepi macchakacchapadevadānavādisarīravasena mahantāneva pātubhūtāni. Vuttañhetaṃ “santi, bhikkhave, mahāsamudde yojanasatikāpi attabhāvā”tiādi.
analyzed: upādinna santāne api maccha kacchapa deva dānava ādi sarīra vasena mahantān eva pātubhūtāni vuttam ha etam santi bhikkhave mahā samudde yojana satikā api atta bhāva atiādi

original: Mahābhūtasāmaññatoti etāni hi yathā māyākāro amaṇiṃyeva udakaṃ maṇiṃ katvā dasseti, asuvaṇṇaṃyeva leḍḍuṃ suvaṇṇaṃ katvā dasseti.
analyzed: mahābhūta sāmaññatā ti etāni hi yathā māyākāraḥ a maṇiṃya iva udakam maṇim katvā dasseti a suvaṇṇam yeva leḍḍum suvaṇṇam katvā dasseti

original: Yathā ca sayaṃ neva yakkho na yakkhī samāno yakkhabhāvampi yakkhibhāvampi dasseti,
analyzed: yathā ca sayam na iva yakkhaḥ na yakkhī samānaḥ yakkha bhāvam pi yakkhi bhāvam pi dasseti

original: evameva sayaṃ anīlāneva hutvā nīlaṃ upādārūpaṃ dassenti, apītāni alohitāni anodātāneva
